english: use more complex print-making techniques to make theme-based or non-representational prints
irish: úsáid a bhaint as raon de theicníochtaí priontála níos coimpléascaí chun priontaí neamhléiritheacha nó cinn bunaithe ar théamaí a dhéanamh

english: use a computer art program to create original images that are not dependent on clip art
irish: ríomhchlár ealaíne a úsáid chun buníomhánna nach bhfuil ag brath ar phictiúir ghearrtha a chruthú

english: make prints for functional uses (as well as for their own sake)
irish: monaiphriontaí a dhéanamh lena n-úsáid (agus ar a son féin chomh maith)

english: experiment with more complex printmaking techniques
irish: taighde a dhéanamh ar raon níos coimpléascaí de theicníochtaí priontála

english: look at, handle and talk about natural and manufactured objects for experience of texture, shape and pattern
irish: earraí nádúrtha agus earraí saothraithe a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar uigeacht, ar chruth agus ar ghréas

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and art prints or print design that demonstrate a variety of print-making techniques
irish: a s(h)aothar féin, saothar páistí eile, priontaí ealaíne nó priontdhearadh a léiríonn teicníochtaí éagsúla priontála a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: paint from observation
irish: péinteáil bunaithe ar bhreathnóireacht

english: make paintings based on recalled feelings and experiences and discover ways of achieving spatial effects
irish: pictiúir bunaithe ar mhothúcháin agus ar eispéiris mheabhraithe a dhéanamh agus slite chun maisíochtaí spásúlacha a bhaint amach a fhionnachtain

english: express his/her imaginative life and interpret imaginative themes using colour expressively
irish: a s(h)aol samhalta a chur in iúl agus téamaí samhalta a léirmhíniú trí dhath a úsáid go lánléiritheach

english: explore the relationship between how things feel and how they look
irish: an coibhneas idir mothú agus cuma rudaí a iniúchadh

english: explore colour with a variety of colour drawing instruments, media and techniques
irish: dath a iniúchadh trí fheidhm a bhaint as raon d'uirlisí líníochta, de mhéain agus de theicníochtaí dathaithe

english: discover pattern and rhythm in natural and manufactured objects
irish: gréas agus rithim a fhionnachtain in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe

english: discover harmony and contrast in natural and manufactured objects and through themes chosen for their colour possibilities
irish: comhréiteach agus codarsnacht a fhionnachtain in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe agus trí théamaí a roghnaíodh i ngeall ar a bhféidearthachtaí datha

english: become sensitive to increasingly subtle colour differences and tonal variations in natural and manufactured objects
irish: a bheith íogaireach do dhifríochtaí níos fíneálta datha agus do thoin éagsúla in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and the work of artists
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar shaothar ealaíontóirí agus iad a phlé

english: look at, handle and talk about a variety of fabrics and fibres for experience of tactile, visual and spatial qualities
irish: raon d'fhabraicí agus de shnáithíní éagsúla a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar cháilíochtaí tadhaill, spásúlachta agus amhairc

english: look at fabric crafts and artefacts and visit a craftsperson at work if possible
irish: ceird agus píosaí fabraice ón gceardaí a bhreathnú agus a phlé agus, más féidir, cuairt a thabhairt ar cheardaí i mbun oibre

english: look at and talk about woven, embroidered, knitted and other fabrics, including interesting items of clothing from different times and cultures, and explore the role of textiles in culture
irish: fabraicí fite, cniotáilte, cróiseáilte agus fabraicí eile chomh maith le baill éadaigh spéisiúla a bhaineann le tréimhsí agus le cultúir éagsúla a bhreathnú agus a phlé; tábhacht fabraice i gcultúr a iniúchadh

english: look at and talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: a s(h)aothar féin agus saothar páistí eile a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: make small inventive pieces in fabric and fibre
irish: píosaí beaga airgtheacha a dhéanamh i bhfabraic agus i snáithín

english: make simple character toys
irish: bréagáin shimplí de phearsana a dhéanamh

english: explore and discover the possibilities of fabric and fibre as media for imaginative expression
irish: buanna fabraice agus snáithín mar mheáin le haghaidh léirithe shamhlaíoch a iniúchadh agus a fhionnachtain

english: design and make a costume
irish: culaithirt a dhearadh agus a dhéanamh

english: make drawings based on themes reflecting broadening interests, experiences and feelings
irish: líníochtaí bunaithe ar théamaí a léiríonn spéiseanna, eispéiris agus mothúcháin fhorásacha a dhéanamh

english: experiment with the marks, lines, shapes, textures, patterns and tones that can be made with different drawing instruments on a range of surfaces, demonstrating increasing sensitivity and control
irish: triail a bhaint as marcanna, línte, cruthanna, uigeacht, gréasa agus toin éagsúla a dhéanamh ar raon de dhromchlaí le huirlisí éagsúla agus breis íogaireachta agus smachta á léiriú

english: draw imaginative themes using inventive pattern and detail
irish: gréas agus mionsonraí airgtheacha a úsáid chun téamaí samhlaíocha a líniú

english: draw from observation
irish: líníocht bunaithe ar bhreathnadóireacht a dhéanamh

english: discover how line could convey movement and rhythm
irish: a fhionnachtain mar a d'fhéadfadh líne gluaiseacht agus rithim a chur in iúl

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and the work of artists
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar shaothar ealaíontóirí agus iad a phlé

english: make imaginative structures
irish: struchtúir shamhlaíocha a dhéanamh

english: make drawings from observation to analyse form and structure
irish: líníochtaí bunaithe ar bhreathnóireacht a dhéanamh chun struchtúr agus foirm a anailísiú

english: explore and experiment with the properties and characteristics of materials in making structures
irish: airíonna agus tréithe ábhar a iniúchadh agus triail a bhaint astu i ndéanamh struchtúr

english: look at, investigate and talk about spatial arrangements, balance and outline in collections or photographs of natural and manufactured structures
irish: socruithe spásúlachta, cothromaíochta agus imlíne i gcnuasaigh nó i ngrianghraif de struchtúir nádúrtha nó de struchtúir shaothraithe a bhreathnú, a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about impressive examples of buildings created in the past in different parts of the world and at contemporary architecture, sculpture, engineering and design (slides or prints)
irish: samplaí d'fhoirgnimh shuntasacha a tógadh san am atá thart in áiteanna éagsúla ar fud an domhain agus samplaí d'ailtireacht, de dhealbhóireacht d'innealtóireacht agus de dhearadh comhaimseartha a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: a s(h)aothar féin agus saothar páistí eile a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at, handle and talk about natural and manufactured objects for experience of three-dimensional form
irish: earraí nadúrtha nó earraí saothraithe a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar fhoirm thríthoiseach

english: look at and talk about ritual masks, street theatre masks and figures, and functional and decorative pottery from different cultures and different times (slides or prints)
irish: dearcadh ar mhaisc dheasghnácha, ar mhaisc agus ar fhíoracha amharclainne sráide, agus ar photaireacht fheidhmiúil nó mhaisiúil ó chultúir agus amanna difriúla (sleamhnáin nó priontaí) agus iad a phlé

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and the work of sculptors, including relief sculptures (prints or slides)
irish: a s(h)aothar féin, saothar páistí eile agus saothar dealbhóra, dealbha rilífe san áireamh (priontaí nó sleamhnáin), a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: work inventively and expressively with papier mach+®
irish: oibriú go hairgtheach léiritheach le papier maché

english: make simple pottery and sculpture
irish: potaireacht agus dealbhóireacht shimplí a dhéanamh

english: make an imaginative slab-built structure
irish: struchtúr samhlaíoch leac a thógáil

english: explore some of the essential characteristics of three-dimensional work
irish: roinnt de na tréithe bunúsacha a bhaineann le saothar tríthoiseach a iniúchadh

english: explore and discover the possibilities of clay as a medium for imaginative expression
irish: buanna cré mar mheán le haghaidh léirithe shamhlaíoch a iniúchadh agus a fhionnachtain

irish: triail a bhaint as líne, as cruth, as uigeacht agus as gréas a úsáid i rilíf íseal agus an teicníocht a fhorbairt

irish: líníochtaí bunaithe ar eispéiris mheabhruithe a dhéanamh agus béim a chur ar ghréas, ar mhionsonraí, ar chomhthéacs agus ar shuíomh

irish: a s(h)aol samhalta a léiriú agus téamaí samhalta a léirmhíniú trí fheidhm a bhaint as gréas airgtheach agus mionsonraí

english: experiment with the marks, lines, shapes,textures, patterns and tones that can be made with different drawing instruments on a range of surfaces
irish: triail a bhaint as marcanna, línte, cruthanna, uigeacht, gréasa agus toin dhifriúla a dhéanamh ar raon de dhromchlaí le huirlisí líníochta éagsúla

english: draw from observation
irish: líníocht bunaithe ar bhreathnadóireacht a dhéanamh

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and the work of artists
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar shaothar ealaíontóirí agus iad a phlé

english: make imaginative structures
irish: struchtúir shamhlaíocha a dhéanamh

english: make drawings from observation to analyse the structures of buildings and the natural structures of plants
irish: líníochtaí bunaithe ar bhreathnú a dhéanamh chun struchtúir foirgneamh agus struchtúir nádúrtha plandaí a anailísiú

english: explore and experiment with the properties and characteristics of materials in making structures
irish: airíonna agus tréithe ábhar a iniúchadh agus triail a bhaint astu i ndéanamh struchtúr

english: look at collections or photographs of natural and built structures and investigate spatial arrangements, balance, outline
irish: cnuasaigh nó grianghraif de struchtúir nádúrtha agus de struchtúir thógtha a bhreathnú agus na socruithe spásúlacha, cothromaíochta agus imlíne a iniúchadh

english: look at and talk about interesting examples of contemporary architecture and the work of great architects and builders of history
irish: samplaí spéisiúla d'ailtireacht chomhaimseartha maille le saothar ailtirí agus foirgneoirí mór le rá a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: a s(h)aothar féin agus saothar páistí eile a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at, handle and talk about natural and manufactured objects for experience of three-dimensional form
irish: earraí nadúrtha nó earraí saothraithe a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar fhoirm thríthoiseach

english: look at and talk about ritual masks, street theatre masks and figures, and functional and decorative pottery (or slides or prints)
irish: breathnú ar mhaisc dheasghnácha, ar mhaisc agus fhíoracha amharclainne sráide agus ar photaireacht fheidmiúil agus mhaisiúil (nó ar shleamhnáin nó phriontaí) agus iad a phlé

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and figurative and non-representational pieces of sculpture (slides or prints)
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar phíosaí dealbhóireachta fáthaí agus neamhléirithí (sleamhnáin nó priontaí) agus iad a phlé

english: work inventively and expressively with papier mach+®
irish: oibriú go hairgtheach léiritheach le papier maché

english: work inventively and expressively with cubes or oblong blocks of clay
irish: obair airgtheach lánléiritheach a dhéanamh le ciúbanna nó le bloic dhronuilleacha cré

english: make sturdy figures in clay using the medium expressively and with imaginative detail
irish: an meán a úsáid go léiritheach agus le mionsonraí samhalta chun dealbha urrúnta cré a chruthú

english: make simple clay pots
irish: potaí simplí cré a dhéanamh

english: explore and discover the possibilities of clay as a medium for imaginative expression
irish: buanna cré mar mheán le haghaidh léirithe shamhlaíoch a iniúchadh agus a fhionnachtain

english: develop line, shape, texture and pattern in clay
irish: líne, cruth, uigeacht agus gréas a fhorbairt i gcré

english: use a widening range of print-making techniques to make theme-based or non-representational prints
irish: raon forásach de theicníochtaí priontála a úsáid chun priontaí bunaithe ar théamaí chomh maith le priontaí neamhléiritheacha a dhéanamh

english: use a computer art program to create original images that are not dependent on clip art
irish: ríomhchlár ealaíne a úsáid chun buníomhánna nach bhfuil ag brath ar phictiúir ghearrtha a chruthú

english: make prints for functional uses (as well as for their own sake)
irish: monaiphriontaí a dhéanamh lena n-úsáid (agus ar a son féin chomh maith)

english: experiment with a widening range of printmaking techniques
irish: triail a bhaint as raon níos leithne teicníochtaí chun priontaí a dhéanamh

irish: earraí nádúrtha agus earraí saothraithe a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar uigeacht, ar chruth agus ar ghréas

english: look at and talk about examples of design in everyday use
irish: samplaí de dhearadh choitianta a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: paint from observation
irish: péinteáil bunaithe ar bhreathnóireacht

irish: pictiúir bunaithe ar mhothúcháin agus ar eispéiris mheabhraithe a dhéanamh agus tionchair spásúlacha dhatha agus thoin a iniúchadh, rádalú a úsáid agus roinnt tuisceana ar scála a léiriú

english: express his/her imaginative life and interpret imaginative themes using colour expressively

irish: an coibhneas idir mothú agus cuma rudaí a iniúchadh

english: explore colour with a variety of materials and media

english: discover pattern and rhythm in natural and manufactured objects and use them purposefully in his/her work

irish: bréagáin bhoga a dhéanamh agus béim á leagan ar indibhidiúlacht agus ar éagsúlacht

irish: raon d'fhabraicí agus de shnáithíní éagsúla a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar cháilíochtaí tadhaill, spásúlachta agus amhairc

english: look at and talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: a s(h)aothar féin agus saothar páistí eile a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about fabrics crafts and artefacts and visit a craftsperson at work if possible
irish: fabraicí agus lámhdhéantúsáin ealaíne ón gceardaí a bhreathnú agus a phlé agus cuairt a thabhairt ar cheardaí i mbun oibre, más féidir

english: make small inventive pieces with fabric and fibre
irish: fabraic agus snáithín a úsáid chun píosaí beaga airgtheacha a dhéanamh

english: invent a costume
irish: culaithirt a chumadh

english: explore and discover the possibilities of fabric and fibre as media for imaginative expression
irish: buanna fabraice agus snáithín mar mheáin le haghaidh léirithe shamhlaíoch a iniúchadh agus a fhionnachtain

english: make drawings based on his/her personal or imaginative life with a growing sense of spatial relationships
irish: líníochtaí bunaithe ar a s(h)aol pearsanta nó ar a s(h)aol samhlaíoch a dhéanamh agus tuiscint fhorásach ar choibhneasa spásúlacha a léiriú iontu

english: explore shape as seen in natural and manufactured objects and become aware of the shape of shadows cast by objects
irish: iniúchadh a dhéanamh ar chruth in ábhair nádúrtha agus in ábhair shaothraithe agus bheith feasach ar chruth na scáileanna a dhéanann rudaí

english: experiment with the marks, lines, shapes, textures, patterns and tones that can be made with different drawing instruments on a range of surfaces
irish: triail a bhaint as marcanna, as línte, as cruthanna, as uigeacht agus as toin a dhéanamh le huirlisí éagsúla líníochta ar raon de dhromchlaí

english: draw from observation
irish: líníocht bunaithe ar bhreathnadóireacht a dhéanamh

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and the work of artists
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar shaothar ealaíontóirí agus iad a phlé

english: make imaginative structures
irish: struchtúir shamhlaíocha a dhéanamh

english: explore and experiment with the properties and characteristics of materials in making structures
irish: airíonna agus tréithe ábhar a iniúchadh agus triail a bhaint astu i ndéanamh struchtúr

english: look at collections or photographs of natural and built structures and investigate spatial arrangements, balance and outline and how the spaces created relate to the whole
irish: cnuasaigh nó grianghraif de struchtúir nádúrtha nó de struchtúir thógtha a bhreathnú agus socruithe spásúlacha, cothromaíocht, imlíne agus an coibhneas idir na spásanna a cruthaíodh agus an t-iomlán a imscrúdú

english: look at and talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: a s(h)aothar féin agus saothar páistí eile a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about a local building complex, at a famous building and at visually stimulating artefacts (or slides or prints)
irish: coimpléasc áitiúil, foirgneamh cáiliúil agus lámhdhéantúsáin amharcspreagúla (nó sleamhnáin nó priontaí díobh) a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at, handle and talk about natural and manufactured objects for experience of three-dimensional form
irish: earraí nadúrtha nó earraí saothraithe a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar fhoirm thríthoiseach

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and figures by famous sculptors with contrasting styles (or slides or prints)
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar dhealbha a chum dealbhóirí cáiliúla a raibh stíleanna difriúla acu (nó sleamhnáin nó priontaí) agus iad a phlé

english: work inventively with cubes or oblong blocks of clay and add details to suggest a solid structure
irish: oibriú go cruthaitheach le bloic chiúbacha nó dhronuilleacha chré agus mionrudaí a chur leo chun struchtúr daingean a chur in iúl

english: make simple pottery
irish: potaireacht shimplí a dhéanamh

english: explore and discover the possibilities of clay as a medium for imaginative expression
irish: buanna cré mar mheán le haghaidh léirithe shamhlaíoch a iniúchadh agus a fhionnachtain

english: experiment with and develop line, shape, texture and pattern in clay
irish: líne, cruth, uigeacht agus gréas a thástáil agus a fhorbairt i gcré

english: change the form of a small ball of clay, using the medium expressively
irish: an meán a úsáid go lánléiritheach agus foirm liathróide bige cré á hathrú

english: use a variety of print-making techniques
irish: teicníochtaí éagsúla priontála a úsáid

english: experiment with the effects that can be achieved with simple print-making
irish: turgnamh leis na torthaí ab fhéidir a bhaint amach trí phriontaí simplí a dhéanamh

english: look at, handle and talk about familiar objects for experience of shape, texture, pattern
irish: rudaí coitianta a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun cleachtadh a fháil ar chruth, ar uigeacht agus ar ghréas

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and art prints composed of simple shapes and textures
irish: a s(h)aothar féin, saothar páistí eile agus priontaí ealaíne déanta de chruthanna agus uigeacht shimplí a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about examples of simple print design in everyday use
irish: samplaí de phriontdhearadh coitianta simplí a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: use colour to express vividly recalled feelings, experiences and imaginings
irish: dath a úsáid chun mothúcháin a thabharfadh sé/sí chun cuimhne, eispéireas agus rudaí samhlaithe a léiriú

english: experiment with a variety of colour drawing instruments and media to develop colour awareness
irish: feasacht ar dhath a fhorbairt trí thriail a bhaint as uirlisí líníochta éagsúla agus meáin éagsúla dathaithe

english: discover the relationship between how things feel and how they look
irish: an coibhneas idir mothú agus cuma rudaí a fhionnachtain

english: discover colour, pattern and rhythm in colourful objects
irish: dath, gréas agus rithim a fhionnachtain i rudaí dathannacha

english: discover colour in the visual environment to help develop sensitivity to colour
irish: dath a fhionnachtain san amharcthimpeallacht chun íogaireacht do dhath a fhorbairt

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and the work of artists
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar shaothar ealaíontóirí agus iad a phlé

english: look at, handle and talk about a variety of fabrics and fibres for experience of tactile, visual and structural qualities
irish: fabraicí agus snáithíní éagsúla a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé chun taithí a fháil ar a gcáilíochtaí tadhaill, amhairc agus struchtúrtha

english: look at and talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: a s(h)aothar féin agus saothar páistí eile a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: make simple collages
irish: colláisí simplí a dhéanamh

english: invent a costume
irish: culaithirt a chumadh

english: explore the possibilities of fabric and fibre as media for imaginative expression
irish: buanna fabraice agus snáithín mar mheáin le haghaidh léirithe shamhlaíoch a iniúchadh

english: make drawings based on vividly recalled feelings, real and imaginative experiences and stories
irish: líníochtaí bunaithe ar mhothúcháin a thabharfaí chun cuimhne go grinn, ar dhearbheispéireas, ar eispéireas samhlaíoch agus ar scéalta a dhéanamh

english: explore the relationship between how things feel and how they look
irish: an coibhneas idir mothú agus cuma rudaí a iniúchadh

english: experiment with the marks that can be made with different drawing instruments on a range of surfaces
irish: turgnamh le marcanna a dhéanamh le huirlisí éagsúla líníochta ar raon de dhromchlaí

english: discover and draw line and shape as seen in natural and manufactured objects and discover that lines can make shapes
irish: líne agus cruth mar a fheictear iad in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe a fhionnachtain agus a tharraingt agus a fhionnachtain gur féidir cruthanna a dhéanamh le línte

english: look at and talk about his/her work, the work of other children and the work of artists
irish: breathnú ar a s(h)aothar féin, ar shaothar páistí eile agus ar shaothar ealaíontóirí agus iad a phlé

irish: struchtúir shamhlaíocha a dhéanamh

irish: airíonna agus tréithe ábhar a iniúchadh agus triail a bhaint astu i ndéanamh struchtúr

english: look at, investigate and talk about spatial arrangements and balance in collections of objects and in photographs of natural and built structures
irish: an leagan amach agus an chothromaíocht spásúlach i gcnuasaigh de rudaí agus i ngrianghraif de struchtúir nádúrtha nó de struchtúir a tógadh a bhreathnú, a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about structures that are easily accessible and close at hand, at visually stimulating structures and at a range of common artefacts
irish: struchtúir atá insroichte agus sa gharchomharsanacht, struchtúir amharcspreagúla agus raon de dhéantúsáin choitianta a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at and talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: a s(h)aothar féin agus saothar páistí eile a bhreathnú agus a phlé

english: look at, handle and talk about objects with free-flowing forms
irish: rudaí le foirmeacha snítheacha a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé

english: look at, handle and talk about his/her own work, the work of other children and simple pieces of clay pottery
irish: a s(h)aothar féin, saothar páistí eile agus píosaí simplí potaireachta a bhreathnú, a láimhsiú agus a phlé

english: make a clay form and manipulate it with fingers to suggest a subject
irish: foirm chré a dhéanamh agus a oibriú leis na méara chun rud a chur in iúl

english: invent mixed-media pieces in both representational and non-representational modes
irish: píosaí meán measctha a chumadh i modh léiritheach nó i modh neamhléiritheach

irish: foirm chré a dhéanamh agus a oibriú leis na méara chun rud a chur in iúl

irish: píosaí meán measctha a chumadh i modh léiritheach nó i modh neamhléiritheach

english: explore and discover the possibilities of clay as a medium for imaginative expression
irish: buanna cré mar mheán le haghaidh léirithe shamhlaíoch a iniúchadh agus a fhionnachtain

english: recognise unequal treatment of sexual roles and other issues in literature, advertising, drama, magazines and other media
irish: plé éagothrom le rólanna gnéasacha agus le saincheisteanna eile i litríocht, i bhfógraíocht, i ndrámaíocht, in irisí agus i meáin eile a aithint

english: identify the audiences at which different aspects of the media are aimed
irish: an lucht éisteachta a bhfuil gnéithe difriúla de na meáin chumarsáide dírithe air a aithint

english: explore various recreation and leisure activities as an alternative to watching television
irish: gníomhaíochtaí éagsúla caithimh aimsire agus scíthe a iniúchadh mar mhalairt ar bhreathnú ar an teilifís

english: explore the role of newspapers and other forms of print media in transmitting messages, the techniques used and the types of information included
irish: ról na nuachtán agus foirmeacha eile clóbhuailte i dtarchur teachtaireachtaí a iniúchadh, na teicníochtaí a úsáidtear agus na saghsanna eolais a bhíonn i gceist

english: explore and use some simple broadcasting, production and communication techniques
irish: roinnt teicníochtaí simplí craolacháin, léirithe agus cumarsáide a iniúchadh agus a úsáid

english: explore and understand how information is conveyed and practise relaying messages using a variety of methods
irish: an tslí ina n-aithrisítear eolas a iniúchadh agus a thuiscint agus tarchur teachtaireachtaí a chleachtadh, ag baint úsáide as modhanna éagsúla  teicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide, litir, teileafón, pictiúr, póstaer, comhartha, scannán, leabhar

english: become increasingly critical and discerning in his/her own attitude to advertising and the techniques used to promote products, life-styles and ideas
irish: bheith criticiúil grinn i gcónaí agus aireach maidir lena d(h)earcadh féin i leith na fógraíochta agus na dteicníochtaí a úsáidtear chun táirgí, stíleanna maireachtála agus idéanna a chur chun cinn

english: become aware of the different forms of advertising, its purpose and the messages it promotes
irish: éirí feasach ar na cineálacha difriúla fógraíochta, a cuspóirí agus na teachtaireachtaí a chuireann sí chun cinn

english: recognise and understand the role of the individual and various groups in the community
irish: ról an duine aonair agus grúpaí éagsúla sa phobal a aithint agus a thuiscint

english: recognise and explore the positive contributions made to the local community by various organisations, ethnic, social or community groups and individuals
irish: an chabhair dheimhneach a thugtar don phobal áitiúil ag eagraíochtaí éagsúla, ag grúpaí eitneacha, sóisialta nó pobail agus ag daoine aonair a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and acknowledge the various cultural, religious, ethnic or other groups that exist in a community or society and explore ways in which these differences can be respected
irish: na grúpaí éagsúla cultúrtha, reiligiúnacha, eitneacha nó eile atá i bpobal nó i sochaí a aithint agus glacadh leo agus bealaí inar féidir urraim a thabhairt do na héagsúlachtaí seo a iniúchadh

english: realise and begin to understand the unequal distribution of the worldÔÇÖs resources
irish: an dáileadh éagothrom atá ar acmhainní an domhain a aithint agus dul i gceann tuisceana air

english: practise ways of working together and of developing a sense of belonging
irish: slite chun oibriú le chéile agus chun mothú cumainn a fhorbairt a chleachtadh

english: identify some local issues of concern and explore possible action that could be taken to address these issues
irish: roinnt saincheisteanna is cúram don cheantar áitiúil a aithint agus gníomh a d'fhéadfaí a dhéanamh chun déileáil leis na saincheisteanna seo a iniúchadh

english: explore the concept of the class or school as a community
irish: an chabhair dheimhneach a thugtar don phobal áitiúil ag eagraíochtaí éagsúla, ag grúpaí eitneacha, sóisialta nó pobail agus ag daoine aonair a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: explore local traditions and folklore and develop a sense of pride in his/her local community
irish: traidisiúin agus béaloideas áitiúla a iniúchadh agus móráil as a p(h)obal áitiúil a fhorbairt

english: explore how justice and peace can be promoted between people and groups, both nationally and internationally
irish: an tslí chun ceart agus síocháin a chur chun cinn idir dhaoine is grúpaí, ar bhonn náisiúnta agus idirnáisiúnta, a iniúchadh

english: explore how inequality might exist in the local community and suggest ways in which this might be addressed
irish: an tslí ina bhféadfadh éagothromaíocht bheith sa phobal áitiúil a iniúchadh agus bealaí a bhféadfaí déileáil leis seo a mholadh

english: begin to explore the concept of democracy
irish: tosú ar choincheap an daonlathais a iniúchadh

english: become aware of some of the cultures, lifestyles and languages of some countries in the European Union and the wider world
irish: bheith feasach ar roinnt de na cultúir, na stíleanna maireachtála agus na teangacha atá i roinnt tíortha san Aontas Eorpach agus sa domhan mór

english: become aware of elements of his/her own cultural heritage and traditions
irish: éirí feasach ar ghnéithe dá (h)oidhreacht chultúrtha agus dá t(h)raidisiúin féin

english: appreciate the environment and develop a sense of individual and community responsibility for caring for the environment and being custodians of the Earth for future generations
irish: an t-imshaol a léirthuiscint agus glacadh le freagracht ar bhonn aonair agus pobail as cúram an imshaoil agus as bheith mar chaomhnóirí ar an Domhan ar mhaithe leis na glúine atá le teacht

english: listen actively to others and respect what each person has to say
irish: éisteacht go haireach le daoine eile agus urraim a thabhairt don mhéid a bhíonn le rá ag gach duine

english: identify and discuss various responses to conflict situations
irish: freagairt éagsúil ar thosca coimhlinte a aithint agus a phlé

english: explore and practise the many verbal and non-verbal ways in which people communicate with each other
irish: na bealaí iomadúla briathartha agus neamhbhriathartha ina ndéanann daoine cumarsáid le chéile a iniúchadh agus a chleachtadh

english: explore and practise how to handle conflict without being aggressive
irish: an chaoi le coimhlint a láimhsiú gan bheith ionsaitheach a iniúchadh agus a chleachtadh

english: examine the various ways in which language can be used to isolate and discriminate against people
irish: na slite éagsúla inar féidir teanga a úsáid chun daoine a aonrú nó chun leithcheal a dhéanamh orthu a scrúdú

english: examine the power of persuasion, how it can be used both positively and negatively, and suggest practical ways and develop practical suggestions for dealing with pressures and influences
irish: cumhacht an áitimh a scrúdú, conas is féidir é a úsáid ar mhodh deimhneach agus diúltach araon, agus bealaí praiticiúla a mholadh agus moltaí praiticiúla a fhorbairt chun déileáil le brúnna agus le tionchair

english: discuss how conflict can arise with different people and in different situations
irish: an tslí ina dtarlaíonn coimhlint le daoine difriúla agus i staideanna difriúla a phlé

english: begin to appreciate the importance of maintaining a personal stance while also respecting the beliefs, values and opinions of others
irish: tosú ar an tábhacht a bhaineann le seasamh pearsanta a dhéanamh ach fós urraim a thabhairt do chreidimh, do luachanna agus do thuairimí daoine eile a léirthuiscint

english: explore what belonging to a family means
irish: an bhrí atá le ballraíocht i dteaghlach a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss families and homes and how they can vary in many ways
irish: teaghlaigh agus bailte a iniúchadh agus a phlé agus mar is féidir leo bheith éagsúil ar go leor slite

english: examine some factors that can affect family life
irish: roinnt tosca ar féidir leo dul i gcion ar shaol an teaghlaigh a scrúdú

english: discuss possible changes in family relationships and expectations as he/she grows and matures and how he/she can cope with them
irish: athruithe is féidir a theacht ar chaidreamh agus ar dhóchas teaghlaigh de réir mar a fhásann agus mar a aibíonn sé/sí a phlé agus conas is féidir leis/léi déileáil leo

english: discuss and identify behaviour that is important for harmony in family life
irish: iompraíocht atá tábhachtach chun go mbeadh síth i saol an teaghlaigh a phlé agus a aithint

english: critically examine the media portrayals of families and family life
irish: léiriú na meán cumarsáide ar theaghlaigh agus ar shaol an teaghlaigh a scrúdú go léirmheastach

english: compare and contrast the life-styles of families in different cultures, both in Ireland and abroad
irish: stíleanna maireachtála teaghlach i gcultúir dhifriúla, in Éirinn agus thar lear araon, a chur i gcomparáid agus i gcodarsnacht

english: recognise, discuss and understand bullying and its effects
irish: bulaíocht agus a hiarmhairtí a aithint, a phlé agus a thuiscint

english: practise and recognise the importance of care and consideration, courtesy and good manners with others
irish: cúram agus cásmhaireacht, cúirtéis agus dea-bhéasa i dtaca le daoine eile a chleachtadh agus an tábhacht a bhaineann leo a aithint

english: identify the different groups to which friends can belong and recognise what constitutes a healthy group
irish: na grúpaí difriúla ar féidir le cairde bheith ina mbaill díobh a aithint agus bheith eolach ar cad is grúpa sláintiúil ann

english: explore the importance of friendship and interacting with others and realise that making and changing friends is part of the natural process of growing
irish: tábhacht cairdis agus idirghníomhaithe le daoine eile a iniúchadh agus a thuiscint gur cuid den phróiseas nádúrtha fáis é cairdeas a dhéanamh le daoine agus cairde a athrú

english: explore the differences between boy-and girl friendships and same-sex friendships
irish: na difríochtaí a bhaineann le cairdeas idir buachaill agus cailín agus cairdeas aonghnéis a iniúchadh

english: explore how the opinions, views or expectations of others can influence how people relate to each other, either positively or negatively
irish: an tslí inar féidir le tuairimí, dearcadh nó dóchas daoine eile dul i gcion ar an gcaidreamh idir dhaoine, ar bhealach deimhneach nó diúltach, a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss how individuals can deal with being bullied, knowing that others are being bullied and being a bully
irish: an tslí inar féidir le daoine aonair déileáil le bulaíocht bheith á himirt orthu a iniúchadh agus a phlé, fios a bheith acu go bhfuil bulaíocht á himirt ar dhaoine eile agus bheith ina b(h)ulaí

english: discuss and appreciate the different aspects of friendship and the difference between close friends and acquaintances
irish: na gnéithe difriúla den chairdeas a phlé agus a léirthuiscint agus an difríocht idir dlúthchairde agus lucht aitheantais

english: consider problems that can arise in friendships and other relationships and how these could be handled
irish: machnamh a dhéanamh ar fhadhbanna a d'fhéadfadh teacht i gceist i gcairdeas agus i gcaidreamh eile agus mar a d'fhéadfaí iad seo a láimhsiú

english: understand the reproductive system of both male and female adults
irish: an córas giniúna ag daoine fásta, idir fhireann agus bhaineann, a thuiscint

english: recognise the importance of treating his/her body and that of others with dignity and respect
irish: an tábhacht a bhaineann le caitheamh lena c(h)orp féin agus le coirp daoine eile le dínit is le meas a aithint

english: recognise some physical disabilities and how they can affect people's lives
irish: roinnt míchumas fisiceach a aithint agus an tionchar is féidir a bheith acu ar bheatha an duine

english: recognise some of the important nutrients that are necessary in a balanced diet and the food products in which they are found
irish: cuid de na cothaithigh thábhachtacha atá riachtanach i réim chothrom bia a aithint mar aon leis na táirgí bia ina bhfuil siad le fáil

english: recognise causes of personal worry and identify appropriate coping strategies
irish: na cúiseanna le himní phearsanta a aithint maille le straitéisí oiriúnacha chun an ceann is fearr a fháil orthu

english: recognise and examine behaviour that is conducive to health and that which is harmful to health
irish: iompraíocht a chuidíonn le sláinte agus í sin atá díobhálach do shláinte a aithint agus a scrúdú

english: realise that there is a personal and communal responsibility for the health and well-being of himself/herself and others
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil freagracht phearsanta agus chomhchoiteann air/uirthi as a s(h)láinte agus a f(h)olláine féin agus as cuid daoine eile

english: realise how increased activity or involvement in physical activities can require increased attention to body care
irish: a thuiscint conas a éilíonn gníomhaíocht bhreise nó páirtíocht i ngníomhaíochtaí fisiceacha aire bhreise i dtaca le cúram coirp

english: realise and accept some personal responsibility for making wise food choices and adopting a healthy, balanced diet
irish: glacadh le freagracht phearsanta as roghanna críonna bia a dhéanamh agus as réim shláintiúil chothrom bia a roghnú,agus í seo a thuiscint

english: identify and discuss the roles of various people who are concerned with the health of others
irish: rólanna daoine éagsúla atá gafa i sláinte daoine eile a aithint agus a phlé

english: identify and discuss the physical and other changes that occur in boys and girls with the onset of puberty and understand that these take place at different rates for everyone
irish: na hathruithe fisiceacha agus eile a tharlaíonn i mbuachaillí agus i gcailíní agus iad ag teacht chun caithreachais a aithint agus a phlé, agus a thuiscint go dtarlaíonn siad seo ag rátaí difriúla i gcás gach duine

english: identify and be aware of the different ways in which the body may be protected against disease and infection
irish: na bealaí difriúla inar féidir an corp a chosaint ar ghalar is ar ionfhabhtú a aithint agus a bheith feasach orthu

english: explore the role of personal choice, risk factors and the influence of others when choosing to use non-prescribed substances
irish: ról rogha pearsanta, tosca fiontair agus tionchar daoine eile nuair a thograítear substaintí a ghlacadh nach bhfuil ar oideas docthtúra a iniúchadh

english: explore the factors that influence food choices
irish: na tosca a théann i gcion ar roghanna bia a iniúchadh

english: explore some of the reasons why people smoke, drink alcohol, misuse any kind of substances or take drugs that have no medical use
irish: cuid de na cúiseanna a gcaitheann daoine tobac, a n-ólann siad alcól, a mbaineann siad mí-úsáid as aon saghas substainte nó a nglacann siad drugaí nach mbíonn feidhm leighis leo a iniúchadh

english: explore and examine some of the illnesses particularly associated with food intake or special health conditions
irish: roinnt de na breoiteachtaí a bhaineann go speisialta le glacadh bia nó le riochtaí speisialta sláinte a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: explore and examine attitudes towards the misuse of substances and towards those who misuse substances of any kind
irish: an dearcadh ar mhí-úsáid substaintí agus ar dhaoine a mhí-úsáideann substaintí d'aon saghas a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: distinguish between legal and illegal substances, identifying those that are most commonly used, and examine and understand the effects they can have
irish: idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir substaintí dleathacha agus neamhdhleathacha, na cinn is mó a bhíonn in úsáid agus na torthaí a bhíonn orthu a scrúdú agus a thuiscint

english: become aware of the importance of hygiene and care in the preparation and use of food
irish: éirí feasach ar thábhacht an tsláinteachais agus an chúraim in ullmhú agus in úsáid bia

english: become aware of some communicable diseases and explore how diseases and infections are spread
irish: éirí feasach ar chuid de na galair thógálacha agus an tslí ina scaiptear galair agus ionfhabhtuithe a iniúchadh

english: appreciate the importance of good nutrition for growing and developing and staying healthy
irish: tábhacht dea-chothaithe i dtaca le fás agus forbairt agus le fanacht sláintiúil a léirthuiscint

english: take increasing personal responsibility for himself/herself
irish: glacadh le freagracht phearsanta mhéadaitheach as/aisti féin

english: reflect on his/her experiences and the reasons for taking different courses of action
irish: machnamh a dhéanamh ar a (h)eispéiris féin agus ar na cúiseanna a ndéantar cineálacha éagsúla gnímh

english: recognise and appreciate that each person is a unique individual and that this individuality is expressed in many different ways
irish: a aithint agus a léirthuiscint gur duine ar leith é gach duine agus go gcuirtear an leithlí seo in iúl ar an-chuid slite difriúla

english: identify realistic personal goals and targets and the strategies required to reach these
irish: cuspóirí agus spriocanna réalaíocha pearsanta a aithint mar aon leis na straitéisí is riachtanach chun iad a bhaint amach

english: enhance skills to improve learning
irish: cur leis na scileanna a fheabhsóidh an fhoghlaim

english: develop further the ability to express personal opinions, thoughts and ideas and listen to, respect, think about and comment critically and constructively on the views of others
irish: forbairt bhreise a dhéanamh ar an gcumas ar thuairimí, smaointe agus idéanna pearsanta a chur in iúl, agus éisteacht le, meas a bheith aige/aice ar, machnamh a dhéanamh ar agus labhairt go criticiúil agus go cuiditheach faoi thuairimí daoine eile

english: become more independent and autonomous
irish: éirí níos neamhspleáiche agus níos féinrialaithí

english: accept his/her own body image and explore some of the factors that affect his/her selfimage and beliefs about himself/herself
irish: glacadh lena c(h)orpíomhá féin agus cuid de na tosca a théann i gcion ar a f(h)éiníomhá agus ar chreidimh mar gheall air/uirthi féin a iniúchadh

english: recognise places where it is safer to play and how to behave in a responsible manner when playing
irish: áiteanna atá níos sábháilte le haghaidh súgartha a aithint agus conas é/í féin a iompar ar bhealach freagrach le linn súgartha

english: realise that as independence increases, responsibility for personal safety increases, and that a strategy for keeping safe has to be developed and adhered to by each individual
irish: a thuiscint go bhfásann freagracht as sábháilteacht phearsanta de réir mar a fhásann neamhspleáchas, agus go gcaithfidh gach duine straitéis le é/í féin a choinneáil slán a fhorbairt agus cloí léi

english: know how to keep safe when travelling and to understand how individuals can keep others safe
irish: a bheith eolach ar conas fanacht slán le linn taistil agus a thuiscint conas is féidir le duine daoine eile a choimeád slán

english: identify the substances in the home and school or on the farm that may be dangerous if not used properly and ensure that he/she has learned a safety strategy for dealing with unknown and dangerous substances
irish: na substaintí sa bhaile, sa scoil nó ar an bhfeirm a d'fhéadfadh a bheith dainséarach mura n-úsáidtear i gceart iad a aithint, agus a chinntiú go bhfuil straitéis sábháilteachta foghlamtha aige/aici chun déileáil le substaintí anaithnide agus dainséaracha

english: identify situations and places that may threaten personal safety
irish: staideanna agus áiteanna a d'fhéadfadh sábháilteacht phearsanta a chur i mbaol a aithint

english: identify and explore some potential risks to health and safety in the environment
irish: cuid de na fiontair shláinte agus shábháilteachta a d'fhéadfadh a bheith san imshaol a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: explore rules and regulations at home, in school and in society and the importance of adhering to them
irish: rialacha sa bhaile, ar scoil agus sa tsochaí a iniúchadh agus a thábhachtaí atá sé go gcloífí leo

english: explore and examine the use of medicines
irish: úsáid leigheas a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: discuss and appreciate the role each individual has in keeping others safe and identify occasions when his/her actions can threaten the safety of others
irish: an ról atá ag gach duine maidir le daoine eile a choimeád slán a phlé agus a léirthuiscint agus ócáidí a bhféadfadh gníomhartha dá c(h)uid sábháilteacht daoine eile a chur i mbaol a aithint

english: discuss a variety of risky situations and behaviour and assess and evaluate how these risks may be avoided or minimised and the implications of taking risks
irish: raon de staideanna agus de chineálacha iompraíochta contúirtí a phlé agus bealaí chun na fiontair seo a sheachaint nó a laghdú a mheasúnú agus a luacháil chomh maith le himpleachtaí na fiontraíochta

english: develop responsible attitudes towards the prevention of accidents and know what to do in the event of an accident
irish: dearcadh freagrach maidir le timpistí a chosc a fhorbairt agus fios a bheith aige/aici cad is cóir a dhéanamh i gcás timpiste

english: develop an awareness of health and safety in the school, home and work-place
irish: feasacht faoi shláinte is faoi shábháilteacht sa scoil, sa bhaile agus sa láthair oibre a fhorbairt

english: recognise the important and legitimate role that adults have to play in making decisions and setting boundaries for young people
irish: an ról tábhachtach dlisteaneach atá le comhlíonadh ag daoine fásta i ndéanamh cinntí agus i socrú teorainneacha do dhaoine óga a aithint

english: recognise that opportunities to exercise choice can increase as responsibilities are accepted and as the trust of others is earned
irish: a aithint gur féidir méadú a theacht ar na deiseanna chun roghanna a dhéanamh de réir mar a ghlactar le freagrachtaí agus de réir mar a thuilltear iontaoibh daoine eile

english: recognise that decisions have consequences and that not all people will make the same decisions all the time
irish: a aithint go mbíonn iarmhairtí le cinntí agus nach ndéanann gach duine na cinntí céanna i gcónaí

english: identify sources of help in solving problems
irish: foinsí cabhrach chun fadhbanna a réiteach a aithint

english: explore and learn to examine critically the factors and levels of thought that influence decisions and choices
irish: na tosca agus na leibhéil smaoinimh a théann i gcion ar chinntí is ar roghanna a iniúchadh agus foghlaim conas iad a scrúdú go criticiúil

english: distinguish between assumption, inference, fact, rumour and opinion in making a decision
irish: foshuíomh, tátal, fíric, ráfla agus tuairim a idirdhealú ó chéile agus é/í ag teacht ar chinneadh

english: discuss and practise a simple decision-making strategy
irish: straitéis shimplí chinnteoireachta a phlé agus a chleachtadh

english: acquire a growing sense of the importance of making informed decisions at many levels and identify some of the decisions he/she has to make
irish: mothú forásach a ghnóthú faoin tábhacht a bhaineann le cinntí eolacha a dhéanamh ar go leor leibhéal agus cuid de na cinntí a chaithfidh sé/sí a dhéanamh a aithint

english: understand sexual intercourse, conception and birth within the context of a committed, loving relationship
irish: caidreamh collaí, giniúint agus breith a thuiscint i gcomhthéacs caidrimh dhúthrachtaigh ghrámhair

english: understand how feelings help in understanding himself/herself
irish: an tslí ina gcuidíonn braistintí le féintuiscint a thuiscint

english: identify and learn about healthy ways to help him/her feel positive about himself/herself
irish: bealaí sláintiúla chun cuidiú leis/léi braistintí deimhneacha a bheith aige/aici mar gheall air/uirthi féin a aithint agus a fhoghlaim

english: identify and discuss the changes that are experienced in growing from child to adult
irish: na hathruithe a tharlaíonn agus é/í ag fás ó pháiste go duine fásta a aithint agus a phlé

english: explore patterns of development and growth, comparing present development with that at earlier stages: physical, social, emotional, intellectual and spiritual
irish: patrúin fhorbartha agus fháis a iniúchadh, ag cur forbairt láithreach i gcomparáid leis an bhforbairt ag céimeanna níos luaithe: fisiceach, sóisialta, mothúchánach, intleachtúil agus spioradálta

english: discuss the different types of love that exist and explore how love is portrayed and defined in music, films, books, magazines and other media
irish: na saghsanna difriúla grá atá ann a phlé, agus an tslí ina léirítear agus a sainmhínítear grá i gceol, i scannáin, i leabhair, in irisí agus i meáin eile a iniúchadh

english: discuss and practise how to express and cope with various feelings in an appropriate manner
irish: an tslí chun braistintí éagsúla a chur in iúl agus déileáil leo ar bhealach oiriúnach a phlé agus a chleachtadh

english: discuss and explore the responsibilities involved in being a parent and the emotional and physical maturity required to be a parent
irish: na freagrachtaí a bhíonn ar dhuine agus é/í ina t(h)uismitheoir agus an aibíocht mhothúchánach agus fhisiceach a bhíonn riachtanach le bheith ina t(h)uismitheoir a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: differentiate between needs and wants and recognise and explore the concept of delayed gratification
irish: riachtanais agus mianta a idirdhealú ó chéile agus coincheap an tsásaimh ar cairde a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: appreciate the need for individual space and privacy as he/she is growing and developing
irish: an gá le spás aonair agus le príobháid de réir mar a bhíonn sé/sí ag fás agus ag forbairt a léirthuiscint

english: acquire the ability and confidence to identify, discuss and explore a range of feelings, especially those that are difficult to express
irish: an cumas agus an mhuinín a ghnóthú chun raon braistintí, go háirithe iad siúd ar deacair iad a nochtadh, a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise unequal treatment of sexual roles and other issues in literature, advertising, drama, magazines and other media
irish: plé éagothrom le rólanna gnéasacha agus le saincheisteanna eile i litríocht, i bhfógraíocht, i ndrámaíocht, in irisí agus i meáin eile a aithint

english: identify the audiences at which different aspects of the media are aimed
irish: an lucht éisteachta a bhfuil gnéithe difriúla de na meáin chumarsáide dírithe air a aithint

english: explore various recreation and leisure activities as an alternative to watching television
irish: gníomhaíochtaí éagsúla caithimh aimsire agus scíthe a iniúchadh mar mhalairt ar bhreathnú ar an teilifís

english: explore the role of newspapers and other forms of print media in transmitting messages, the techniques used and the types of information included
irish: ról na nuachtán agus foirmeacha eile clóbhuailte i dtarchur teachtaireachtaí a iniúchadh, na teicníochtaí a úsáidtear agus na saghsanna eolais a bhíonn i gceist

english: explore and use some simple broadcasting, production and communication techniques
irish: roinnt teicníochtaí simplí craolacháin, léirithe agus cumarsáide a iniúchadh agus a úsáid

english: explore and understand how information is conveyed and practise relaying messages using a variety of methods
irish: an tslí ina n-aithrisítear eolas a iniúchadh agus a thuiscint agus tarchur teachtaireachtaí a chleachtadh, ag baint úsáide as modhanna éagsúla  teicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide, litir, teileafón, pictiúr, póstaer, comhartha, scannán, leabhar

english: become increasingly critical and discerning in his/her own attitude to advertising and the techniques used to promote products, life-styles and ideas
irish: bheith criticiúil grinn i gcónaí agus aireach maidir lena d(h)earcadh féin i leith na fógraíochta agus na dteicníochtaí a úsáidtear chun táirgí, stíleanna maireachtála agus idéanna a chur chun cinn

english: become aware of the different forms of advertising, its purpose and the messages it promotes
irish: éirí feasach ar na cineálacha difriúla fógraíochta, a cuspóirí agus na teachtaireachtaí a chuireann sí chun cinn

english: recognise and understand the role of the individual and various groups in the community
irish: ról an duine aonair agus grúpaí éagsúla sa phobal a aithint agus a thuiscint

english: recognise and explore the positive contributions made to the local community by various organisations, ethnic, social or community groups and individuals
irish: an chabhair dheimhneach a thugtar don phobal áitiúil ag eagraíochtaí éagsúla, ag grúpaí eitneacha, sóisialta nó pobail agus ag daoine aonair a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and acknowledge the various cultural, religious, ethnic or other groups that exist in a community or society and explore ways in which these differences can be respected
irish: na grúpaí éagsúla cultúrtha, reiligiúnacha, eitneacha nó eile atá i bpobal nó i sochaí a aithint agus glacadh leo agus bealaí inar féidir urraim a thabhairt do na héagsúlachtaí seo a iniúchadh

english: realise and begin to understand the unequal distribution of the worldÔÇÖs resources
irish: an dáileadh éagothrom atá ar acmhainní an domhain a aithint agus dul i gceann tuisceana air

english: practise ways of working together and of developing a sense of belonging
irish: slite chun oibriú le chéile agus chun mothú cumainn a fhorbairt a chleachtadh

english: identify some local issues of concern and explore possible action that could be taken to address these issues
irish: roinnt saincheisteanna is cúram don cheantar áitiúil a aithint agus gníomh a d'fhéadfaí a dhéanamh chun déileáil leis na saincheisteanna seo a iniúchadh

english: explore the concept of the class or school as a community
irish: an chabhair dheimhneach a thugtar don phobal áitiúil ag eagraíochtaí éagsúla, ag grúpaí eitneacha, sóisialta nó pobail agus ag daoine aonair a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: explore local traditions and folklore and develop a sense of pride in his/her local community
irish: traidisiúin agus béaloideas áitiúla a iniúchadh agus móráil as a p(h)obal áitiúil a fhorbairt

english: explore how justice and peace can be promoted between people and groups, both nationally and internationally
irish: an tslí chun ceart agus síocháin a chur chun cinn idir dhaoine is grúpaí, ar bhonn náisiúnta agus idirnáisiúnta, a iniúchadh

english: explore how inequality might exist in the local community and suggest ways in which this might be addressed
irish: an tslí ina bhféadfadh éagothromaíocht bheith sa phobal áitiúil a iniúchadh agus bealaí a bhféadfaí déileáil leis seo a mholadh

english: begin to explore the concept of democracy
irish: tosú ar choincheap an daonlathais a iniúchadh

english: become aware of some of the cultures, lifestyles and languages of some countries in the European Union and the wider world
irish: bheith feasach ar roinnt de na cultúir, na stíleanna maireachtála agus na teangacha atá i roinnt tíortha san Aontas Eorpach agus sa domhan mór

english: become aware of elements of his/her own cultural heritage and traditions
irish: éirí feasach ar ghnéithe dá (h)oidhreacht chultúrtha agus dá t(h)raidisiúin féin

english: appreciate the environment and develop a sense of individual and community responsibility for caring for the environment and being custodians of the Earth for future generations
irish: an t-imshaol a léirthuiscint agus glacadh le freagracht ar bhonn aonair agus pobail as cúram an imshaoil agus as bheith mar chaomhnóirí ar an Domhan ar mhaithe leis na glúine atá le teacht

english: listen actively to others and respect what each person has to say
irish: éisteacht go haireach le daoine eile agus urraim a thabhairt don mhéid a bhíonn le rá ag gach duine

english: identify and discuss various responses to conflict situations
irish: freagairt éagsúil ar thosca coimhlinte a aithint agus a phlé

english: explore and practise the many verbal and non-verbal ways in which people communicate with each other
irish: na bealaí iomadúla briathartha agus neamhbhriathartha ina ndéanann daoine cumarsáid le chéile a iniúchadh agus a chleachtadh

english: explore and practise how to handle conflict without being aggressive
irish: an chaoi le coimhlint a láimhsiú gan bheith ionsaitheach a iniúchadh agus a chleachtadh

english: examine the various ways in which language can be used to isolate and discriminate against people
irish: na slite éagsúla inar féidir teanga a úsáid chun daoine a aonrú nó chun leithcheal a dhéanamh orthu a scrúdú

english: examine the power of persuasion, how it can be used both positively and negatively, and suggest practical ways and develop practical suggestions for dealing with pressures and influences
irish: cumhacht an áitimh a scrúdú, conas is féidir é a úsáid ar mhodh deimhneach agus diúltach araon, agus bealaí praiticiúla a mholadh agus moltaí praiticiúla a fhorbairt chun déileáil le brúnna agus le tionchair

english: discuss how conflict can arise with different people and in different situations
irish: an tslí ina dtarlaíonn coimhlint le daoine difriúla agus i staideanna difriúla a phlé

english: begin to appreciate the importance of maintaining a personal stance while also respecting the beliefs, values and opinions of others
irish: tosú ar an tábhacht a bhaineann le seasamh pearsanta a dhéanamh ach fós urraim a thabhairt do chreidimh, do luachanna agus do thuairimí daoine eile a léirthuiscint

english: explore what belonging to a family means
irish: an bhrí atá le ballraíocht i dteaghlach a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss families and homes and how they can vary in many ways
irish: teaghlaigh agus bailte a iniúchadh agus a phlé agus mar is féidir leo bheith éagsúil ar go leor slite

english: examine some factors that can affect family life
irish: roinnt tosca ar féidir leo dul i gcion ar shaol an teaghlaigh a scrúdú

english: discuss possible changes in family relationships and expectations as he/she grows and matures and how he/she can cope with them
irish: athruithe is féidir a theacht ar chaidreamh agus ar dhóchas teaghlaigh de réir mar a fhásann agus mar a aibíonn sé/sí a phlé agus conas is féidir leis/léi déileáil leo

english: discuss and identify behaviour that is important for harmony in family life
irish: iompraíocht atá tábhachtach chun go mbeadh síth i saol an teaghlaigh a phlé agus a aithint

english: critically examine the media portrayals of families and family life
irish: léiriú na meán cumarsáide ar theaghlaigh agus ar shaol an teaghlaigh a scrúdú go léirmheastach

english: compare and contrast the life-styles of families in different cultures, both in Ireland and abroad
irish: stíleanna maireachtála teaghlach i gcultúir dhifriúla, in Éirinn agus thar lear araon, a chur i gcomparáid agus i gcodarsnacht

english: recognise, discuss and understand bullying and its effects
irish: bulaíocht agus a hiarmhairtí a aithint, a phlé agus a thuiscint

english: practise and recognise the importance of care and consideration, courtesy and good manners with others
irish: cúram agus cásmhaireacht, cúirtéis agus dea-bhéasa i dtaca le daoine eile a chleachtadh agus an tábhacht a bhaineann leo a aithint

english: identify the different groups to which friends can belong and recognise what constitutes a healthy group
irish: na grúpaí difriúla ar féidir le cairde bheith ina mbaill díobh a aithint agus bheith eolach ar cad is grúpa sláintiúil ann

english: explore the importance of friendship and interacting with others and realise that making and changing friends is part of the natural process of growing
irish: tábhacht cairdis agus idirghníomhaithe le daoine eile a iniúchadh agus a thuiscint gur cuid den phróiseas nádúrtha fáis é cairdeas a dhéanamh le daoine agus cairde a athrú

english: explore the differences between boy-and girl friendships and same-sex friendships
irish: na difríochtaí a bhaineann le cairdeas idir buachaill agus cailín agus cairdeas aonghnéis a iniúchadh

english: explore how the opinions, views or expectations of others can influence how people relate to each other, either positively or negatively
irish: an tslí inar féidir le tuairimí, dearcadh nó dóchas daoine eile dul i gcion ar an gcaidreamh idir dhaoine, ar bhealach deimhneach nó diúltach, a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss how individuals can deal with being bullied, knowing that others are being bullied and being a bully
irish: an tslí inar féidir le daoine aonair déileáil le bulaíocht bheith á himirt orthu a iniúchadh agus a phlé, fios a bheith acu go bhfuil bulaíocht á himirt ar dhaoine eile agus bheith ina b(h)ulaí

english: discuss and appreciate the different aspects of friendship and the difference between close friends and acquaintances
irish: na gnéithe difriúla den chairdeas a phlé agus a léirthuiscint agus an difríocht idir dlúthchairde agus lucht aitheantais

english: consider problems that can arise in friendships and other relationships and how these could be handled
irish: machnamh a dhéanamh ar fhadhbanna a d'fhéadfadh teacht i gceist i gcairdeas agus i gcaidreamh eile agus mar a d'fhéadfaí iad seo a láimhsiú

english: understand the reproductive system of both male and female adults
irish: an córas giniúna ag daoine fásta, idir fhireann agus bhaineann, a thuiscint

english: recognise the importance of treating his/her body and that of others with dignity and respect
irish: an tábhacht a bhaineann le caitheamh lena c(h)orp féin agus le coirp daoine eile le dínit is le meas a aithint

english: recognise some physical disabilities and how they can affect people's lives
irish: roinnt míchumas fisiceach a aithint agus an tionchar is féidir a bheith acu ar bheatha an duine

english: recognise some of the important nutrients that are necessary in a balanced diet and the food products in which they are found
irish: cuid de na cothaithigh thábhachtacha atá riachtanach i réim chothrom bia a aithint mar aon leis na táirgí bia ina bhfuil siad le fáil

english: recognise causes of personal worry and identify appropriate coping strategies
irish: na cúiseanna le himní phearsanta a aithint maille le straitéisí oiriúnacha chun an ceann is fearr a fháil orthu

english: recognise and examine behaviour that is conducive to health and that which is harmful to health
irish: iompraíocht a chuidíonn le sláinte agus í sin atá díobhálach do shláinte a aithint agus a scrúdú

english: realise that there is a personal and communal responsibility for the health and well-being of himself/herself and others
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil freagracht phearsanta agus chomhchoiteann air/uirthi as a s(h)láinte agus a f(h)olláine féin agus as cuid daoine eile

english: realise how increased activity or involvement in physical activities can require increased attention to body care
irish: a thuiscint conas a éilíonn gníomhaíocht bhreise nó páirtíocht i ngníomhaíochtaí fisiceacha aire bhreise i dtaca le cúram coirp

english: realise and accept some personal responsibility for making wise food choices and adopting a healthy, balanced diet
irish: glacadh le freagracht phearsanta as roghanna críonna bia a dhéanamh agus as réim shláintiúil chothrom bia a roghnú,agus í seo a thuiscint

english: identify and discuss the roles of various people who are concerned with the health of others
irish: rólanna daoine éagsúla atá gafa i sláinte daoine eile a aithint agus a phlé

english: identify and discuss the physical and other changes that occur in boys and girls with the onset of puberty and understand that these take place at different rates for everyone
irish: na hathruithe fisiceacha agus eile a tharlaíonn i mbuachaillí agus i gcailíní agus iad ag teacht chun caithreachais a aithint agus a phlé, agus a thuiscint go dtarlaíonn siad seo ag rátaí difriúla i gcás gach duine

english: identify and be aware of the different ways in which the body may be protected against disease and infection
irish: na bealaí difriúla inar féidir an corp a chosaint ar ghalar is ar ionfhabhtú a aithint agus a bheith feasach orthu

english: explore the role of personal choice, risk factors and the influence of others when choosing to use non-prescribed substances
irish: ról rogha pearsanta, tosca fiontair agus tionchar daoine eile nuair a thograítear substaintí a ghlacadh nach bhfuil ar oideas docthtúra a iniúchadh

english: explore the factors that influence food choices
irish: na tosca a théann i gcion ar roghanna bia a iniúchadh

english: explore some of the reasons why people smoke, drink alcohol, misuse any kind of substances or take drugs that have no medical use
irish: cuid de na cúiseanna a gcaitheann daoine tobac, a n-ólann siad alcól, a mbaineann siad mí-úsáid as aon saghas substainte nó a nglacann siad drugaí nach mbíonn feidhm leighis leo a iniúchadh

english: explore and examine some of the illnesses particularly associated with food intake or special health conditions
irish: roinnt de na breoiteachtaí a bhaineann go speisialta le glacadh bia nó le riochtaí speisialta sláinte a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: explore and examine attitudes towards the misuse of substances and towards those who misuse substances of any kind
irish: an dearcadh ar mhí-úsáid substaintí agus ar dhaoine a mhí-úsáideann substaintí d'aon saghas a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: distinguish between legal and illegal substances, identifying those that are most commonly used, and examine and understand the effects they can have
irish: idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir substaintí dleathacha agus neamhdhleathacha, na cinn is mó a bhíonn in úsáid agus na torthaí a bhíonn orthu a scrúdú agus a thuiscint

english: become aware of the importance of hygiene and care in the preparation and use of food
irish: éirí feasach ar thábhacht an tsláinteachais agus an chúraim in ullmhú agus in úsáid bia

english: become aware of some communicable diseases and explore how diseases and infections are spread
irish: éirí feasach ar chuid de na galair thógálacha agus an tslí ina scaiptear galair agus ionfhabhtuithe a iniúchadh

english: appreciate the importance of good nutrition for growing and developing and staying healthy
irish: tábhacht dea-chothaithe i dtaca le fás agus forbairt agus le fanacht sláintiúil a léirthuiscint

english: take increasing personal responsibility for himself/herself
irish: glacadh le freagracht phearsanta mhéadaitheach as/aisti féin

english: reflect on his/her experiences and the reasons for taking different courses of action
irish: machnamh a dhéanamh ar a (h)eispéiris féin agus ar na cúiseanna a ndéantar cineálacha éagsúla gnímh

english: recognise and appreciate that each person is a unique individual and that this individuality is expressed in many different ways
irish: a aithint agus a léirthuiscint gur duine ar leith é gach duine agus go gcuirtear an leithlí seo in iúl ar an-chuid slite difriúla

english: identify realistic personal goals and targets and the strategies required to reach these
irish: cuspóirí agus spriocanna réalaíocha pearsanta a aithint mar aon leis na straitéisí is riachtanach chun iad a bhaint amach

english: enhance skills to improve learning
irish: cur leis na scileanna a fheabhsóidh an fhoghlaim

english: develop further the ability to express personal opinions, thoughts and ideas and listen to, respect, think about and comment critically and constructively on the views of others
irish: forbairt bhreise a dhéanamh ar an gcumas ar thuairimí, smaointe agus idéanna pearsanta a chur in iúl, agus éisteacht le, meas a bheith aige/aice ar, machnamh a dhéanamh ar agus labhairt go criticiúil agus go cuiditheach faoi thuairimí daoine eile

english: become more independent and autonomous
irish: éirí níos neamhspleáiche agus níos féinrialaithí

english: accept his/her own body image and explore some of the factors that affect his/her selfimage and beliefs about himself/herself
irish: glacadh lena c(h)orpíomhá féin agus cuid de na tosca a théann i gcion ar a f(h)éiníomhá agus ar chreidimh mar gheall air/uirthi féin a iniúchadh

english: recognise places where it is safer to play and how to behave in a responsible manner when playing
irish: áiteanna atá níos sábháilte le haghaidh súgartha a aithint agus conas é/í féin a iompar ar bhealach freagrach le linn súgartha

english: realise that as independence increases, responsibility for personal safety increases, and that a strategy for keeping safe has to be developed and adhered to by each individual
irish: a thuiscint go bhfásann freagracht as sábháilteacht phearsanta de réir mar a fhásann neamhspleáchas, agus go gcaithfidh gach duine straitéis le é/í féin a choinneáil slán a fhorbairt agus cloí léi

english: know how to keep safe when travelling and to understand how individuals can keep others safe
irish: a bheith eolach ar conas fanacht slán le linn taistil agus a thuiscint conas is féidir le duine daoine eile a choimeád slán

english: identify the substances in the home and school or on the farm that may be dangerous if not used properly and ensure that he/she has learned a safety strategy for dealing with unknown and dangerous substances
irish: na substaintí sa bhaile, sa scoil nó ar an bhfeirm a d'fhéadfadh a bheith dainséarach mura n-úsáidtear i gceart iad a aithint, agus a chinntiú go bhfuil straitéis sábháilteachta foghlamtha aige/aici chun déileáil le substaintí anaithnide agus dainséaracha

english: identify situations and places that may threaten personal safety
irish: staideanna agus áiteanna a d'fhéadfadh sábháilteacht phearsanta a chur i mbaol a aithint

english: identify and explore some potential risks to health and safety in the environment
irish: cuid de na fiontair shláinte agus shábháilteachta a d'fhéadfadh a bheith san imshaol a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: explore rules and regulations at home, in school and in society and the importance of adhering to them
irish: rialacha sa bhaile, ar scoil agus sa tsochaí a iniúchadh agus a thábhachtaí atá sé go gcloífí leo

english: explore and examine the use of medicines
irish: úsáid leigheas a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: discuss and appreciate the role each individual has in keeping others safe and identify occasions when his/her actions can threaten the safety of others
irish: an ról atá ag gach duine maidir le daoine eile a choimeád slán a phlé agus a léirthuiscint agus ócáidí a bhféadfadh gníomhartha dá c(h)uid sábháilteacht daoine eile a chur i mbaol a aithint

english: discuss a variety of risky situations and behaviour and assess and evaluate how these risks may be avoided or minimised and the implications of taking risks
irish: raon de staideanna agus de chineálacha iompraíochta contúirtí a phlé agus bealaí chun na fiontair seo a sheachaint nó a laghdú a mheasúnú agus a luacháil chomh maith le himpleachtaí na fiontraíochta

english: develop responsible attitudes towards the prevention of accidents and know what to do in the event of an accident
irish: dearcadh freagrach maidir le timpistí a chosc a fhorbairt agus fios a bheith aige/aici cad is cóir a dhéanamh i gcás timpiste

english: develop an awareness of health and safety in the school, home and work-place
irish: feasacht faoi shláinte is faoi shábháilteacht sa scoil, sa bhaile agus sa láthair oibre a fhorbairt

english: recognise the important and legitimate role that adults have to play in making decisions and setting boundaries for young people
irish: an ról tábhachtach dlisteaneach atá le comhlíonadh ag daoine fásta i ndéanamh cinntí agus i socrú teorainneacha do dhaoine óga a aithint

english: recognise that opportunities to exercise choice can increase as responsibilities are accepted and as the trust of others is earned
irish: a aithint gur féidir méadú a theacht ar na deiseanna chun roghanna a dhéanamh de réir mar a ghlactar le freagrachtaí agus de réir mar a thuilltear iontaoibh daoine eile

english: recognise that decisions have consequences and that not all people will make the same decisions all the time
irish: a aithint go mbíonn iarmhairtí le cinntí agus nach ndéanann gach duine na cinntí céanna i gcónaí

english: identify sources of help in solving problems
irish: foinsí cabhrach chun fadhbanna a réiteach a aithint

english: explore and learn to examine critically the factors and levels of thought that influence decisions and choices
irish: na tosca agus na leibhéil smaoinimh a théann i gcion ar chinntí is ar roghanna a iniúchadh agus foghlaim conas iad a scrúdú go criticiúil

english: distinguish between assumption, inference, fact, rumour and opinion in making a decision
irish: foshuíomh, tátal, fíric, ráfla agus tuairim a idirdhealú ó chéile agus é/í ag teacht ar chinneadh

english: discuss and practise a simple decision-making strategy
irish: straitéis shimplí chinnteoireachta a phlé agus a chleachtadh

english: acquire a growing sense of the importance of making informed decisions at many levels and identify some of the decisions he/she has to make
irish: mothú forásach a ghnóthú faoin tábhacht a bhaineann le cinntí eolacha a dhéanamh ar go leor leibhéal agus cuid de na cinntí a chaithfidh sé/sí a dhéanamh a aithint

english: understand sexual intercourse, conception and birth within the context of a committed, loving relationship
irish: caidreamh collaí, giniúint agus breith a thuiscint i gcomhthéacs caidrimh dhúthrachtaigh ghrámhair

english: understand how feelings help in understanding himself/herself
irish: an tslí ina gcuidíonn braistintí le féintuiscint a thuiscint

english: identify and learn about healthy ways to help him/her feel positive about himself/herself
irish: bealaí sláintiúla chun cuidiú leis/léi braistintí deimhneacha a bheith aige/aici mar gheall air/uirthi féin a aithint agus a fhoghlaim

english: identify and discuss the changes that are experienced in growing from child to adult
irish: na hathruithe a tharlaíonn agus é/í ag fás ó pháiste go duine fásta a aithint agus a phlé

english: explore patterns of development and growth, comparing present development with that at earlier stages: physical, social, emotional, intellectual and spiritual
irish: patrúin fhorbartha agus fháis a iniúchadh, ag cur forbairt láithreach i gcomparáid leis an bhforbairt ag céimeanna níos luaithe: fisiceach, sóisialta, mothúchánach, intleachtúil agus spioradálta

english: discuss the different types of love that exist and explore how love is portrayed and defined in music, films, books, magazines and other media
irish: na saghsanna difriúla grá atá ann a phlé, agus an tslí ina léirítear agus a sainmhínítear grá i gceol, i scannáin, i leabhair, in irisí agus i meáin eile a iniúchadh

english: discuss and practise how to express and cope with various feelings in an appropriate manner
irish: an tslí chun braistintí éagsúla a chur in iúl agus déileáil leo ar bhealach oiriúnach a phlé agus a chleachtadh

english: discuss and explore the responsibilities involved in being a parent and the emotional and physical maturity required to be a parent
irish: na freagrachtaí a bhíonn ar dhuine agus é/í ina t(h)uismitheoir agus an aibíocht mhothúchánach agus fhisiceach a bhíonn riachtanach le bheith ina t(h)uismitheoir a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: differentiate between needs and wants and recognise and explore the concept of delayed gratification
irish: riachtanais agus mianta a idirdhealú ó chéile agus coincheap an tsásaimh ar cairde a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: appreciate the need for individual space and privacy as he/she is growing and developing
irish: an gá le spás aonair agus le príobháid de réir mar a bhíonn sé/sí ag fás agus ag forbairt a léirthuiscint

english: acquire the ability and confidence to identify, discuss and explore a range of feelings, especially those that are difficult to express
irish: an cumas agus an mhuinín a ghnóthú chun raon braistintí, go háirithe iad siúd ar deacair iad a nochtadh, a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: explore the different ways in which information can be transmitted and learn to be discerning and selective about this information, with particular regard to language, behaviour, authenticity and attitudes
irish: na slite difriúla inar féidir eolas a tharchur a iniúchadh agus foghlaim conas bheith grinn roghnaíoch faoin eolas seo, ag díriú aire ar leith ar theanga, iompraíocht, údaracht agus dhearcadh

english: explore and examine some issues that are frequently raised in the media, the way they are portrayed and the accuracy of these presentations
irish: roinnt saincheisteanna a ardaítear go minic sna meáin chumarsáide a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú, an tslí ina léirítear iad chomh maith le cruinneas na léirithe sin

english: discuss and explore television, radio, videos, computer games, the internet (worldwide web and e-mail) and other media
irish: an teilifís, an raidió, físeáin, cluichí ríomhaire, an t-idirlíon (an gréasán domhanda agus an ríomhphost) agus meáin eile a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: begin to explore some of the techniques that are used in marketing and advertising
irish: tosú ar roinnt de na teicníochtaí a úsáidtear i gcúrsaí margaíochta agus fógraíochta a iniúchadh

english: become aware of advertising and its purpose and nature
irish: éirí feasach ar fhógraíocht mar aon lena cuspóir agus a mianach

english: recognise how each person has both an individual and a communal responsibility to the community
irish: an tslí ina bhfuil freagracht phearsanta agus chomhchoiteann don phobal ar gach duine a aithint

english: realise what it means to belong to a group
irish: a thuiscint cad is ciall le bheith ina b(h)all de ghrúpa

english: play a role in deciding on classroom rules and discuss and examine the importance of adhering to the school code of behaviour and discipline
irish: ról a ghlacadh nuair a bhítear ag cinneadh ar rialacha an tseomra ranga agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le cloí le cód iompraíochta agus airíonachta na scoile a phlé agus a scrúdú

english: identify the people who constitute the school community and the role of individuals in contributing to the life of the school
irish: na daoine ar de phobal na scoile iad a aithint mar aon leis an gcaoi a gcuidíonn daoine aonair le saol na scoile

english: explore the various ways in which the school promotes a sense of belonging
irish: na slite éagsúla ina gcuireann an scoil mothú cumainn chun cinn a iniúchadh

english: explore some of the issues and concerns in the local or national community
irish: roinnt de na saincheisteanna agus de na cúraimí a bhaineann leis an bpobal áitiúil nó náisiúnta a iniúchadh

english: explore and recognise the rights and responsibilities of both adults and children in the school community
irish: cearta agus freagrachtaí daoine fásta agus páistí araon i bpobal na scoile a iniúchadh agus a aithint

english: examine the traditional roles that may be assigned to boys and girls in school because of their sex and become aware of ways of counteracting this stereotyping
