irish: na rólanna traidisiúnta a bhronntar ar bhuachaillí is ar chailíní sa scoil de bharr a ngnéis a scrúdú agus éirí feasach ar mhodhanna chun cur i gcoinne na mbuanchruthanna seo

english: examine how justice, fairness and equality may or may not be exemplified in a community
irish: an tslí inar féidir ceart, cothrom na Féinne agus cothromaíocht a bheith, nó gan a bheith, léirithe i bpobal a scrúdú

english: discuss the role of leaders and organisations that serve the community at different levels and the influence that they have
irish: ról ceannairí agus eagraíochtaí a fhreastalaíonn ar an bpobal ag léibhéil dhifriúla mar aon leis an tionchar a bhíonn acu a phlé

english: discuss and explore the concepts of sharing and co-operating and the ways in which they can be put into practice in an effective manner
irish: coincheapa na roinnte agus an chomhoibrithe a phlé agus a iniúchadh mar aon leis na slite inar féidir iad a chur i gcrích ar bhealach éifeachtach

english: develop and practise leadership roles and learn to work together in different group situations
irish: rólanna ceannaireachta a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh agus foghlaim conas oibriú le chéile i staideanna éagsúla grúpa

english: begin to develop an awareness of the lives and culture of some people in the European Union
irish: tús feasachta ar shaol agus ar chultúr roinnt daoine san Aontas Eorpach a fhorbairt

english: become aware of his/her own culture and recognise traditions, festivals and celebrations that are unique to the locality, region or country
irish: éirí feasach ar a c(h)ultúr féin agus traidisiúin, féilte agus ceiliúradh nach bhfuil le fáil ach sa dúiche, sa réigiún nó sa tír a aithint

english: be aware of the importance of mutual respect and sensitivity to the different values and attitudes held by others
irish: bheith feasach ar an tábhacht a bhaineann le meas agus mothálacht chomhalartach i dtaca leis na luachanna difriúla agus an dearcadh difriúil a bhíonn ag daoine eile

english: appreciate the diversity of people or groups within communities and the importance of mutual respect, empathy and understanding for living together in peace and harmony
irish: ilghnéitheacht na ndaoine nó na ngrúpaí laistigh de phobail a léirthuiscint agus a thábhachtaí atá sé go mbeadh meas, ionbhá agus tuiscint ag daoine ar a chéile le go mairfidís i bhfochair a chéile go síochánta agus go comhchuí

english: appreciate and respect the environment and learn that there is an individual and community responsibility in caring for the environment and protecting it for future generations
irish: an t-imshaol a léirthuiscint agus meas a bheith aige/aici air agus foghlaim go bhfuil freagracht ar bhonn aonair agus pobail ar gach duine as caomhnú an imshaoil agus as é a chosaint ar mhaithe leis na glúine atá le teacht

english: use language, gestures and other appropriate behaviour to perform social functions
irish: teanga, geáitsí agus iompraíocht oiriúnach eile a úsáid chun feidhmeanna sóisialta a chomhall

english: recognise and explore various verbal and non-verbal means of communicating
irish: bealaí briathartha agus neamhbhriathartha éagsúla cumarsáide a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and explore how language can be used to foster inclusiveness
irish: an tslí inar féidir teanga a úsáid chun comhpháirteachas a chur chun cinn a aithint

english: listen carefully and reflectively to others
irish: éisteacht go cúramach is go machnamhach le daoine eile

english: identify reasons for conflict in different situations
irish: cúiseanna coimhlinte i staideanna difriúla a aithint

english: identify and discuss various responses to conflict situations and decide on and practise those that are the most appropriate or acceptable
irish: bealaí éagsúla chun déileáil le hócáidí coimhlinte a aithint agus a phlé, cinneadh ar na cinn is oiriúnaí nó is inghlactha agus iad a chleachtadh

english: give and receive compliments and constructive criticism in different situations
irish: moladh agus léirmheas cuiditheach i suímh dhifriúla a thabhairt agus a ghlacadh

english: examine the power of persuasion in relating to others and identify times when it can be used positively and negatively
irish: cumhacht an áitimh agus teagmháil á déanamh le daoine eile a scrúdú, agus na hócáidí inar féidir é a úsáid go deimhneach nó go diúltach a aithint

english: understand that families often undergo planned or unplanned changes that may be pleasant or difficult
irish: a thuiscint go dtagann athruithe ar theaghlaigh, iad pleanáilte nó neamhphleanáilte, a d'fheádfadh a bheith taitneamhach nó a mhalairt ag aistriú tí, leanbh nua ag teacht ar an saol, bás baill áirithe, dífhostaíocht, fostaíocht nua, scaradh, tinneas

english: recognise that each member has a place and role in the family and contributes to the effective functioning of the family unit
irish: a aithint go bhfuil ionad agus ról sa teaghlach ag gach ball agus go gcuidíonn sé/sí le feidhmiú éifeachtach an teaghlaigh mar aonad

english: identify the behaviour that is important for harmony in families
irish: an iompraíocht atá tábhachtach chun go mbeadh síth i dteaghlaigh a aithint

english: explore how belonging to a family means that family members love, protect, provide and care for each other
irish: an bhaint atá ag ballraíocht i dteaghlach leis an ngrá, an chosaint, an soláthar agus an aire a thugann na baill dá chéile a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss different kinds of families, recognising that families vary in structure, in the way they communicate and in the way family members spend their time
irish: saghsanna difriúla teaghlaigh a iniúchadh agus a phlé, agus a aithint go mbíonn teaghlaigh difriúil maidir le struchtúr, leis an gcaoi a ndéanann siad cumarsáid agus leis an gcaoi a gcaitheann baill an teaghlaigh a gcuid ama

english: compare and contrast life-styles of families in urban and rural areas, in different countries, and in different cultures within and outside Ireland
irish: stíleanna maireachtála teaghlach sa chathair agus faoin tuath, i dtíortha éagsúla, agus i gcultúir dhifriúla laistigh agus lasmuigh d'Éirinn a chur i gcomparáid agus i gcodarsnacht lena chéile

english: respect and show consideration for the views, beliefs and values of others
irish: meas a bheith aige/aici ar thuairimí, chreidimh agus luachanna daoine eile agus bheith cásmhar iontu

english: recognise, discuss and understand bullying
irish: bulaíocht a aithint, a phlé agus a thuiscint

english: practise and recognise the importance of care and consideration, courtesy and good manners when interacting with others
irish: cúram agus cásmhaireacht, cúirtéis agus dea-bhéasa a chleachtadh agus an tábhacht a bhaineann leo le linn idirghníomhaíochta le daoine eile a aithint

english: explore the different aspects of friendship
irish: na gnéithe difriúla den chairdeas a iniúchadh

english: explore and examine ways of dealing with bullying
irish: slite chun déileáil le bulaíocht a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: examine different types of friendship
irish: saghsanna difriúla cairdis a scrúdú

english: begin to cope with disharmony in, or loss of, friendships
irish: tosú ar dhéileáil le heasaontas i gcairdeas nó le cailleadh cairdis

english: appreciate the need for and the importance of friendship and interacting with others
irish: an gá agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le cairdeas agus le hidirghníomhú le daoine eile a léirthuiscint

english: acknowledge that friends often circulate in groups, which can be healthy or unhealthy
irish: a aithint go dtéann cairde timpeall i ngrúpaí go minic agus go bhfeádfadh seo a bheith sláintiúil nó míshláintiúil

english: understand the physical changes taking place in both the male and female body
irish: na hathruithe fisiceacha atá ag tarlú sa chorp fireann agus sa chorp baineann a thuiscint

english: understand and explore the relationship between health and hygiene
irish: an gaol idir sláinte agus sláinteachas a thuiscint agus a iniúchadh

english: understand and appreciate what it means to be healthy and to have a balanced lifestyle
irish: an bhrí atá le bheith sláintiúil agus le stíl mhaireachtála chothrom a chleachtadh, a chiallú agus a léirthuiscint

english: recognise the wide choice of food available and categorise food into the four main food groups and their place on the food pyramid
irish: an rogha leathan bia atá ar fáil a aithint agus bia a rangú sna ceithre phríomhghrúpa bia mar aon lena n-ionad i bpirimid an bhia

english: recognise the adverse effects of sexual stereotyping and realise that these effects can become more exaggerated as the physical differences between males and females are more apparent
irish: na torthaí díobhálacha a bhíonn ar bhuanchruthú de réir gnéis a aithint agus a thuiscint go bhféadfadh na torthaí seo a bheith níos áibhéalta de réir mar a éiríonn na difríochtaí fisiceacha idir fir is mná níos soiléire

english: recognise and practise good personal hygiene, know how it is maintained and understand its importance in social interaction
irish: dea-shláinteachas pearsanta a aithint agus a chleachtadh, bheith eolach ar conas a choinnítear é agus a thábhacht in idirghíomhaíocht shóisialta a thuiscint

english: recognise and discuss some people who are concerned with health and welfare
irish: roinnt daoine a phléann le sláinte agus le leas ginearálta a aithint agus a phlé

english: realise the importance of caring for and treating his/her own body, and that of others, with dignity and respect
irish: an tábhacht a bhaineann le haire a thabhairt dá c(h)orp féin agus caitheamh lena c(h)orp féin, mar aon le coirp daoine eile, le dínit agus le meas, a thuiscint

english: realise that these changes do not occur at the same time but nonetheless are predictable and natural and that being different is normal
irish: a aithint nach dtarlaíonn na hathruithe seo ag an am céanna ach gur féidir iad a thuar agus go bhfuil siad nádúrtha mar sin féin, agus gur nádúrtha an rud é bheith difriúil

english: realise that each individual has some responsibility for his/her health and that this responsibility increases as he/she gets older
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil freagracht ar gach duine as a s(h)láinte féin agus go méadaíonn ar an bhfreagracht sin de réir mar a théann sé/sí in aois

english: know and understand the meaning of the word 'drug' and when it is appropriate or inappropriate to take drugs
irish: míniú an fhocail 'druga' a aithint agus a thuiscint agus cathain a bhíonn sé oiriúnach nó mí-oiriúnach drugaí a thógáil

english: identify and categorise a variety of substances that are taken into or onto the body into those that are helpful or harmful, legal or illegal
irish: substaintí ilghnéitheacha a thógtar isteach sa chorp nó a chuirtear ar an gcorp a aithint agus a rangú maidir leo siúd atá cabhrach nó díobhálach, dleathach nó mídhleathach

english: explore some factors that influence the consumption of different food products
irish: roinnt de na tosca a mbíonn tionchar acu ar thomhailt táirgí difriúla bia a iniúchadh

english: examine the dietary needs of his/her own age group and other groups in society
irish: riachtanais bhia a (h)aoisghrúpa féin mar aon le grúpaí eile sa tsochaí a scrúdú

english: discuss and examine the importance of proper food hygiene
irish: an tábhacht a bhaineann le sláinteachas ceart bia a phlé agus a scrúdú

english: differentiate between a healthy and an unhealthy diet and appreciate the role of balance and moderation
irish: idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir réim shláintiúil agus réim mhíshláintiúil bia agus ról na cothromaíochta agus na measarthachta a léirthuiscint

english: begin to develop strategies to cope with various worries or difficulties that he or she may encounter
irish: tosú ar straitéisí a fhorbairt chun déileáil le himní nó le deacrachtaí éagsúla a thiocfaidh roimhe/roimpi

english: be aware of the dangers in using tobacco or alcohol and explore the reasons why people may choose to smoke or drink
irish: bheith feasach ar an mbaol a bhaineann le húsáid tobac nó alcóil agus na cúiseanna go dtogródh daoine iad a úsáid a iniúchadh

english: recognise, describe and discuss individual personality traits, qualities, strengths, limitations, interests and abilities
irish: tréithe, cáilíochtaí, buanna, lochtanna, achair spéise agus tréithe pearsantachta ar leith a aithint, cur síos orthu agus iad a phlé

english: realise that each person has a unique contribution to make to various groups, situations and friendships
irish: a aithint go bhfuil cuidiú sainiúil le tabhairt ag gach duine do ghrúpaí, do shuímh agus do chairdis éagsúla

english: identify realistic personal goals and targets and how these can be achieved in the short or long term
irish: cuspóirí agus spriocanna pearsanta réalaíocha a aithint agus mar is féidir iad seo a chur i gcrích go gearrthéarmach agus go fadtéarmach

english: identify personal preferences, dreams for the future, and hopes
irish: roghnachas pearsanta, aislingí don todhchaí agus mianaidhmeanna a aithint

english: express personal opinions, feelings, thoughts and ideas with growing confidence
irish: tuairimí, braistintí, smaointe agus idéanna pearsanta a chur in iúl le muinín bhreise

english: explore the factors that influence his/her self-image
irish: na tosca a théann i gcion ar a f(h)éiníomhá a iniúchadh

english: enhance his/her own learning
irish: a c(h)uid foghlama féin a threisiú

english: become more confident in coping with change and with situations that are unfamiliar
irish: éirí níos féinmhuiníní agus é/í ag déileáil le hathrú agus le suímh nach bhfuil sé/sí ina dtaithí

english: become increasingly responsible and autonomous
irish: éirí freagrach agus neamhspleách diaidh ar ndiaidh

english: identify some potential risks to health and safety in the environment
irish: nithe san imshaol a chuirfeadh sláinte agus sábháilteacht i bhfiontar a aithint

english: identify people, places and situations that may threaten personal safety
irish: daoine, áiteanna agus staideanna a d'fhéadfadh sábháilteacht phearsanta a chur i mbaol a aithint

english: identify items or substances in the home or school that may be dangerous if not used properly and devise a safety strategy for dealing with them
irish: nithe nó substaintí sa bhaile nó sa scoil a d'fhéadfadh a bheith dainséarach mura n-úsáidtear i gceart iad a aithint agus straitéis sábháilteachta a chumadh chun déileáil leo

english: explore the rules and regulations that exist in school, at home and in society and the importance of adhering to these rules for keeping himself/herself and others safe
irish: na rialacha atá sa scoil, sa teaghlach agus sa tsochaí a iniúchadh agus cé chomh tábhachtach agus atá sé cloí leis na rialacha seo ar mhaithe lena s(h)ábháilteacht féin agus le sábháilteacht daoine eile

english: explore and examine the use of medicines
irish: úsáid leigheas a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: explore and examine how accidents are caused, identifying ways in which some of these can be prevented and the appropriate action to be taken if an accident or emergency occurs
irish: na nithe is cúis le timpistí a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú, bealaí a aithint lena bhféadfaí cuid díobh seo a sheachaint agus an gníomh oiriúnach ba chóir a dhéanamh i gcás timpiste nó éigeandála

english: begin to realise that as independence increases, responsibility for personal safety increases, and that a strategy for keeping safe with people has to be developed and adhered to by each individual
irish: dul i gceann tuisceana go bhfásann freagracht as sábháilteacht phearsanta de réir mar a fhásann neamhspleáchas, agus go gcaithfidh gach duine straitéis a choinneoidh slán é/í i bhfochair daoine eile a fhorbairt agus cloí leis

english: begin to assess the consequences of risky behaviour
irish: tosú ar thorthaí iompraíochta contúirtí a mheasúnú

english: be aware of potential travel hazards and the need for responsible behaviour when travelling
irish: a bheith feasach ar chontúirtí féideartha taistil agus ar an ngá le hiompraíocht fhreagrach le linn taistil

english: adopt responsible behaviour at play and know the appropriate safety measures to take while playing
irish: iompraíocht fhreagrach a chur i bhfeidhm le linn súgartha agus bheith eolach ar na modhanna oiriúnacha sábháilteachta ba chóir a chleachtadh le linn súgartha

english: recognise that opportunities to exercise choice can increase as responsibilities are accepted and as the trust of others is earned
irish: a aithint gur féidir méadú a theacht ar na deiseanna chun roghanna a dhéanamh de réir mar a ghlactar le freagrachtaí agus de réir mar a thuilltear iontaoibh daoine eile

english: recognise and explore the risks and the consequences of making a particular decision
irish: na fiontair agus na torthaí a bhaineann le cinneadh áirithe a dhéanamh a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and explore how the views, opinions, expectations and responses of others can influence personal decisions or actions
irish: an chaoi ar féidir le dearcadh, tuairimí, agus freagairt daoine eile dul i gcion ar chinntí nó ar ghníomhartha pearsanta a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: make individual and group decisions
irish: cinntí aonair agus cinntí grúpa a dhéanamh

english: learn and begin to devise a simple decision-making strategy
irish: straitéis shimplí cinnteoireachta a fhoghlaim agus tosú ar í a cheapadh

english: explore and discuss the factors that influence personal decisions and choices and the different levels of thought involved in making a decision
irish: na tosca a théann i gcion ar chinntí agus ar roghanna pearsanta a iniúchadh agus a phlé mar aon leis na leibhéil dhifriúla smaoinimh a bhíonn i gceist i ndéanamh cinnidh

english: discuss why and how adults can make decisions and set boundaries for young people
irish: an fáth agus an chaoi a ndéanann daoine fásta cinntí agus a gcuireann siad teorainneacha le daoine óga a phlé

english: become aware of and think about choices and decisions that he/she makes every day
irish: bheith feasach agus machnamhach maidir le roghanna agus cinntí a dhéanann sé/sí gach lá

english: talk about and reflect on a wide variety of feelings and emotions and the various situations where these may be experienced and how they may be expressed
irish: labhairt faoi agus machnamh a dhéanamh ar raon leathan braistintí agus mothúchán agus ar na suímh éagsúla ina n-aireofaí iad mar aon leis an tslí ina gcuirfí in iúl iad

english: recognise the emotional changes that have taken place since infancy
irish: na hathruithe mothúchánacha a tharla ó naíonacht i leith a aithint

english: recognise how spiritual development has taken place in recent years
recognise how independence and responsibilities are continually increasing
irish: a thuiscint conas a bhíonn neamhspleáchas agus freagrachtaí ag dul i méid i gcónaí

english: recognise and discuss how feelings and emotions are affected by the physical changes that take place at puberty*
irish: an tslí a mbíonn tionchar ag athruithe fisiceacha a tharlaíonn le linn caithreachais ar bhraistintí agus ar mhothúcháin a aithint agus a phlé*

english: realise that growing and changing are continuous throughout life
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil fás agus athrú leanúnach ar feadh an tsaoil

english: identify the skills and abilities acquired and the interests and pursuits taken up in recent years
irish: na scileanna agus an cumas atá gnóthaithe a aithint mar aon leis na hachair spéise agus an caitheamh aimsire a tógadh ar láimh le tamall de bhlianta anuas

english: identify the care that needs to be taken while waiting for a baby to be born
irish: a aithint cé chomh cúramach is a chaithfear a bheith nuair a bhítear ag fanacht le breith linbh

english: identify strong feelings and learn how to express and cope with these feelings in a socially appropriate manner
irish: braistintí tréana a aithint agus foghlaim conas iad a chur in iúl agus déileáil leo ar bhealach cuí sóisialta

english: identify and recognise the difference between needs and wants and come to realise that some rewards or experiences may be or should be postponed until later
irish: an difríocht idir riachtanais agus mianta a aithint agus a thuiscint de réir a chéile gur féidir nó gur cóir luachanna saothair agus eispéiris áirithe a chur ar athló go fóill

english: explore how feelings can influence one's life
irish: an tslí inar féidir le braistintí tionchar a imirt ar bheatha duine a iniúchadh

english: discuss the stages and sequence of development of the human baby, from conception to birth*
irish: céimeanna agus ord foráis an linbh dhaonna ó ghiniúint go breith a phlé

english: develop an appreciation of the wonder of a new-born baby
irish: léirthuiscint ar iontas an linbh nuashaolaithe a fhorbairt

english: begin to appreciate the need for space and privacy in life
irish: tosú ar an ngá le spás agus le príobháid sa saol a léirthuiscint

english: explore the different ways in which information can be transmitted and learn to be discerning and selective about this information, with particular regard to language, behaviour, authenticity and attitudes
irish: na slite difriúla inar féidir eolas a tharchur a iniúchadh agus foghlaim conas bheith grinn roghnaíoch faoin eolas seo, ag díriú aire ar leith ar theanga, iompraíocht, údaracht agus dhearcadh

english: explore and examine some issues that are frequently raised in the media, the way they are portrayed and the accuracy of these presentations
irish: roinnt saincheisteanna a ardaítear go minic sna meáin chumarsáide a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú, an tslí ina léirítear iad chomh maith le cruinneas na léirithe sin

english: discuss and explore television, radio, videos, computer games, the internet (worldwide web and e-mail) and other media
irish: an teilifís, an raidió, físeáin, cluichí ríomhaire, an t-idirlíon (an gréasán domhanda agus an ríomhphost) agus meáin eile a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: begin to explore some of the techniques that are used in marketing and advertising
irish: tosú ar roinnt de na teicníochtaí a úsáidtear i gcúrsaí margaíochta agus fógraíochta a iniúchadh

english: become aware of advertising and its purpose and nature
irish: éirí feasach ar fhógraíocht mar aon lena cuspóir agus a mianach

english: recognise how each person has both an individual and a communal responsibility to the community
irish: an tslí ina bhfuil freagracht phearsanta agus chomhchoiteann don phobal ar gach duine a aithint

english: realise what it means to belong to a group
irish: a thuiscint cad is ciall le bheith ina b(h)all de ghrúpa

english: play a role in deciding on classroom rules and discuss and examine the importance of adhering to the school code of behaviour and discipline
irish: ról a ghlacadh nuair a bhítear ag cinneadh ar rialacha an tseomra ranga agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le cloí le cód iompraíochta agus airíonachta na scoile a phlé agus a scrúdú

english: identify the people who constitute the school community and the role of individuals in contributing to the life of the school
irish: na daoine ar de phobal na scoile iad a aithint mar aon leis an gcaoi a gcuidíonn daoine aonair le saol na scoile

english: explore the various ways in which the school promotes a sense of belonging
irish: na slite éagsúla ina gcuireann an scoil mothú cumainn chun cinn a iniúchadh

english: explore some of the issues and concerns in the local or national community
irish: roinnt de na saincheisteanna agus de na cúraimí a bhaineann leis an bpobal áitiúil nó náisiúnta a iniúchadh

english: explore and recognise the rights and responsibilities of both adults and children in the school community
irish: cearta agus freagrachtaí daoine fásta agus páistí araon i bpobal na scoile a iniúchadh agus a aithint

english: examine the traditional roles that may be assigned to boys and girls in school because of their sex and become aware of ways of counteracting this stereotyping
irish: na rólanna traidisiúnta a bhronntar ar bhuachaillí is ar chailíní sa scoil de bharr a ngnéis a scrúdú agus éirí feasach ar mhodhanna chun cur i gcoinne na mbuanchruthanna seo

english: examine how justice, fairness and equality may or may not be exemplified in a community
irish: an tslí inar féidir ceart, cothrom na Féinne agus cothromaíocht a bheith, nó gan a bheith, léirithe i bpobal a scrúdú

english: discuss the role of leaders and organisations that serve the community at different levels and the influence that they have
irish: ról ceannairí agus eagraíochtaí a fhreastalaíonn ar an bpobal ag léibhéil dhifriúla mar aon leis an tionchar a bhíonn acu a phlé

english: discuss and explore the concepts of sharing and co-operating and the ways in which they can be put into practice in an effective manner
irish: coincheapa na roinnte agus an chomhoibrithe a phlé agus a iniúchadh mar aon leis na slite inar féidir iad a chur i gcrích ar bhealach éifeachtach

english: develop and practise leadership roles and learn to work together in different group situations
irish: rólanna ceannaireachta a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh agus foghlaim conas oibriú le chéile i staideanna éagsúla grúpa

english: begin to develop an awareness of the lives and culture of some people in the European Union
irish: tús feasachta ar shaol agus ar chultúr roinnt daoine san Aontas Eorpach a fhorbairt

english: become aware of his/her own culture and recognise traditions, festivals and celebrations that are unique to the locality, region or country
irish: éirí feasach ar a c(h)ultúr féin agus traidisiúin, féilte agus ceiliúradh nach bhfuil le fáil ach sa dúiche, sa réigiún nó sa tír a aithint

english: be aware of the importance of mutual respect and sensitivity to the different values and attitudes held by others
irish: bheith feasach ar an tábhacht a bhaineann le meas agus mothálacht chomhalartach i dtaca leis na luachanna difriúla agus an dearcadh difriúil a bhíonn ag daoine eile

english: appreciate the diversity of people or groups within communities and the importance of mutual respect, empathy and understanding for living together in peace and harmony
irish: ilghnéitheacht na ndaoine nó na ngrúpaí laistigh de phobail a léirthuiscint agus a thábhachtaí atá sé go mbeadh meas, ionbhá agus tuiscint ag daoine ar a chéile le go mairfidís i bhfochair a chéile go síochánta agus go comhchuí

english: appreciate and respect the environment and learn that there is an individual and community responsibility in caring for the environment and protecting it for future generations
irish: an t-imshaol a léirthuiscint agus meas a bheith aige/aici air agus foghlaim go bhfuil freagracht ar bhonn aonair agus pobail ar gach duine as caomhnú an imshaoil agus as é a chosaint ar mhaithe leis na glúine atá le teacht

english: use language, gestures and other appropriate behaviour to perform social functions
irish: teanga, geáitsí agus iompraíocht oiriúnach eile a úsáid chun feidhmeanna sóisialta a chomhall

english: recognise and explore various verbal and non-verbal means of communicating
irish: bealaí briathartha agus neamhbhriathartha éagsúla cumarsáide a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and explore how language can be used to foster inclusiveness
irish: an tslí inar féidir teanga a úsáid chun comhpháirteachas a chur chun cinn a aithint

english: listen carefully and reflectively to others
irish: éisteacht go cúramach is go machnamhach le daoine eile

english: identify reasons for conflict in different situations
irish: cúiseanna coimhlinte i staideanna difriúla a aithint

english: identify and discuss various responses to conflict situations and decide on and practise those that are the most appropriate or acceptable
irish: bealaí éagsúla chun déileáil le hócáidí coimhlinte a aithint agus a phlé, cinneadh ar na cinn is oiriúnaí nó is inghlactha agus iad a chleachtadh

english: give and receive compliments and constructive criticism in different situations
irish: moladh agus léirmheas cuiditheach i suímh dhifriúla a thabhairt agus a ghlacadh

english: examine the power of persuasion in relating to others and identify times when it can be used positively and negatively
irish: cumhacht an áitimh agus teagmháil á déanamh le daoine eile a scrúdú, agus na hócáidí inar féidir é a úsáid go deimhneach nó go diúltach a aithint

english: understand that families often undergo planned or unplanned changes that may be pleasant or difficult
irish: a thuiscint go dtagann athruithe ar theaghlaigh, iad pleanáilte nó neamhphleanáilte, a d'fheádfadh a bheith taitneamhach nó a mhalairt ag aistriú tí, leanbh nua ag teacht ar an saol, bás baill áirithe, dífhostaíocht, fostaíocht nua, scaradh, tinneas

english: recognise that each member has a place and role in the family and contributes to the effective functioning of the family unit
irish: a aithint go bhfuil ionad agus ról sa teaghlach ag gach ball agus go gcuidíonn sé/sí le feidhmiú éifeachtach an teaghlaigh mar aonad

english: identify the behaviour that is important for harmony in families
irish: an iompraíocht atá tábhachtach chun go mbeadh síth i dteaghlaigh a aithint

english: explore how belonging to a family means that family members love, protect, provide and care for each other
irish: an bhaint atá ag ballraíocht i dteaghlach leis an ngrá, an chosaint, an soláthar agus an aire a thugann na baill dá chéile a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss different kinds of families, recognising that families vary in structure, in the way they communicate and in the way family members spend their time
irish: saghsanna difriúla teaghlaigh a iniúchadh agus a phlé, agus a aithint go mbíonn teaghlaigh difriúil maidir le struchtúr, leis an gcaoi a ndéanann siad cumarsáid agus leis an gcaoi a gcaitheann baill an teaghlaigh a gcuid ama

english: compare and contrast life-styles of families in urban and rural areas, in different countries, and in different cultures within and outside Ireland
irish: stíleanna maireachtála teaghlach sa chathair agus faoin tuath, i dtíortha éagsúla, agus i gcultúir dhifriúla laistigh agus lasmuigh d'Éirinn a chur i gcomparáid agus i gcodarsnacht lena chéile

english: respect and show consideration for the views, beliefs and values of others
irish: meas a bheith aige/aici ar thuairimí, chreidimh agus luachanna daoine eile agus bheith cásmhar iontu

english: recognise, discuss and understand bullying
irish: bulaíocht a aithint, a phlé agus a thuiscint

english: practise and recognise the importance of care and consideration, courtesy and good manners when interacting with others
irish: cúram agus cásmhaireacht, cúirtéis agus dea-bhéasa a chleachtadh agus an tábhacht a bhaineann leo le linn idirghníomhaíochta le daoine eile a aithint

english: explore the different aspects of friendship
irish: na gnéithe difriúla den chairdeas a iniúchadh

english: explore and examine ways of dealing with bullying
irish: slite chun déileáil le bulaíocht a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: examine different types of friendship
irish: saghsanna difriúla cairdis a scrúdú

english: begin to cope with disharmony in, or loss of, friendships
irish: tosú ar dhéileáil le heasaontas i gcairdeas nó le cailleadh cairdis

english: appreciate the need for and the importance of friendship and interacting with others
irish: an gá agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le cairdeas agus le hidirghníomhú le daoine eile a léirthuiscint

english: acknowledge that friends often circulate in groups, which can be healthy or unhealthy
irish: a aithint go dtéann cairde timpeall i ngrúpaí go minic agus go bhfeádfadh seo a bheith sláintiúil nó míshláintiúil

english: understand the physical changes taking place in both the male and female body
irish: na hathruithe fisiceacha atá ag tarlú sa chorp fireann agus sa chorp baineann a thuiscint

english: understand and explore the relationship between health and hygiene
irish: an gaol idir sláinte agus sláinteachas a thuiscint agus a iniúchadh

english: understand and appreciate what it means to be healthy and to have a balanced lifestyle
irish: an bhrí atá le bheith sláintiúil agus le stíl mhaireachtála chothrom a chleachtadh, a chiallú agus a léirthuiscint

english: recognise the wide choice of food available and categorise food into the four main food groups and their place on the food pyramid
irish: an rogha leathan bia atá ar fáil a aithint agus bia a rangú sna ceithre phríomhghrúpa bia mar aon lena n-ionad i bpirimid an bhia

english: recognise the adverse effects of sexual stereotyping and realise that these effects can become more exaggerated as the physical differences between males and females are more apparent
irish: na torthaí díobhálacha a bhíonn ar bhuanchruthú de réir gnéis a aithint agus a thuiscint go bhféadfadh na torthaí seo a bheith níos áibhéalta de réir mar a éiríonn na difríochtaí fisiceacha idir fir is mná níos soiléire

english: recognise and practise good personal hygiene, know how it is maintained and understand its importance in social interaction
irish: dea-shláinteachas pearsanta a aithint agus a chleachtadh, bheith eolach ar conas a choinnítear é agus a thábhacht in idirghíomhaíocht shóisialta a thuiscint

english: recognise and discuss some people who are concerned with health and welfare
irish: roinnt daoine a phléann le sláinte agus le leas ginearálta a aithint agus a phlé

english: realise the importance of caring for and treating his/her own body, and that of others, with dignity and respect
irish: an tábhacht a bhaineann le haire a thabhairt dá c(h)orp féin agus caitheamh lena c(h)orp féin, mar aon le coirp daoine eile, le dínit agus le meas, a thuiscint

english: realise that these changes do not occur at the same time but nonetheless are predictable and natural and that being different is normal
irish: a aithint nach dtarlaíonn na hathruithe seo ag an am céanna ach gur féidir iad a thuar agus go bhfuil siad nádúrtha mar sin féin, agus gur nádúrtha an rud é bheith difriúil

english: realise that each individual has some responsibility for his/her health and that this responsibility increases as he/she gets older
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil freagracht ar gach duine as a s(h)láinte féin agus go méadaíonn ar an bhfreagracht sin de réir mar a théann sé/sí in aois

english: know and understand the meaning of the word 'drug' and when it is appropriate or inappropriate to take drugs
irish: míniú an fhocail 'druga' a aithint agus a thuiscint agus cathain a bhíonn sé oiriúnach nó mí-oiriúnach drugaí a thógáil

english: identify and categorise a variety of substances that are taken into or onto the body into those that are helpful or harmful, legal or illegal
irish: substaintí ilghnéitheacha a thógtar isteach sa chorp nó a chuirtear ar an gcorp a aithint agus a rangú maidir leo siúd atá cabhrach nó díobhálach, dleathach nó mídhleathach

english: explore some factors that influence the consumption of different food products
irish: roinnt de na tosca a mbíonn tionchar acu ar thomhailt táirgí difriúla bia a iniúchadh

english: examine the dietary needs of his/her own age group and other groups in society
irish: riachtanais bhia a (h)aoisghrúpa féin mar aon le grúpaí eile sa tsochaí a scrúdú

english: discuss and examine the importance of proper food hygiene
irish: an tábhacht a bhaineann le sláinteachas ceart bia a phlé agus a scrúdú

english: differentiate between a healthy and an unhealthy diet and appreciate the role of balance and moderation
irish: idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir réim shláintiúil agus réim mhíshláintiúil bia agus ról na cothromaíochta agus na measarthachta a léirthuiscint

english: begin to develop strategies to cope with various worries or difficulties that he or she may encounter
irish: tosú ar straitéisí a fhorbairt chun déileáil le himní nó le deacrachtaí éagsúla a thiocfaidh roimhe/roimpi

english: be aware of the dangers in using tobacco or alcohol and explore the reasons why people may choose to smoke or drink
irish: bheith feasach ar an mbaol a bhaineann le húsáid tobac nó alcóil agus na cúiseanna go dtogródh daoine iad a úsáid a iniúchadh

english: recognise, describe and discuss individual personality traits, qualities, strengths, limitations, interests and abilities
irish: tréithe, cáilíochtaí, buanna, lochtanna, achair spéise agus tréithe pearsantachta ar leith a aithint, cur síos orthu agus iad a phlé

english: realise that each person has a unique contribution to make to various groups, situations and friendships
irish: a aithint go bhfuil cuidiú sainiúil le tabhairt ag gach duine do ghrúpaí, do shuímh agus do chairdis éagsúla

english: identify realistic personal goals and targets and how these can be achieved in the short or long term
irish: cuspóirí agus spriocanna pearsanta réalaíocha a aithint agus mar is féidir iad seo a chur i gcrích go gearrthéarmach agus go fadtéarmach

english: identify personal preferences, dreams for the future, and hopes
irish: roghnachas pearsanta, aislingí don todhchaí agus mianaidhmeanna a aithint

english: express personal opinions, feelings, thoughts and ideas with growing confidence
irish: tuairimí, braistintí, smaointe agus idéanna pearsanta a chur in iúl le muinín bhreise

english: explore the factors that influence his/her self-image
irish: na tosca a théann i gcion ar a f(h)éiníomhá a iniúchadh

english: enhance his/her own learning
irish: a c(h)uid foghlama féin a threisiú

english: become more confident in coping with change and with situations that are unfamiliar
irish: éirí níos féinmhuiníní agus é/í ag déileáil le hathrú agus le suímh nach bhfuil sé/sí ina dtaithí

english: become increasingly responsible and autonomous
irish: éirí freagrach agus neamhspleách diaidh ar ndiaidh

english: identify some potential risks to health and safety in the environment
irish: nithe san imshaol a chuirfeadh sláinte agus sábháilteacht i bhfiontar a aithint

english: identify people, places and situations that may threaten personal safety
irish: daoine, áiteanna agus staideanna a d'fhéadfadh sábháilteacht phearsanta a chur i mbaol a aithint

english: identify items or substances in the home or school that may be dangerous if not used properly and devise a safety strategy for dealing with them
irish: nithe nó substaintí sa bhaile nó sa scoil a d'fhéadfadh a bheith dainséarach mura n-úsáidtear i gceart iad a aithint agus straitéis sábháilteachta a chumadh chun déileáil leo

english: explore the rules and regulations that exist in school, at home and in society and the importance of adhering to these rules for keeping himself/herself and others safe
irish: na rialacha atá sa scoil, sa teaghlach agus sa tsochaí a iniúchadh agus cé chomh tábhachtach agus atá sé cloí leis na rialacha seo ar mhaithe lena s(h)ábháilteacht féin agus le sábháilteacht daoine eile

english: explore and examine the use of medicines
irish: úsáid leigheas a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú

english: explore and examine how accidents are caused, identifying ways in which some of these can be prevented and the appropriate action to be taken if an accident or emergency occurs
irish: na nithe is cúis le timpistí a iniúchadh agus a scrúdú, bealaí a aithint lena bhféadfaí cuid díobh seo a sheachaint agus an gníomh oiriúnach ba chóir a dhéanamh i gcás timpiste nó éigeandála

english: begin to realise that as independence increases, responsibility for personal safety increases, and that a strategy for keeping safe with people has to be developed and adhered to by each individual
irish: dul i gceann tuisceana go bhfásann freagracht as sábháilteacht phearsanta de réir mar a fhásann neamhspleáchas, agus go gcaithfidh gach duine straitéis a choinneoidh slán é/í i bhfochair daoine eile a fhorbairt agus cloí leis

english: begin to assess the consequences of risky behaviour
irish: tosú ar thorthaí iompraíochta contúirtí a mheasúnú

english: be aware of potential travel hazards and the need for responsible behaviour when travelling
irish: a bheith feasach ar chontúirtí féideartha taistil agus ar an ngá le hiompraíocht fhreagrach le linn taistil

english: adopt responsible behaviour at play and know the appropriate safety measures to take while playing
irish: iompraíocht fhreagrach a chur i bhfeidhm le linn súgartha agus bheith eolach ar na modhanna oiriúnacha sábháilteachta ba chóir a chleachtadh le linn súgartha

english: recognise that opportunities to exercise choice can increase as responsibilities are accepted and as the trust of others is earned
irish: a aithint gur féidir méadú a theacht ar na deiseanna chun roghanna a dhéanamh de réir mar a ghlactar le freagrachtaí agus de réir mar a thuilltear iontaoibh daoine eile

english: recognise and explore the risks and the consequences of making a particular decision
irish: na fiontair agus na torthaí a bhaineann le cinneadh áirithe a dhéanamh a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and explore how the views, opinions, expectations and responses of others can influence personal decisions or actions
irish: an chaoi ar féidir le dearcadh, tuairimí, agus freagairt daoine eile dul i gcion ar chinntí nó ar ghníomhartha pearsanta a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: make individual and group decisions
irish: cinntí aonair agus cinntí grúpa a dhéanamh

english: learn and begin to devise a simple decision-making strategy
irish: straitéis shimplí cinnteoireachta a fhoghlaim agus tosú ar í a cheapadh

english: explore and discuss the factors that influence personal decisions and choices and the different levels of thought involved in making a decision
irish: na tosca a théann i gcion ar chinntí agus ar roghanna pearsanta a iniúchadh agus a phlé mar aon leis na leibhéil dhifriúla smaoinimh a bhíonn i gceist i ndéanamh cinnidh

english: discuss why and how adults can make decisions and set boundaries for young people
irish: an fáth agus an chaoi a ndéanann daoine fásta cinntí agus a gcuireann siad teorainneacha le daoine óga a phlé

english: become aware of and think about choices and decisions that he/she makes every day
irish: bheith feasach agus machnamhach maidir le roghanna agus cinntí a dhéanann sé/sí gach lá

english: talk about and reflect on a wide variety of feelings and emotions and the various situations where these may be experienced and how they may be expressed
irish: labhairt faoi agus machnamh a dhéanamh ar raon leathan braistintí agus mothúchán agus ar na suímh éagsúla ina n-aireofaí iad mar aon leis an tslí ina gcuirfí in iúl iad

english: recognise the emotional changes that have taken place since infancy
irish: na hathruithe mothúchánacha a tharla ó naíonacht i leith a aithint

english: recognise how spiritual development has taken place in recent years
recognise how independence and responsibilities are continually increasing
irish: a thuiscint conas a bhíonn neamhspleáchas agus freagrachtaí ag dul i méid i gcónaí

english: recognise and discuss how feelings and emotions are affected by the physical changes that take place at puberty*
irish: an tslí a mbíonn tionchar ag athruithe fisiceacha a tharlaíonn le linn caithreachais ar bhraistintí agus ar mhothúcháin a aithint agus a phlé*

english: realise that growing and changing are continuous throughout life
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil fás agus athrú leanúnach ar feadh an tsaoil

english: identify the skills and abilities acquired and the interests and pursuits taken up in recent years
irish: na scileanna agus an cumas atá gnóthaithe a aithint mar aon leis na hachair spéise agus an caitheamh aimsire a tógadh ar láimh le tamall de bhlianta anuas

english: identify the care that needs to be taken while waiting for a baby to be born
irish: a aithint cé chomh cúramach is a chaithfear a bheith nuair a bhítear ag fanacht le breith linbh

english: identify strong feelings and learn how to express and cope with these feelings in a socially appropriate manner
irish: braistintí tréana a aithint agus foghlaim conas iad a chur in iúl agus déileáil leo ar bhealach cuí sóisialta

english: identify and recognise the difference between needs and wants and come to realise that some rewards or experiences may be or should be postponed until later
irish: an difríocht idir riachtanais agus mianta a aithint agus a thuiscint de réir a chéile gur féidir nó gur cóir luachanna saothair agus eispéiris áirithe a chur ar athló go fóill

english: explore how feelings can influence one's life
irish: an tslí inar féidir le braistintí tionchar a imirt ar bheatha duine a iniúchadh

english: discuss the stages and sequence of development of the human baby, from conception to birth*
irish: céimeanna agus ord foráis an linbh dhaonna ó ghiniúint go breith a phlé

english: develop an appreciation of the wonder of a new-born baby
irish: léirthuiscint ar iontas an linbh nuashaolaithe a fhorbairt

english: begin to appreciate the need for space and privacy in life
irish: tosú ar an ngá le spás agus le príobháid sa saol a léirthuiscint

english: discuss and explore advertising that is specifically aimed at children
irish: fógraíocht a dhírítear go speisialta ar pháistí a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: begin to distinguish between fact and fiction in stories or situations in different media forms
irish: tosú ar idirdhealú a dhéanamh ar fhíricí agus fhicsean i scéalta nó suímh i bhfoirmeacha éagsúla de na meáin

english: become aware of and learn about the different ways in which information can be communicated
irish: éirí feasach ar na slite difriúla inar féidir eolas a chur in iúl agus foghlaim mar gheall orthu

english: recognise and write the name and location of his/her own school and identify those who constitute the school community
irish: ainm agus suíomh a scoile féin a aithint agus a scríobh agus iad siúd ar de phobal na scoile iad a aithint

english: identify those who have special responsibilities for looking after people in the community and the importance of the contribution of each individual to community life
irish: iad siúd a bhfuil freagracht faoi leith orthu as aire a thabhairt do dhaoine sa phobal a aithint mar aon le tábhacht na cabhrach a thugann an uile dhuine do shaol an phobail

english: explore what it means to belong and recognise some of the different groups to which he/she can belong
irish: an bhrí atá le bheith ina b(h)all de phobal na scoile a iniúchadh agus roinnt de na grúpaí éagsúla a bhféadfadh sé/sí bheith ina b(h)all díobh a aithint

english: engage in group activities in the class and learn how to share, co-operate, listen to, work and play together
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i ngníomhaíochtaí grúpa sa rang agus foghlaim conas roinnt, comhoibriú, éisteacht, saothrú agus súgradh le chéile

english: discuss and appreciate how the positive contributions of each person can make the class or school a better place for everyone
irish: an bealach ina bhféadfadh cúnamh deimhneach ón uile dhuine an rang nó an scoil a fheabhsú ar mhaithe le cách a phlé agus a léirthuiscint

english: develop an awareness of people in other places
irish: feasacht faoi dhaoine in áiteanna eile a fhorbairt

english: develop a sense of belonging to his/her own local community
irish: tuiscint a fhorbairt gur ball dá p(h)obal áitiúil féin é/í

english: begin to appreciate how people depend on each other in many aspects of life
irish: dul i gceann tuisceana ar an gcaoi a mbraitheann daoine ar a chéile in an-chuid gnéithe den saol

english: be involved in making the classroom rules and recognise the importance of adhering to these rules for the safety of all
irish: a bheith páirteach i gcumadh rialacha an tseomra ranga agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le cloí leis na rialacha seo ar mhaithe le sábháilteacht chách a aithint

english: be aware of and appreciate the diversity of cultures and people in the local community, recognise their contributions and be aware of how differences can enrich his/her experiences
irish: bheith feasach agus léirthuisceanach ar ilghnéitheacht na gcultúr is na ndaoine sa phobal áitiúil, an chabhair a thugann siad a aithint agus bheith feasach ar an gcaoi ar féidir le difríochtaí a (h)eispéiris féin a shaibhriú

english: appreciate the environment and realise that there is a community and individual responsibility in caring for and protecting the environment
irish: an t-imshaol a léirthuiscint agus a aithint go bhfuil freagracht ar bhonn pobail agus aonair ar gach duine as cúram agus cosaint an imshaoil

english: listen, hear and respond to what is being said by others
irish: éisteacht lena mbíonn á rá ag daoine eile, é a chloisteáil agus a fhreagairt

english: express and record experiences, opinions, feelings and emotions in a variety of ways
irish: eispéiris, tuairimí agus braistintí a chur in iúl agus a chlárú ar shlite éagsúla

english: explore and practise how to handle conflict without being aggressive
irish: an chaoi le coimhlint a láimhsiú gan bheith ionsaitheach a iniúchadh agus a chleachtadh

english: distinguish between verbal and non-verbal behaviour and know how they are used in performing social functions
irish: iompraíocht bhriathartha agus neamhbhriathartha a idirdhealú ó chéile agus mar a úsáidtear iad i gcomhlíonadh feidhmeanna sóisialta a thuiscint

english: recognise his/her role and place in the family unit and the contribution made by each member to the family
irish: a ról agus a (h)áit sa teaghlach a aithint mar aon leis an gcabhair a thugann gach ball den teaghlach

english: identify and talk about those who live at home and recognise that homes and families can vary
irish: iad siúd a chónaíonn sa bhaile a ainmniú agus labhairt fúthu agus a aithint nach ionann gach baile agus gach teaghlach

english: explore many of the things that are learned in families, both practical and otherwise
irish: go leor de na rudaí a fhoghlaimítear i dteaghlaigh, rudaí praiticiúla agus rudaí nach iad, a iniúchadh

english: appreciate his/her own family and identify ways in which members of families can help, support and care for each other
irish: a t(h)eaghlach féin a léirthuiscint agus bealaí a aithint inar féidir le baill teaghlaigh cabhrú agus tacú lena chéile agus aire a thabhairt dá chéile

english: recognise and explore bullying behaviour, who is involved and the effects on different people
irish: iompar bulaíochta, cé a bhíonn páirteach ann agus cén tionchar a bhíonn aige ar dhaoine éagsúla a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: know that bullying is always wrong and what should be done if one is being bullied or sees it happening to someone else
irish: a thuiscint go mbíonn bulaíocht i gcónaí olc agus a bheith feasach ar cad ba chóir a dhéanamh má bhíonn sé/sí á b(h)ulaíocht nó má fheiceann sé/sí á himirt ar dhuine eile í

english: know how to treat people with dignity and respect
irish: fios a bheith aige/aici conas déileáil le daoine le dínit is le meas

english: identify, explore and discuss qualities and skills associated with friendship
irish: cáilíochtaí agus scileanna atá bainteach le cairdeas a aithint, a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: explore how friends can influence personal actions and decisions
irish: an bealach inar féidir le cairde tionchar a imirt ar ghníomhartha is ar chinntí pearsanta a iniúchadh

english: discuss personal friends and why he/she enjoys being with them
irish: cairde pearsanta a phlé agus an fáth a mbaineann sé/sí taitneamh as bheith ina dteannta

english: recognise the importance of treating the body with respect and dignity
irish: a thábhachtaí atá sé caitheamh leis an gcorp le meas agus le dínit a aithint

english: recognise and practise good hygiene when dealing with food
irish: dea-shláinteachas a aithint agus a chleachtadh nuair a bhítear ag plé le bia

english: recognise and examine some of the substances that are taken into the body and the purpose and function of each one
irish: cuid de na substaintí a thógtar isteach sa chorp a aithint agus a scrúdú mar aon le gnó agus feidhm gach ceann díobh

english: realise that each individual must take some responsibility for self-care
irish: a aithint nach foláir do gach duine glacadh le freagracht áirithe as aire a thabhairt dó/di féin

english: name parts of the male and female body, using appropriate anatomical terms, and identify some of their functions
irish: codanna den chorp fireann is den chorp baineann a ainmniú, ag úsáid téarmaí anatamaíocha oiriúnacha, agus roinnt dá bhfeidhmeanna a aithint

english: identify some of the foods that are derived from plant and animal sources
irish: roinnt de na bianna a fhaightear as foinsí plandúla is ainmhíocha a aithint

english: explore the various things the body can do
irish: na rudaí éagsúla is féidir leis an gcorp a dhéanamh a iniúchadh

english: explore the importance of food for promoting growth, keeping healthy and providing energy
irish: tábhacht bia i gcothú fáis, i mbuanú sláinte agus i soláthar fuinnimh a iniúchadh

english: develop and practise basic hygiene skills
irish: scileanna bunúsacha sláinteachais a shaothrú agus a chleachtadh

english: become aware of how infection spreads easily and the importance of adhering to a code of hygiene
irish: éirí feasach ar chomh héasca agus a scaipeann galrú agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le cloí le cód sláinteachais

english: appreciate the need and understand how to care for the body in order to keep it strong and healthy
irish: an gá le haire a thabhairt dá c(h)orp féin a léirthuiscint agus conas aire a thabhairt dó a chiallú d'fhonn é a choimeád sláintiúil folláin

english: appreciate that balance, regularity and moderation are necessary in the diet
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil cothromaíocht, rialtacht agus measarthacht riachtanach sa réim bia

english: recognise and reflect on choices that are made every day
irish: roghanna a dhéantar gach lá a aithint agus machnamh a dhéanamh orthu

english: recognise and appreciate the similarities and differences between people
irish: na cosúlachtaí agus na difríochtaí idir dhaoine a aithint agus a léirthuiscint

english: realise that being involved in decisionmaking demands more personal responsibility
irish: a thuiscint go n-éilíonn páirtíocht i gcinnteoireacht níos mó freagrachta pearsanta

english: identify and talk about personal preferences, dreams for the future and hopes
irish: roghnachas pearsanta, aislingí don todhchaí agus mianaidhmeanna a aithint agus a phlé

english: express personal opinions and preferences and acknowledge those of others and comment on them
irish: tuairimí agus roghanna pearsanta a nochtadh agus cuid daoine eile a admháil agus labhairt fúthu

english: explore different ways of coping with change
irish: slite difriúla chun déileáil le hathrú a iniúchadh

english: discuss the factors that may influence personal decisions or choices
irish: na tosca a mbeadh tionchar acu ar chinnteoireacht nó roghanna pearsanta a phlé

english: develop an appreciation of and talk about personal strengths, abilities and characteristics
irish: léirthuiscint ar bhuanna, ar chumas agus ar thréithe pearsanta a fhorbairt agus labhairt mar gheall orthu

english: become more independent and self-reliant
irish: éirí níos neamhspleáiche agus níos féinmhuiníní

english: become aware of his/her immediate world through the senses
irish: a bheith feasach ar an saol mórthimpeall air/uirthi trí na céadfaí

english: recognise places where it is safe to play and understand the importance of adopting responsible and equitable behaviour when playing
irish: áiteanna atá sábháilte le haghaidh súgartha a aithint agus an tábhacht atá le roghnú iompraíochta atá freagrach agus cothrom le linn súgartha a thuiscint

english: recognise how accidents might be caused and what can be done in order to prevent accidents happening
irish: a aithint cad is ciontach le timpistí agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh chun iad a chosc

english: recognise and explore situations where children feel safe and those where safety might be at risk
irish: staideanna ina mbraitheann páistí sábháilte mar aon leo siúd ina bhféadfadh sábháilteacht bheith i bhfiontar a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and explore occasions when medicines are needed
irish: ócáidí a mbíonn gá le leighis a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: identify risky behaviour and examine its positive and negative consequences
irish: iompraíocht chontúirteach a aithint agus na torthaí deimhneacha is diúltacha a leanann í a scrúdú

english: explore how other people can persuade him/her to engage in unsafe behaviour and how this may be counteracted
irish: an tslí inar féidir le daoine eile a áiteamh air/uirthi páirt a ghlacadh in iompraíocht neamhshábháilte a iniúchadh agus conas is féidir é seo a chur ar ceal

english: distinguish between substances in the home or school that are safe and those that are dangerous and seek permission before exploring them
irish: substaintí sa bhaile nó ar scoil atá sábháilte a idirdhealú uatha sin atá dainséarach agus cead a lorg sula n-iniúchtar iad

english: discuss and practise appropriate strategies for dealing with these situations
irish: straitéisí oiriúnacha chun déileáil leis na staideanna seo a phlé agus a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise strategies for keeping safe when travelling
irish: straitéisí chun bheith sábháilte le linn taistil a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: become familiar with and understand the need to adhere to safety rules that apply in school, at home, on the farm, in water, for his/her own safety and that of others
irish: bheith eolach agus tuisceanach ar an ngá chun cloí le rialacha sábháilteachta a bhfuil feidhm acu sa scoil, sa bhaile, ar an bhfeirm, san uisce, ar mhaithe lena s(h ábháilteacht féin agus sábháilteacht daoine eile

english: recognise that individual actions can affect the feelings of others
irish: a aithint gur féidir le gníomhartha duine amháin tionchar a imirt ar bhraistintí daoine eile

english: realise the various roles parents and other family members have in providing for newborn babies
irish: na rólanna éagsúla atá ag tuismitheoirí agus ag baill eile teaghlaigh maidir le soláthar do naíonáin nuabheirthe a thuiscint

english: realise that growth takes place in many different ways and is unique to each individual
irish: a thuiscint go dtarlaíonn fás ar an-chuid slite difriúla agus gur rud sainiúil é i gcás gach duine

english: realise that growing up brings increased responsibility for himself/herself and others
irish: a thuiscint go mbíonn freagracht bhreise as/aisti féin agus as daoine eile mar thoradh ar bheith ag fás suas

english: realise and explore the various ways feelings can be expressed and dealt with and choose which are the most appropriate and acceptable
irish: na slite éagsúla inar féidir braistintí a chur in iúl agus déileáil leo a thuiscint agus a iniúchadh agus rogha a dhéanamh ar na nslite is oiriúnaí agus is so-ghlactha

english: name and identify a wide range of feelings and talk about and explore feelings in different situations
irish: raon leathan de bhraistintí a ainmniú agu a aithint agus braistintí a phlé agus a iniúchadh i dtosca éagsúla

english: identify people with whom he/she can discuss feelings and emotions
irish: daoine a aithint lena bhféadfadh sé/sí braistintí agus mothúcháin a phlé

english: explore the various feelings that change as one grows
irish: na mothúcháin éagsúla a athraíonn agus duine ag fás a iniúchadh

english: begin to understand that reproduction, birth, life, growth and death are all part of a life cycle
irish: dul i gceann tuisceana gur gnéithe den saolré uile iad síolrú, breith, beatha, fás agus bás

english: begin to recognise the physical, emotional, social and spiritual factors that promote growth
irish: tosú ar na tosca fisiceacha, mothúchánacha, sóisialta agus spioradálta a chuidíonn le fás a aithint

english: become aware of and be able to choose healthy ways of feeling good about himself/herself
irish: a bheith feasach ar, agus bheith in ann, bealaí folláine a roghnú chun bheith measúil air/uirthi féin

english: appreciate what is necessary in order to provide and care for new-born babies in both the animal and human world
irish: a bhfuil riachtanach chun soláthar do agus aire a thabhairt don naí nuabheirthe sa saol ainmhíoch agus daonna araon a thuiscint

english: discuss and explore advertising that is specifically aimed at children
irish: fógraíocht a dhírítear go speisialta ar pháistí a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: begin to distinguish between fact and fiction in stories or situations in different media forms
irish: tosú ar idirdhealú a dhéanamh ar fhíricí agus fhicsean i scéalta nó suímh i bhfoirmeacha éagsúla de na meáin

english: become aware of and learn about the different ways in which information can be communicated
irish: éirí feasach ar na slite difriúla inar féidir eolas a chur in iúl agus foghlaim mar gheall orthu

english: recognise and write the name and location of his/her own school and identify those who constitute the school community
irish: ainm agus suíomh a scoile féin a aithint agus a scríobh agus iad siúd ar de phobal na scoile iad a aithint

english: identify those who have special responsibilities for looking after people in the community and the importance of the contribution of each individual to community life
irish: iad siúd a bhfuil freagracht faoi leith orthu as aire a thabhairt do dhaoine sa phobal a aithint mar aon le tábhacht na cabhrach a thugann an uile dhuine do shaol an phobail

english: explore what it means to belong and recognise some of the different groups to which he/she can belong
irish: an bhrí atá le bheith ina b(h)all de phobal na scoile a iniúchadh agus roinnt de na grúpaí éagsúla a bhféadfadh sé/sí bheith ina b(h)all díobh a aithint

english: engage in group activities in the class and learn how to share, co-operate, listen to, work and play together
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i ngníomhaíochtaí grúpa sa rang agus foghlaim conas roinnt, comhoibriú, éisteacht, saothrú agus súgradh le chéile

english: discuss and appreciate how the positive contributions of each person can make the class or school a better place for everyone
irish: an bealach ina bhféadfadh cúnamh deimhneach ón uile dhuine an rang nó an scoil a fheabhsú ar mhaithe le cách a phlé agus a léirthuiscint

english: develop an awareness of people in other places
irish: feasacht faoi dhaoine in áiteanna eile a fhorbairt

english: develop a sense of belonging to his/her own local community
irish: tuiscint a fhorbairt gur ball dá p(h)obal áitiúil féin é/í

english: begin to appreciate how people depend on each other in many aspects of life
irish: dul i gceann tuisceana ar an gcaoi a mbraitheann daoine ar a chéile in an-chuid gnéithe den saol

english: be involved in making the classroom rules and recognise the importance of adhering to these rules for the safety of all
irish: a bheith páirteach i gcumadh rialacha an tseomra ranga agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le cloí leis na rialacha seo ar mhaithe le sábháilteacht chách a aithint

english: be aware of and appreciate the diversity of cultures and people in the local community, recognise their contributions and be aware of how differences can enrich his/her experiences
irish: bheith feasach agus léirthuisceanach ar ilghnéitheacht na gcultúr is na ndaoine sa phobal áitiúil, an chabhair a thugann siad a aithint agus bheith feasach ar an gcaoi ar féidir le difríochtaí a (h)eispéiris féin a shaibhriú

english: appreciate the environment and realise that there is a community and individual responsibility in caring for and protecting the environment
irish: an t-imshaol a léirthuiscint agus a aithint go bhfuil freagracht ar bhonn pobail agus aonair ar gach duine as cúram agus cosaint an imshaoil

english: listen, hear and respond to what is being said by others
irish: éisteacht lena mbíonn á rá ag daoine eile, é a chloisteáil agus a fhreagairt

english: express and record experiences, opinions, feelings and emotions in a variety of ways
irish: eispéiris, tuairimí agus braistintí a chur in iúl agus a chlárú ar shlite éagsúla

english: explore and practise how to handle conflict without being aggressive
irish: an chaoi le coimhlint a láimhsiú gan bheith ionsaitheach a iniúchadh agus a chleachtadh

english: distinguish between verbal and non-verbal behaviour and know how they are used in performing social functions
irish: iompraíocht bhriathartha agus neamhbhriathartha a idirdhealú ó chéile agus mar a úsáidtear iad i gcomhlíonadh feidhmeanna sóisialta a thuiscint

english: recognise his/her role and place in the family unit and the contribution made by each member to the family
irish: a ról agus a (h)áit sa teaghlach a aithint mar aon leis an gcabhair a thugann gach ball den teaghlach

english: identify and talk about those who live at home and recognise that homes and families can vary
irish: iad siúd a chónaíonn sa bhaile a ainmniú agus labhairt fúthu agus a aithint nach ionann gach baile agus gach teaghlach

english: explore many of the things that are learned in families, both practical and otherwise
irish: go leor de na rudaí a fhoghlaimítear i dteaghlaigh, rudaí praiticiúla agus rudaí nach iad, a iniúchadh

english: appreciate his/her own family and identify ways in which members of families can help, support and care for each other
irish: a t(h)eaghlach féin a léirthuiscint agus bealaí a aithint inar féidir le baill teaghlaigh cabhrú agus tacú lena chéile agus aire a thabhairt dá chéile

english: recognise and explore bullying behaviour, who is involved and the effects on different people
irish: iompar bulaíochta, cé a bhíonn páirteach ann agus cén tionchar a bhíonn aige ar dhaoine éagsúla a aithint agus a iniúchadh
