irish: dul i gceann tuisceana gur gnéithe den saolré uile iad síolrú, breith, beatha, fás agus bás

english: begin to recognise the physical, emotional, social and spiritual factors that promote growth
irish: tosú ar na tosca fisiceacha, mothúchánacha, sóisialta agus spioradálta a chuidíonn le fás a aithint

english: become aware of and be able to choose healthy ways of feeling good about himself/herself
irish: a bheith feasach ar, agus bheith in ann, bealaí folláine a roghnú chun bheith measúil air/uirthi féin

english: appreciate what is necessary in order to provide and care for new-born babies in both the animal and human world
irish: a bhfuil riachtanach chun soláthar do agus aire a thabhairt don naí nuabheirthe sa saol ainmhíoch agus daonna araon a thuiscint

english: realise that he/she receives information from many different sources
irish: a aithint go bhfaigheann sé/sí eolas ó anchuid foinsí difriúla

english: identify favourite television programmes, videos and video games and indicate reasons for preference
irish: na cláir theilifíse, na físeáin agus na físchluichí is ansa leis/léi a aithint agus cúiseanna leis na roghanna a chur in iúl

english: explore popular stories, books and rhymes and discuss some of the characters and their appealing traits
irish: scéalta, leabhair agus rímeanna coitianta a iniúchadh agus roinnt de na pearsana agus a dtréithe tarraingteacha a phlé

english: begin to use and explore the various kinds of information technology available
irish: tosú ar na saghsanna difriúla teicneolaíochta eolais atá ar fáil a úsáid agus a iniúchadh

english: begin to explore and talk about the difference between advertisements and programmes
irish: tosú ar iniúchadh agus díospóireacht a dhéanamh faoin difríocht idir fógraí agus cláir

english: suggest ways of helping other people at home, in school and in the local community
irish: slite a mholadh chun cabhrú le daoine eile sa bhaile, sa scoil agus sa phobal áitiúil

english: recognise the name of his/her own school and the people who contribute to the life of the school
irish: ainm a scoile féin a aithint mar aon leis na daoine a chuidíonn le gnáthshaol na scoile

english: recognise the importance of sharing and co-operating and being fair in all activities in the class and school
irish: a aithint go bhfuil comhoibriú agus roinnt tábhachtach maille le bheith cóir i ngach gníomhaíocht sa rang agus sa scoil

english: recognise that each person has an important contribution to make to the life of the community
irish: a aithint go bhfuil cabhair shuntasach le tabhairt ag gach duine do bheatha an phobail

english: recognise and become familiar with the rules within a group or wider community, those who safeguard these rules and the importance of obeying the rules in order to keep people safe
irish: na rialacha laistigh de ghrúpa nó de phobal níos leithne a aithint agus bheith eolach orthu, na daoine a chosnaíonn na rialacha seo agus an tábhacht a bhaineann le géilleadh do na rialacha ar mhaithe le sábháilteacht daoine

english: recognise and appreciate people or groups who serve the local community and how their contribution enhances the quality of life of others
irish: daoine nó grúpaí a fhreastalaíonn ar an bpobal áitiúil a aithint agus a léirthuiscint agus mar a threisíonn an chabhair athugann siad mianach beatha daoine eile

english: realise that each person is important and has a unique and valuable contribution to make to the class
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil gach duine tábhachtach agus go bhfuil a c(h)ion tairbhe uathúil luachmhar le déanamh aige/aici sa rang

english: realise and understand the necessity for adhering to the class and school rules
irish: an gá le rialacha an ranga agus na scoile a choinneáil a aithint agus a thuiscint

english: explore and respect the diversity of children in the class and school
irish: ilghnéitheacht na bpáistí sa rang agus sa scoil a iniúchadh agus ómós a thabhairt di

english: begin to become aware of local identity and to participate in and enjoy celebrating local events
irish: tosú ar fheasacht a ghnóthú ar chéannacht áitiúil agus páirt a ghlacadh i gceiliúradh imeachtaí áitiúla agus taitneamh a bhaint astu

english: appreciate the environment and realise that each individual has a community and individual responsibility for protecting and caring for the environment
irish: an t-imshaol a léirthuiscint agus a aithint go bhfuil freagracht ar bhonn pobail agus aonair ar gach duine as cosaint agus cúram an imshaol

english: use verbal and non-verbal behaviour to perform social functions
irish: iompraíocht bhriathartha agus neamhbhriathartha a úsáid chun feidhmeanna sóisialta a chomhlíonadh

english: resolve conflicts with others
irish: coimhlintí le daoine eile a réiteach

english: practise care and consideration, courtesy and good manners when interacting with others
irish: cúram agus aird, cúirtéis agus dea-bhéasa a chleachtadh le linn idirghníomhaíochta le daoine eile

english: listen and respond to the opinions and views of others
irish: éisteacht le tuairimí daoine eile agus iad a fhreagairt

english: realise that he/she belongs to a family and that each person has a place and role within a family
irish: a thuiscint gur ball de theaghlach é/í agus go bhfuil ionad agus ról ag gach duine laistigh de theaghlach

english: realise how families take care of, support and love each other
irish: a thuiscint conas a thugann teaghlaigh aire, tacaíocht agus grá dá chéile

english: identify and name the people who constitute a family and appreciate that all family units are not the same
irish: na daoine a chomhdhéanann teaghlach a aithint agus a ainmniú agus a thuiscint nach mar a chéile gach aonad teaghlaigh

english: explore the things that families do together
irish: na rudaí a dhéanann teaghlaigh in éineacht a iniúchadh

english: explore and acknowledge many of the things that can be learned in the home
irish: an-chuid dena nithe is féidir a fhoghlaim sa bhaile a iniúchadh agus a aithint

english: recognise and explore bullying behaviour, who is involved and the effects on different people
irish: iompar bulaíochta, cé a bhíonn páirteach ann agus cén tionchar a bhíonn aige ar dhaoine éagsúla a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: recognise and appreciate differences in people and know how to treat others with dignity and respect
irish: difríochtaí idir dhaoine a aithint agus a léirthuiscint agus bheith eolach ar conas déileáil le daoine eile le dínit is le meas

english: know that bullying is always wrong and know what should be done if one is being bullied or sees it happening to someone else
irish: a thuiscint go mbíonn bulaíocht i gcónaí olc agus a bheith feasach ar cad ba chóir a dhéanamh má bhíonn sé/sí á b(h)ulaíocht nó má fheiceann sé/sí á himirt ar dhuine eile í

english: identify, discuss and appreciate his/her own friends
irish: a c(h)airde féin a aithint, a phlé agus a mhórluacháil

english: identify and appreciate friends at school and how they can help and care for each other
irish: cairde scoile a aithint agus a mhórluacháil agus mar is féidir leo cabhrú lena chéile agus aire a thabhairt dá chéile

english: discuss and examine the different aspects of friendship
irish: na gnéithe difriúla den chairdeas a phlé agus a scrúdú

english: discuss and appreciate all those considered special, both within and outside the family circle
irish: na daoine uile a cheaptar a bheith speisialta, laistigh agus lasmuigh de mhuintir an teaghlaigh, a phlé agus a mhórluacháil

english: respect his/her own body and that of others
irish: meas a bheith aige/aici ar a c(h)orp féin agus ar choirp daoine eile

english: recognise and practise basic hygiene skills
irish: scileanna bunúsacha sláinteachais a aithint agus a chleachtadh

english: realise the importance of good hygiene when preparing food to eat
irish: tábhacht dea-shláinteachais agus bia á ullmhú chun ite a thuiscint

english: realise that each individual has some responsibility for taking care of himself/herself
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil roinnt freagrachta ar gach duine as aire a thabhairt dó/di féin

english: name parts of the male and female body, using appropriate anatomical terms
irish: codanna den chorp fireann is den chorp baineann a ainmniú, ag úsáid téarmaí anatamaíocha oiriúnacha

english: explore food preferences and their role in a balanced diet
irish: an bia is rogha leis/léi a iniúchadh mar aon lena ról i réim chothrom bia

english: explore and discuss the different things the body can do
irish: na rudaí éagsúla is féidir leis an gcorp a dhéanamh a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: discuss and explore some qualities and categories of food
irish: Roinnt cáilíochtaí agus aicmí bia a phlé agus a iniúchadh

english: become aware of the importance of food for growth and development
irish: a bheith feasach ar thábhacht bia le haghaidh fáis is forbartha

english: appreciate the need, and understand how to care for his/her own body in order to keep it healthy and well
irish: an gá atá le haire a thabhairt dá c(h)orp féin a léirthuiscint agus conas aire a thabhairt dó a chiallú d'fhonn é a choimeád sláintiúil folláin

english: recognise and record personal preferences
irish: roghanna pearsanta a aithint agus a chlárú

english: identify some everyday choices made by himself/herself and those that are made by others
irish: roinnt roghanna laethúla a dhéanann sé/sí féin a aithint mar aon leis na cinn a dhéanann daoine eile

english: express own views, opinions and preferences
irish: a t(h)uairimí, a d(h)earcadh agus a roghanna féin a chur in iúl

english: discuss and appreciate all the features that make a person special and unique
irish: na hairíonna uile is cúis le duine a bheith speisialta agus uathúil a phlé agus a léirthuiscint

english: begin to understand, appreciate and respect personal abilities, skills and talents
irish: tosú ar chumais, scileanna agus buanna pearsanta a chiallú, a léirthuiscint agus a mhórluacháil

english: begin to learn how to cope with various changes as they occur
irish: tús a chur le foghlaim conas déileáil le hathruithe difriúla de réir mar a tharlaíonn siad

english: begin to develop some awareness of factors that may influence decisions or choices taken
irish: tosú ar fheasacht a fhorbairt maidir le tosca a mbeadh tionchar acu ar chinntí nó ar roghanna a dhéanfaí

english: become more self-reliant and independent
irish: éirí níos féinmhuiníní agus níos neamhspheáiche

english: become aware of his/her immediate world through the senses
irish: a bheith feasach ar an saol mórthimpeall air/uirthi trí na céadfaí

english: realise that many substances used at home or in school are dangerous and that permission should be sought before exploring the contents
irish: a aithint go bhfuil go leor substaintí a bhíonn in úsáid sa bhaile nó sa scoil dainséarach agus gur chóir cead a lorg sula ndéanfaí an t-ábhar iontu a iniúchadh

english: realise how other people can persuade him/her to engage in unsafe behaviour
irish: a thuiscint conas is féidir le daoine eile a áiteamh air/uirthi páirt a ghlacadh in iompar baolach

english: realise and understand that rules are necessary in order to protect people and keep them safe
irish: a aithint agus a thuiscint go bhfuil gá le rialacha chun daoine a chosaint agus a choinneáil sábháilte

english: identify some of the substances or things that are put onto the body and their associated functions
irish: roinnt de na substaintí nó de na nithe a chuirtear ar an gcorp mar aon lena bhfeidhmeanna bainteacha a aithint

english: identify situations and places that are safe and those where personal safety might be at risk
irish: staideanna agus áiteanna atá sábháilte a aithint, chomh maith leo sin ina mbeadh sábháilteacht phearsanta i mbaol

english: identify people who are responsible for safety in the community and learn and practise safety strategies for crossing the road, using the bus or being a pedestrian
irish: daoine a aithint atá freagrach as sábháilteacht i measc an phobail agus straitéisí sábháilteachta a fhoghlaim agus a chleachtadh d'fhonn an bóthar a thrasnú, an bus a úsáid nó bheith mar choisí

english: explore occasions when medicines, injections or pills are needed and the safety rules that apply when taking medicine
irish: ócáidí mar a mbíonn gá le cógais, instealladh nó piollairí a iniúchadh chomh maith leis na rialacha sábháilteachta a bhíonn riachtanach nuair a bhíonn cógas á ghlacadh

english: explore how accidents might be prevented at home, in school, on the farm, or in the water
irish: conas d'fhéadfaí tionóiscí a chosc sa bhaile, ar scoil, ar an bhfeirm nó san uisce a iniúchadh

english: explore appropriate safety strategies
irish: straitéisí oiriúnacha sábháilteachta a iniúchadh

english: recognise that the ability to take responsibility for himself/herself and others increases as he/she grows older
irish: a aithint go méadaíonn ar an gcumas glacadh le freagracht as/aisti féin agus as daoine eile de réir mar a théann sé/sí in aois

english: realise that growth and change are part of the process of life and are unique to each individual
irish: a thuiscint gur cuid de phróiseas na beatha iad fás agus athrú agus go bhfuil siad seo uathúil i gcás gach duine

english: name a variety of feelings and talk about situations where these may be experienced
irish: mothúcháin ilghnéitheacha a ainmniú agus labhairt faoi staideanna ina bhféadfaí dul tríothu

english: identify what babies need to help them to grow and develop
irish: a aithint cad a theastaíonn ó leanaí chun cuidiú leo fás agus forbairt

english: identify some of the factors that promote growth
irish: cuid de na tosca a chuidíonn le fás a aithint

english: explore the variety of ways in which feelings are expressed and coped with
irish: na slite ilghnéitheacha ina ndéantar braistintí a chur in iúl agus a bharraíocht a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss occasions that can promote positive feelings in himself/herself
irish: ócáidí a dtig leis/léi mothúcháin dheimhneacha a chothú ann/inti féin a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: develop an awareness of human birth
irish: feasacht faoi bhreith dhaonna a fhorbairt

english: begin to be sensitive to the feelings of others and to realise that the actions of one individual can affect the feelings of another
irish: tús a chur le mothálacht maidir le mothúcháin daoine eile agus a thuiscint gur féidir le gníomhartha duine amháin tionchar a imirt ar bhraistintí duine eile

english: become aware of new life and birth in the world
irish: éirí feasach ar bheatha nua agus ar bhreith sa saol

english: realise that he/she receives information from many different sources
irish: a aithint go bhfaigheann sé/sí eolas ó anchuid foinsí difriúla

irish: éirí níos féinmhuiníní agus níos neamhspheáiche

english: become aware of his/her immediate world through the senses
irish: a bheith feasach ar an saol mórthimpeall air/uirthi trí na céadfaí

english: realise that many substances used at home or in school are dangerous and that permission should be sought before exploring the contents
irish: a aithint go bhfuil go leor substaintí a bhíonn in úsáid sa bhaile nó sa scoil dainséarach agus gur chóir cead a lorg sula ndéanfaí an t-ábhar iontu a iniúchadh

english: realise how other people can persuade him/her to engage in unsafe behaviour
irish: a thuiscint conas is féidir le daoine eile a áiteamh air/uirthi páirt a ghlacadh in iompar baolach

english: realise and understand that rules are necessary in order to protect people and keep them safe
irish: a aithint agus a thuiscint go bhfuil gá le rialacha chun daoine a chosaint agus a choinneáil sábháilte

english: identify some of the substances or things that are put onto the body and their associated functions
irish: roinnt de na substaintí nó de na nithe a chuirtear ar an gcorp mar aon lena bhfeidhmeanna bainteacha a aithint

english: identify situations and places that are safe and those where personal safety might be at risk
irish: staideanna agus áiteanna atá sábháilte a aithint, chomh maith leo sin ina mbeadh sábháilteacht phearsanta i mbaol

english: identify people who are responsible for safety in the community and learn and practise safety strategies for crossing the road, using the bus or being a pedestrian
irish: daoine a aithint atá freagrach as sábháilteacht i measc an phobail agus straitéisí sábháilteachta a fhoghlaim agus a chleachtadh d'fhonn an bóthar a thrasnú, an bus a úsáid nó bheith mar choisí

english: explore occasions when medicines, injections or pills are needed and the safety rules that apply when taking medicine
irish: ócáidí mar a mbíonn gá le cógais, instealladh nó piollairí a iniúchadh chomh maith leis na rialacha sábháilteachta a bhíonn riachtanach nuair a bhíonn cógas á ghlacadh

english: explore how accidents might be prevented at home, in school, on the farm, or in the water
irish: conas d'fhéadfaí tionóiscí a chosc sa bhaile, ar scoil, ar an bhfeirm nó san uisce a iniúchadh

english: explore appropriate safety strategies
irish: straitéisí oiriúnacha sábháilteachta a iniúchadh

english: recognise that the ability to take responsibility for himself/herself and others increases as he/she grows older
irish: a aithint go méadaíonn ar an gcumas glacadh le freagracht as/aisti féin agus as daoine eile de réir mar a théann sé/sí in aois

english: realise that growth and change are part of the process of life and are unique to each individual
irish: a thuiscint gur cuid de phróiseas na beatha iad fás agus athrú agus go bhfuil siad seo uathúil i gcás gach duine

english: name a variety of feelings and talk about situations where these may be experienced
irish: mothúcháin ilghnéitheacha a ainmniú agus labhairt faoi staideanna ina bhféadfaí dul tríothu

english: identify what babies need to help them to grow and develop
irish: a aithint cad a theastaíonn ó leanaí chun cuidiú leo fás agus forbairt

english: identify some of the factors that promote growth
irish: cuid de na tosca a chuidíonn le fás a aithint

english: explore the variety of ways in which feelings are expressed and coped with
irish: na slite ilghnéitheacha ina ndéantar braistintí a chur in iúl agus a bharraíocht a iniúchadh

english: explore and discuss occasions that can promote positive feelings in himself/herself
irish: ócáidí a dtig leis/léi mothúcháin dheimhneacha a chothú ann/inti féin a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: develop an awareness of human birth
irish: feasacht faoi bhreith dhaonna a fhorbairt

english: begin to be sensitive to the feelings of others and to realise that the actions of one individual can affect the feelings of another
irish: tús a chur le mothálacht maidir le mothúcháin daoine eile agus a thuiscint gur féidir le gníomhartha duine amháin tionchar a imirt ar bhraistintí duine eile

english: become aware of new life and birth in the world
irish: éirí feasach ar bheatha nua agus ar bhreith sa saol

english: recognise that some materials decay naturally while others survive a long time in the environment
irish: a aithint go seargann ábhair áirithe go nádúrtha siúd is go maireann cuid eile san imshaol ar feadh i bhfad

english: recognise that materials can be in solid, liquid or gas form
irish: a aithint gur féidir ábhair a bheith soladach, leachtach nó gásach

english: recognise that a gas, such as air, occupies space, has mass and exerts pressure
irish: a thuiscint go líonann gás ar nós aeir spás, go bhfuil 'mais' aige agus go gcuireann sé brú i bhfeidhm

english: identify how materials are used
irish: na dóigheanna a n-úsáidtear ábhair a aithint

english: identify and investigate a widening range of common materials in the immediate environment
irish: raon forásach d'ábhair choitianta sa gharthimpeallacht a aithint agus a imscrúdú

english: group materials according to their properties and/or composition
irish: ábhair a ghrúpáil de réir a n-airíonna nó a gcomhdhéanaimh

english: explore the origins of these materials
irish: foinsí na n-ábhar sin a iniúchadh

english: become aware that air is composed of different gases
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil an t-aer comhdhéanta de gháis dhifriúla

english: become aware of some of the practical applications of these gases in everyday life
irish: eolas a chur ar chuid de na feidhmeanna praiticiúla atá leis na gáis seo sa ghnáthshaol

english: recognise that oxygen is required for burning
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil ocsaigin riachtanach le haghaidh dóite

english: recognise how heating and cooling can be used to preserve food
irish: a aithint cé mar is féidir téamh agus fuarú a úsáid chun bia a leasú

english: Mixing, separating and other changes
irish: meascadh, scaradh agus athruithe eile

english: investigate the effects of light, air and water on materials
irish: tionchair solais, aeir agus uisce ar ábhair a imscrúdú

english: investigate how a wide range of materials may be changed by mixing
irish: mar is féidir raon leathan ábhar a athrú trí mheascadh a imscrúdú

english: identify ways in which homes and buildings are heated and insulated
irish: a aithint cé na bealaí a ndéantar foirgnimh a théamh agus a insliú

english: explore the effects of heating and cooling on a range of solids, liquids and gases
irish: tionchair théite agus fhuaraithe ar raon solad, leachtanna agus gáis a iniúchadh

english: explore some simple ways in which materials may be separated
irish: bealaí simplí a bhféadfaí ábhair a dheighilt óna chéile a iniúchadh

english: experiment to establish which materials are good conductors of heat or good insulators
irish: turgnaimh a dhéanamh chun na hábhair ar seoltóirí nó inslitheoirí maithe teasa iad a aithint

english: examine the changes that take place in materials when physical forces are applied
irish: na hathruithe a tharlaíonn in ábhair nuair a chuirtear fórsaí fisiceacha i bhfeidhm orthu a imscrúdú

english: understand some ways in which plants reproduce
irish: cuid de na bealaí a ndéanann plandaí atáirgiú a thuiscint

english: recognise that there is a great diversity of plants and animals in different regions and environments
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara go mbíonn éagsúlacht mhór i measc na bplandaí agus na n-ainmhithe i réigiúin agus in imshaoil dhifriúla

english: observe, identify and examine the animals and plants that live in local habitats and environments
irish: na hainmhithe agus na plandaí a mhaireann i ngnáthóga agus in imshaoil áitiúla a bhreathnú, a aithint agus a scrúdú

english: observe and explore some ways in which plant and animal behaviour is influenced by, or adapted to, environmental conditions
irish: cuid de na bealaí a dtagann iompraíocht plandaí agus ainmhithe faoi thionchar an imshaoil nó in oiriúint dó a bhreathnú agus a iniúchadh

english: investigate the factors that affect plant growth
irish: na fachtóirí a théann i gcion ar fhás a imscrúdú

english: identify the interrelationships and interdependence between plants and animals in local and other habitats
irish: idirghaolta agus idirspleáchas na bplandaí agus na n-ainmhithe i ngnáthóga áitiúla agus i ngnáthóga eile a aithint

english: group and compare living things into sets according to their similarities and differences
irish: dúile beo a ghrúpáil le chéile i dtacair agus a chur i gcomparáid le chéile de réir a gcosúlachtaí agus a ndifríochtaí

english: develop an increasing awareness of plants and animals from wider environments
irish: feasacht ar phlandaí agus ainmhithe imshaol eile a fhorbairt

english: construct and use simple keys to identify locally occurring species of plants and animals
irish: eochracha simplí a dhéanamh agus a úsáid chun speicis na bplandaí agus na n-ainmhithe a mhaireann sa timpeallacht a aithint

english: become familiar with the characteristics of some major groups of living things
irish: feasacht i dtaobh tréithe cuid de phríomhghrúpaí na ndúl beo a fhorbairt

english: become aware of the sun as a source of energy for plants through photosynthesis
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara gur foinse fuinnimh do phlandaí í an ghrian trí fhótaishintéis

english: become aware of some of the basic life processes in animals and plants
irish: feasacht ar chuid de phróisis bhunúsacha bheatha ainmhithe agus plandaí a fhorbairt

english: identify and understand ways in which the body protects itself against disease and infection
irish: na bealaí a gcosnaíonn an corp é féin in aghaidh galair agus galraithe a aithint agus a thuiscint

english: Human life processes
irish: Próisis na beatha daonna

english: develop an understanding of the reproductive systems of both male and female and of the physical changes taking place in both male and female during growth to adulthood
irish: tuiscint a fhorbairt ar chórais atáirgthe an fhireannaigh agus an bhaineannaigh agus ar na hathruithe a thagann ar fhireannaigh agus ar bhaineannaigh araon le linn caithrithe

english: develop a simple understanding of the structure of some of the body's major internal and external organs
irish: tuiscint shimplí a fhorbairt ar struchtúr cuid de phríomhbhaill inmheánacha an choirp

english: develop a simple understanding of food and nutrition
irish: tuiscint shimplí a fhorbairt ar bhia agus ar chothú

english: become aware of and investigate breathing
irish: feasacht ar análú a fhorbairt agus an t-análú féin a imscrúdú

english: recognise the contribution of scientists to society
irish: ar chuir eolaithe le leas na sochaí a aithint

english: recognise and investigate aspects of human activities that may have positive or adverse effects on environments
irish: gníomhaíochtaí daonna a bhféadfadh deathionchar nó droch-thionchar a bheith acu ar imshaoil a aithint agus a imscrúdú

english: examine some ways that science and technology have contributed positively to the use of the Earth's resources
irish: roinnt bealaí inar chuir eolaíocht agus teicneolaíocht go dearfach le húsáid acmhainní an Domhain a iniúchadh

english: appreciate the application of science and technology in familiar contexts
irish: tosú ar úsáid eolaíochta agus teicneolaíochta i gcomhthéacsanna coitianta a iniúchadh agus a léirthuiscint

english: identify positive aspects of natural and built environments through observation, discussion and recording
irish: gnéithe dearfacha imshaol nádúrtha agus imshaol tógtha a aithint trí bhreathnú, trí phlé agus trí chlárú

english: foster an appreciation of the ways in which people use the Earth's resources
irish: léirthuiscint ar na bealaí ina n-úsáideann daoine acmhainní an Domhain a chothú

english: explore some examples of the interrelationship of living and non-living aspects of local and other environments
irish: roinnt samplaí de chomhghaol eilimintí beo agus eilimintí neamh-bheo san imshaol áitiúil agus in imshaoil eile a iniúchadh

english: come to appreciate the need to conserve resources
irish: an léirthuiscint a shealbhú gur gá acmhainní a chaomhnú

english: become aware of the importance of the Earth's renewable and non-renewable resources
irish: éirí feasach ar thábhacht acmhainní inathnuaite agus neamh-inathnuaite an Domhain

english: participate in activities that contribute to the enhancement of the environment
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i ngníomhaíochtaí a chuireann le feabhsú an imshaoil

english: identify and discuss a local, national or global environmental issue
irish: saincheist faoi imshaol áitiúil, náisiúnta nó domhanda a aithint agus a phlé

english: come to appreciate individual, community and national responsibility for environmental care
irish: léirthuiscint a ghnóthú ar an bhfreagracht atá ar an duine, ar an bpobal agus ar an tír as cúram imshaoil

english: understand and explore how different sounds may be made by making a variety of materials vibrate
irish: an chaoi ar féidir fuaimeanna difriúla a dhéanamh trí ábhair éagsúla a chur ar crith a thuiscint agus a thaighde

english: recognise and identify a variety of sounds in the environment and appreciate the importance of noise control
irish: fuaimeanna éagsúla san imshaol a thabhairt faoi deara agus a aithint agus an tábhacht atá le torann a rialú a thuiscint

english: learn that sound is a form of energy
irish: a fhoghlaim gur cineál amháin fuinnimh í fuaim

english: explore how sound travels through materials
irish: mar a thaistealaíonn fuaim trí ábhair áirithe níos fearr ná mar a dhéanann trí ábhair eile a iniúchadh

english: design and make simple woodwind instruments
irish: gaothuirlisí adhmaid a dhearadh agus a dhéanamh

english: appreciate the importance of hearing
irish: tábhacht na héisteachta a léirthuiscint

english: learn that magnets can push or pull magnetic materials
irish: a fhoghlaim gur féidir le maighnéid ábhair mhaighnéadacha a shá nó a tharraingt

english: learn about electrical energy
irish: foghlaim faoi fhuinneamh leictreach

english: investigate how magnets may be made
irish: an chaoi a ndéantar maighnéid a imscrúdú

english: investigate current electricity by constructing simple circuits
irish: sruthleictreachas a imscrúdú trí chiorcaid shimplí a thógáil

english: explore the use of magnets to lift and hold objects
irish: úsáid maighnéad chun nithe a ardú agus a choinneáil a iniúchadh

english: become aware of how some common electrical appliances work
irish: mar a oibríonn roinnt áirithe gléasanna leictreacha coitianta a thuiscint

english: become aware of and understand the dangers of electricity
irish: feasacht ar na contúirtí a bhaineann le leictreachas agus tuiscint orthu a fhorbairt

english: understand the role of sunlight in photosynthesis and appreciate that the sun gives us heat and light without which people and animals could not survive
irish: ról sholas na gréine i bhfótaisintéis a thuiscint agus a mheabhrú go dtugann an ghrian teas agus solas dúinn nárbh fhéidir le daoine maireachtáil ina n-éagmais

english: learn that light is a form of energy
irish: a fhoghlaim gur cineál amháin fuinnimh é solas

english: know that light travels from a source
irish: a thuiscint go dtaistealaíonn solas ó fhoinse amach

english: investigate the splitting and mixing of light
irish: scoilt agus meascadh solais a imscrúdú

english: investigate the refraction of light
irish: athraonadh solais a imscrúdú

english: investigate how mirrors and other shiny surfaces are good reflectors of light
irish: a imscrúdú gur frithchaiteoirí maithe solais iad scátháin agus dromchlaí lonracha eile

english: explore how objects may be magnified using simple lens or magnifier
irish: úsáid lionsaí agus méadaitheoírí simplí eile chun rudaí a mhéadú a iniúchadh

english: be aware of the dangers of excessive sunlight
irish: bheith feasach ar an gcontúirt a ghabhann le barraíocht solais ghréine

english: appreciate the importance of sight
irish: tábhacht radharc na súl a thuiscint

english: recognise a variety of sources of heat
irish: foinsí éagsúla teasa a aithint

english: measure and record temperature using thermometer
irish: teocht a thomhas agus a chlárú agus teirmiméadar a úsáid chuige sin

english: know that heat energy can be transferred
irish: a thuiscint gur féidir fuinneamh teasa a thraschur

english: experiment with a range of materials to establish that heat may be transferred in different ways
irish: turgnaimh a dhéanamh le raon d'ábhair lena bhunú gur féidir teas a thraschur i mbealaí éagsúla

english: identify and explore how objects and materials may be moved
irish: na slite a d'fhéadfaí rudaí agus ábhair a bhogadh a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: explore the effect of friction on movement and how it may be used to slow or stop moving objects
irish: an tionchar a bhíonn ag frithchuimilt ar ghluaiseacht agus a húsáid chun rudaí atá ag gluaiseacht a mhoilliú nó a stopadh a iniúchadh

english: explore how levers may be used to help lift different objects
irish: úsáid luamhán mar chabhair chun rudaí difriúla a ardú a iniúchadh

english: explore how friction can generate heat
irish: an chaoi ar féidir le frithchuimilt teas a ghiniúint a iniúchadh

english: come to appreciate that gravity is a force
irish: a thuiscint gur fórsa í domhantarraingt

english: become aware that objects have weight because of the pull of gravity
irish: a thuiscint go bhfuil meáchan ag nithe i ngeall ar dhomhantarraingt

irish: gnéithe dearfacha imshaol nádúrtha agus imshaol tógtha a aithint trí bhreathnú, trí phlé agus trí chlárú

english: come to appreciate the need to conserve resources
irish: an léirthuiscint a shealbhú gur gá acmhainní a chaomhnú

english: become aware of the importance of the Earth's renewable and non-renewable resources
irish: éirí feasach ar thábhacht acmhainní inathnuaite agus neamh-inathnuaite an Domhain

english: realise that there is a personal and community responsibility for taking care of the environment
irish: a aithint go bhfuil an fhreagracht ar gach aon duine agus ar an bpobal i gcoitinne cúram a dhéanamh den imshaol

english: identify and discuss a local, national or global environmental issue
irish: saincheist faoi imshaol áitiúil, náisiúnta nó domhanda a aithint agus a phlé

english: examine a number of ways in which the local environment could be improved or enhanced
irish: roinnt bealaí a iniúchadh a bhféadfaí an t-imshaol áitiúil a fheabhsú

english: understand and explore how different sounds may be made by making a variety of materials vibrate
irish: an chaoi ar féidir fuaimeanna difriúla a dhéanamh trí ábhair éagsúla a chur ar crith a thuiscint agus a thaighde

english: recognise and identify a variety of sounds in the environment
irish: fuaimeanna éagsúla sa timpeallacht a thabhairt faoi deara agus a aithint

english: learn that sound is a form of energy
irish: a fhoghlaim gur cineál amháin fuinnimh í fuaim

english: explore the fact that sound travels through materials
irish: a iniúchadh go ngluaiseann fuaim níos fearr trí ábhair áirithe seachas a chéile

english: design and make a range of simple string instruments using an increasing variety of tools and materials
irish: raon d'uirlisí téad simplí a dhearadh agus a dhéanamh, ag baint leasa as uirlisí agus as ábhair éagsúla

english: observe the effects of static electricity on everyday things in the environment
irish: an tionchar a bhíonn ag leictreachas statach ar rudaí coitianta sa timpeallacht a bhreathnú

english: learn that magnets can push or pull magnetic materials
irish: a fhoghlaim gur féidir le maighnéid ábhair mhaighnéadacha a shá nó a tharraingt

english: learn about electrical energy
irish: foghlaim faoi fhuinneamh leictreach

english: investigate that magnets attract certain materials through other materials
irish: a imscrúdú go n-oibríonn tarraingt maighnéad ar ábhair áirithe trí ábhair eile

english: investigate current electricity by constructing simple circuits
irish: sruthleictreachas a imscrúdú trí chiorcaid shimplí a thógáil

english: explore the relationship between magnets and compasses
irish: na gaolta idir maighnéid agus compáis a iniúchadh

english: explore the effects of static electricity
irish: tionchair leictreachais stataigh a iniúchadh

english: explore how magnets have poles and investigate how these poles attract and repel each other
irish: a iniúchadh go bhfuil poil ag maighnéid agus mar a tharraingíonn agus mar a n-éarann na poil seo a chéile a imscrúdú

english: examine and group materials as conductors (those that conduct electricity) and insulators (those that do not allow electricity to pass through)
irish: ábhair a scrúdú agus a rangú ina seoltóirí (ábhair a sheolann leictreachas) agus ina n-inslitheoirí (ábhair nach scaoileann leictreachas tríothu féin)

english: examine and classify objects and materials as magnetic and non-magnetic
irish: rudaí agus ábhair a scrúdú agus a rangú de réir mar a bheadh siad maighnéadach nó neamh-mhaighnéadach

english: become aware of the dangers of electricity
irish: feasacht a fhorbairt ar na contúirtí a ghabann le leictreachas

english: recognise that the sun gives us heat and light, without which people and animals could not survive
irish: a thuiscint go dtugann an ghrian teas agus solas dúinn agus nach bhféadfadh daoine ná ainmhithe maireachtáil dá n-éagmais

english: recognise that light comes from different natural and artificial sources
irish: a aithint go dtagann solas ó fhoinsí nádúrtha agus saorga difriúla

english: learn that light is a form of energy
irish: a fhoghlaim gur cineál amháin fuinnimh é solas

english: investigate the relationships between light and materials
irish: na gaolta atá idir solas agus ábhair a imscrúdú

english: investigate that light can be broken up into many different colours
irish: a imscrúdú gur féidir solas a bhriseadh in go leor dathanna difriúla

english: be aware of the dangers of looking directly at the sun
irish: bheith feasach ar na contúirtí a ghabhann le breathnú go díreach ar an ngrian

irish: a aithint gurb í an ghrian príomhfhoinse theas na cruinne

irish: a thuiscint gur miosúr é teocht de chomh te agus atá rud éigin

irish: athruithe teochta a thomhas agus teirmiméadar a úsáid chuige sin

irish: an teocht a thomhas i mbaill éagsúla sa seomra ranga, sa scoil agus san imshaol, na tomhais a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile agus na cúiseanna le difríochtaí eatarthu a thaighde

english: learn that heat can be transferred
irish: a fhoghlaim gur féidir teas a thraschur

english: identify ways in which homes, buildings and materials are heated
irish: bealaí a ndéantar tithe cónaithe, foirgnimh agus ábhair a théamh a aithint bruthairí, citil, radaitheoirí leictreacha

english: investigate the pushing force of water
irish: sáfhórsa uisce a imscrúdú

english: investigate falling objects
irish: rudaí a iniúchadh agus iad ag titim

irish: a iniúchadh conas roinnt rudaí a bheadh ag gluaiseacht a mhoilliú

irish: na slite a bhféadfaí rudaí a bhogadh a iniúchadh

english: explore how levers may be used to help lift different objects
irish: úsáid luamhán mar chabhair chun rudaí difriúla a ardú a iniúchadh

irish: ábhair a shúnn uisce agus ábhair atá uiscedhíonach a aithint agus a imscrúdú

irish: ábhair a ghrúpáil de réir a n-airíonna

english: describe and compare materials, noting the differences in colour, shape and texture
irish: cur síos ar ábhair agus iad a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile, agus difríochtaí datha, crutha agus uigeachta eatarthu a thabhairt faoi deara

english: begin to distinguish between natural and manufactured materials

english: recognise that trees are plants
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara gur phlandaí iad crainn

english: recognise and describe the parts of some living things
irish: codanna roinnt áirithe dúl beo a aithint agus cur síos orthu

irish: mar a fhreagraíonn plandaí do sholas a imscrúdú

english: group and sort living things into sets according to certain characteristics

irish: raon de chnaguirlisí simplí a dhearadh agus a dhéanamh

irish: maighnéid, agus iad éagsúil ó thaobh méid agus crutha, a úsáid i súgradh feidhmiúil chun a dtionchar ar ábhair éagsúla a iniúchadh

irish: a imscrúdú go dtarraingíonn maighnéid ábhair mhaighnéadacha ar nós iarainn agus cruach chucu féin

english: investigate that magnets attract certain materials through other materials
irish: a imscrúdú go n-oibríonn tarraingt maighnéad ar ábhair áirithe trí ábhair eile

irish: roinnt gaireas tí a úsáideann leictreachas a aithint

english: explore the effects of static electricity
irish: tionchair leictreachais stataigh a iniúchadh

english: become aware of the uses of electricity in school and at home
irish: feasacht a fhorbairt ar na húsáidí a bhaintear as leictreachas sa bhaile agus ar scoil

english: become aware of the dangers of electricity
irish: feasacht a fhorbairt ar na contúirtí a ghabann le leictreachas

english: recognise that the sun gives us heat and light, without which we could not survive
irish: a thuiscint go dtugann an ghrian teas agus solas agus nach bhféadfaimis maireachtáil dá n-éagmais

english: recognise that light is needed in order to see
irish: a aithint gur gá solas chun rudaí a fheiceáil

english: recognise that light comes from different sources
irish: a aithint go dtagann solas ó fhoinsí éagsúla

english: investigate the relationship between light and materials
irish: an gaol idir solas agus ábhair a imscrúdú

english: become aware of the dangers of looking directly at the sun
irish: a thuiscint chomh contúirteach agus atá sé breathnú díreach ar an ngrian

english: measure and compare temperatures in different places in the classroom, school and environment
irish: an teocht a thomhas i mbaill éagsúla ar fud an tseomra ranga, na scoile agus na timpeallachta agus na toisí a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile

english: learn that temperature is a measurement of how hot something is
irish: fhoghlaim gur tomhas é teocht de chomh te agus atá rud éigin

english: become aware of different sources of heat energy
irish: feasacht a fhorbairt ar fhoinsí difriúla fuinnimh teasa

irish: an chaoi a ngluaiseann rudaí mar bhréagáin ar chineálacha difriúla ábhar agus dromchlaí a thabhairt faoi deara agus a imscrúdú

english: investigate how forces act on objects
irish: mar a oibríonn fórsaí ar rudaí a iniúchadh

english: explore how objects may be moved by pushing and pulling
irish: a iniúchadh gur féidir rudaí a bhogadh trí bhrú agus trí tharraingt

english: become aware of and explore how moving water and moving air can make things move
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara agus a iniúchadh gur féidir le huisce agus le haer atá ag gluaiseacht rudaí a bhogadh

irish: raon d'ábhair choitianta sa gharthimpeallacht a thabhairt faoi deara agus a iniúchadh

irish: bheith feasach ar ghnáthúsáidí roinnt ábhar coitianta

irish: ábhair a imscrúdú féachaint an bhfuil airíonna áirithe acu, mar shampla

irish: ábhair a ghrúpáil de réir critéar áirithe

english: describe and compare materials, noting the differences in the colour, shape and texture
irish: cur síos ar ábhair agus iad a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile, agus difríochtaí datha, crutha agus uigeachta a thabhairt faoi deara

irish: ábhair a bhreathnú agus cur síos orthu nuair is fliuch dóibh agus nuair is tirim dóibh

irish: roinnt áirithe ábhar atá uiscedhíonach a aithint

english: explore the effects of water on a variety of materials
irish: tionchair uisce ar ábhair éagsúla

irish: dúile beo a shórtáil agus a chnuasach i dtacair

irish: baill bheatha an fhireannaigh agus an bhaineannaigh a aithint

irish: ullmhú le haghaidh campála

irish: raon scileanna rothaíochta a shaothrú

irish: tabhairt faoi dhúshláin fhisiceacha

irish: tabhairt faoi ghníomhaíochtaí comhair (iontaoibhe)

irish: tabhairt faoi chosán eachtraíochta

irish: tabhairt faoi threodóireacht scórála

irish: tabhairt faoi threodóireacht ó phointe go pointe

irish: tabhairt faoi chúrsa réalt-treodóireachta ó chuimhne

irish: luail a bhreathnú, cur síos a dhéanamh uirthi agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

irish: preabadh, eitilt agus tuirlingt dea-rialaithe a léiriú

irish: grúp-shraitheanna a tháirgeadh

irish: raon scileanna a chleachtadh agus a chomhall

irish: gníomhú coirp a fheabhsú maidir le tréithiúlacht, go háirithe síneadh coirp, teannas coirp agus soiléireacht corpchrutha

irish: cluichí a cheapadh agus a fhorbairt i dteannta páirtí nó grúpa bhig

irish: a d(h)amhsa féin agus damhsa daoine eile (damhsóirí gairmiúla san áireamh, iad beo nó ar thaifead físe) a bhreathnú, cur síos a dhéanamh orthu agus iad a phlé

irish: meon nó mothúchán a chonacthas i ndamhsa a chiallú

irish: na teicníochtaí a úsáidtear i ndamhsa agus foirm an damhsa a aithint

english: become aware of local organisations and community groups involved in dance and opportunities in the community to participate in dance
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí áitiúla agus ar ghrúpaí sa phobal a bhfuil baint acu le damhsa, agus ar na deiseanna atá ar fáil sa phobal chun bheith páirteach i ndamhsa

english: show increased poise, balance, control and co-ordination while moving and stopping
irish: stáidiúlacht, cothromaíocht, rialú agus comhordú sa bhreis a léiriú le linn gluaiseachta agus stoptha

english: perform to music showing increasing sensitivity to rhythms, phrasing, style (music of different cultures, different times), dynamics (getting louder or softer) and form (binary, ternary)
irish: damhsa a dhéanamh le tionlacan ceoil agus mothálacht bhreise a léiriú maidir le rithimí, míriú, stíl (ceol ó chultúir dhifriúla, ó thréimhsí difriúla), dinimic (ag éirí níos airde nó níos ciúine) agus foirm (dénártha agus trénártha)

english: perform dances showing concentration and awareness of others
irish: dianmhachnamh agus feasacht ar dhaoine eile a léiriú le linn bheith ag damhsa

english: perform a variety of selected Irish and folk dances that use frequent changes of formation
irish: raon ilghnéitheach tofa de dhamhsaí Gaelacha agus de dhamhsaí tíre -- damhsaí ina n-athraíonn an t-eagar go minic -- a dhéanamh

english: learn and perform a range of steps and movements to rhythms and musical phrases
irish: raon céimeanna agus luailí le tionlacan rithimí agus míreanna ceoil a fhoghlaim agus a chomhall

english: explore and experiment with the use of costume and props (e.g. masks) to enhance creation and performance of dance
irish: úsáid culaithirte agus fearais (m.sh. maisc) a iniúchadh agus a thástáil d'fhonn cruthú agus comhall an damhsa a neartú

english: develop work with a group
irish: luailí damhsa a fhorbairt i dteannta páirtí agus i dteannta grúpa

english: create, practise and perform longer and more complex dances with clear dance forms
irish: damhsaí níos faide agus níos casta agus cruth dhamhsa go follasach orthu a chruthú, a chleachtadh agus a chomhall

english: create and perform a more complex range of movements
irish: raon luailí níos casta a chruthú agus a chomhall

english: communicate through movement a range of moods or feelings
irish: raon meonta nó mothúchán a chur in iúl trí mheán luaile

english: choose and respond with increasing sensitivity to a broader range of stimuli
irish: raon spreagthach níos fairsinge a roghnú agus freagairt dóibh le mothálacht bhreise

english: measure an achievement
irish: gnóthachtáil phearsanta a thomhas

english: know about and participate in local organisations and clubs involved in the provision of athletic activities and facilities
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí agus clubanna áitiúla a chuireann gníomhaíochtaí agus áiseanna lúthchleasacha ar fáil agus páirt a ghlacadh iontu

english: discuss personal performance and performance of a partner in athletic activities
irish: gníomhú pearsanta agus gníomhú páirtí in imeachtaí lúthchleasacha a phlé

english: develop an understanding of the rules of athletics and apply them in suitable competitive situations
irish: tuiscint ar rialacha na lúthchleasaíochta a fhorbairt agus iad a chur i bhfeidhm i dtosca iomaíocha cuí

english: develop a better understanding of speed, strength, control and co-ordination
irish: tuiscint níos fearr ar luas, neart, rialú agus comhordú luaile a fhorbairt

english: describe and discuss movement and ask and answer questions about it
irish: cur síos ar luail, í a phlé agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: begin to acquire an understanding of training to prepare for performance in selected track and field events
irish: tosú ar thuiscint don traenáil a ghnóthú mar ullmhú do ghníomhú in imeachtaí tofa raoin is faiche

english: become aware of athletic events and athletes locally, nationally and internationally
irish: bheith feasach ar imeachtaí lúthchleasacha agus ar lúthchleasaithe sa cheantar, sa tír agus ar fud an domhain

english: develop the shot put or throw from a standing position, using a medium-sized ball or primary shot
irish: cur nó caitheamh an mheáchain as seasamh a fhorbairt agus liathróid scothmhór nó meáchan bunata á úsáid

english: develop the over-arm (javelin) throw from a standing position, using a beanbag, ball or foam javelin
irish: an caitheamh os cionn láimhe (an ga) as seasamh a fhorbairt, agus mála pónairí, liathróid nó ga cúr-rubair á úsáid

english: develop the discus throw using a quoit or primary discus, practising the grip, swing and release techniques
irish: caitheamh na teisce a fhorbairt, ag baint feidhme as caidhte nó as teasc bhunata, agus teicníochtaí an ghreama, an luasctha agus an scaoilte a chleachtadh

english: develop a standing putting technique with turn
irish: seasamh agus casadh a fhorbairt mar theicníocht curtha

english: develop a short, fast approach run before releasing the throwing implement
irish: ruthag gearr tapa roimh scaoileadh leis an ngaireas caite a fhorbairt

english: sprint distances of 50-70 m, developing good acceleration and finishing technique
irish: rábáil feadh achar 50-70 m agus deatheicníocht luasghéaraithe agus críochnaithe a fhorbairt

english: run a distance of 40-60 m over evenly spaced hurdles (40-50 cm high approximately)
irish: fad 40-60 m a rith thar chliatha agus iad spásáilte go cothrom (tuairim is 40-50 cm ar airde)

english: run a distance of 150 m approximately over unevenly spaced hurdles (30 cm high approximately)
irish: fad tuairim is 150 m a rith thar chliatha agus iad spásáilte go míchothrom (tuairim is 30 m ar airde)

english: practise the technique of hurdling
irish: teicníocht na cliathreathaíochta a chleachtadh

english: practise the standing start
irish: tosú as seasamh a chleachtadh

english: practise shuttle sprints (repeat sprints) over a distance of 30 m
irish: ráibeanna tointeála (ráibeanna athdhéanta) feadh achar 30 m a chleachtadh

english: practise reaction sprints
irish: rábáil fhrithghníomhach a chleachtadh

english: practise baton change-over technique while moving in teams of four
irish: teicníocht mhalartú an bhata a chleachtadh le linn bheith ag gluaiseacht i bhfoirne ceathrair

english: participate in team relays in small groups
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rásanna sealaíochta foirne i ngrúpaí beaga

english: participate in a standard relay (i.e. four children per team, using a baton) on an oval track, each child running a distance of 50 m approximately
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rás sealaíochta caighdeánach (.i. ceathrar páistí ar gach foireann, bata a úsáid) ar raon ubhchruthach, fad tuairim is 50 m a bheith le rith ag gach páiste

english: participate in a relay in a straight line using a baton, with four children per team
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rás sealaíochta i líne dhíreach, bata a úsáid agus ceathrar páistí ar gach foireann

english: jog or run in a non-competitive setting for periods extending from 30 seconds to 5 minutes
irish: bogshodar nó rith a dhéanamh go neamhiomaíoch ar feadh tréimhsí ó 30 soicind go dtí 5 nóiméad

english: practise the standing jump for distance
irish: an léim as seasamh a chleachtadh ar mhaithe le fad

english: practise jumping for height over an obstacle (50-60 cm high approximately), developing a short approach run
irish: léimneach ar mhaithe le fad thar bhacainn a chleachtadh (tuairim is 50-60 cm ar airde) agus ruthag gearr á shaothrú

english: explore the various ways of jumping, to include taking off from one foot and landing on two feet
irish: na bealaí éagsúla chun léimní a iniúchadh, preabadh den talamh ar chos amháin agus tuirlingt ar dhá chos san áireamh

english: explore skipping activities individually and as part of a group, with or without a rope
irish: gníomhaíochtaí scipeála a iniúchadh ina (h)aonar agus mar bhall de ghrúpa, le rópa agus dá uireasa

english: develop a short approach run when taking off from one foot
irish: gearr-ruthag roimh phreabadh den talamh ar chos amháin a fhorbairt

english: participate in pair and group play
irish: bheith páirteach in imirt i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí

english: recognise hazards of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a aithint

english: observe the rules of the local pool
irish: rialacha na linne áitiúla a chomhall

english: identify correct procedure for dealing with hazards
irish: an modh ceart chun déiléail le contúirtí a aithint

english: understand how to stay safe in water
irish: an chaoi le fanacht slán san uisce a thuiscint

english: understand basic hygiene procedures
irish: bunrialacha sláinteachais a thuiscint

english: extend knowledge of swimming strokes
irish: eolas ar bhanganna snámha a mhéadú

english: discuss a wide range of aquatic activities
irish: raon leathan de ghníomhaíochtaí uisce a phlé

english: develop an increased understanding of flotation
irish: tuiscint bhreise ar shnámhacht a fhorbairt

english: develop an appreciation of the freedom of movement in water
irish: tuiscint d'éascaíocht luaile in uisce a fhorbairt

english: become aware of local organisations and clubs that promote aquatics
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí agus ar chlubanna áitiúla a chothaíonn cluichí uisce

english: appreciate the dangers of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a thuiscint

english: develop a selection of swimming strokes
irish: riar maith de bhanganna snámha a shaothrú

english: appreciate the importance of hygiene when using the pool
irish: tábhacht an tsláinteachais nuair a bhíonn an linn á húsáid a thuiscint

english: enter the water
irish: dul isteach san uisce

english: climb out of the water
irish: teacht amach as an uisce

english: walk in shallow water
irish: siúl in uisce éadomhain

english: practice balance, rotation and recovery exercises with and without float
irish: cleachtaí cothromaíochta, rothlaithe agus athghabhála a shaothrú le snámhán agus dá uireasa

english: observe that some objects float and others sink
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara go snámhann nithe áirithe agus go dtéann nithe eile go tóin

english: jump, side-step or run across the pool
irish: dul trasna na linne de léimeanna, de shleaschéimeanna nó de rith

english: glide to the bottom of the pool
irish: sní go dtí tóin na linne

english: glide forward or backwards along the surface in a stretched position
irish: sní ar aghaidh nó ar gcúl feadh an dromchla i gcruth sínte

english: explore use of arms and legs to travel in water
irish: úsáid lámh is cos chun taistil san uisce a iniúchadh

english: experience an introductory session in basic canoeing or sailing
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i seisiún tionscantach curachóireachta nó seoltóireachta

english: undertake forest walks
irish: tabhairt faoi shiúlóidí san fhoraois

english: prepare for camping or bivouacking
irish: ullmhú le haghaidh campála

english: develop a range of cycling skills
irish: raon scileanna rothaíochta a shaothrú

english: plan, observe, describe and discuss activities outdoors
irish: gníomhaíochtaí lasmuigh a phleanáil, iad a bhreathnú, cur síos orthu agus iad a phlé

english: discuss the safety aspects of activities undertaken
irish: gnéithe sábháilteachta na ngníomhaíochtaí ar tugadh fúthu a phlé

english: develop positive attitudes towards caring for the environment
irish: dearcadh deimhneach a fhorbairt i leith cúram a dhéanamh den imshaol

english: undertake physical challenges
irish: tabhairt faoi dhúshláin fhisiceacha

english: undertake co-operative (trust) activities
irish: tabhairt faoi ghníomhaíochtaí comhair (iontaoibhe)

english: undertake an adventure trail
irish: tabhairt faoi chosán eachtraíochta

english: undertake score orienteering
irish: tabhairt faoi threodóireacht scórála

english: undertake point-to-point orienteering
irish: tabhairt faoi threodóireacht ó phointe go pointe

english: undertake a memory star orienteering course
irish: tabhairt faoi chúrsa réalt-treodóireachta ó chuimhne

english: find controls on the school site, using a map or plan
irish: rialaitheoirí a aimsiú i gclós na scoile, ag baint feidhme as léarscáil nó plean

english: observe, describe and ask and answer questions about movement
irish: luail a bhreathnú, cur síos a dhéanamh uirthi agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: develop the ability to lift, carry, set up, dismantle and store apparatus correctly and safely
irish: cumas an fearas a ardú, a iompar, a chur le chéile, a bhaint as a chéile agus a stóráil mar ba cheart agus go sábháilte a fhorbairt

english: develop awareness of others when using apparatus
irish: feasacht faoi dhaoine eile le linn don fhearas a bheith in úsáid a fhorbairt

english: become aware of local, national and international gymnasts and gymnastic events
irish: bheith eolach ar ghleacaithe agus ar imeachtaí gleacaíocha sa cheantar, in Éirinn agus ar fud an domhain

english: become aware of local organisations and clubs that promote gymnastics
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí agus ar chlubanna áitiúla a chuireann an ghleacaíocht chun cinn

english: show controlled take-off, flight and landing
irish: preabadh, eitilt agus tuirlingt dea-rialaithe a léiriú

english: select and link a range of gymnastic actions to travel on the floor and on apparatus
irish: raon gníomhartha gleacaíocha a roghnú agus a nascadh d'fhonn taistil ar an urlár agus ar an bhfearas

english: produce group sequences
irish: grúp-shraitheanna a tháirgeadh

english: produce and perform more complex sequences with a partner on the floor and using apparatus
irish: sraitheanna níos casta a tháirgeadh agus a chomhall, i dteannta páirtí, ar an urlár agus ag úsáid fearais

english: practise and perform a range of skills
irish: raon scileanna a chleachtadh agus a chomhall

english: improve quality in body performance, notably in extension, body tension and clarity of body shape
irish: gníomhú coirp a fheabhsú maidir le tréithiúlacht, go háirithe síneadh coirp, teannas coirp agus soiléireacht corpchrutha

english: discuss and improve control in movement skills relevant to games
irish: rialú na scileanna luaile a bheadh bainteach le cluichí a phlé agus a fheabhsú

english: develop the ability to officiate at games
irish: cumas cúram oifigiúil a chomhall ag cluichí a fhorbairt

english: develop an understanding of the use of space in mini-games
irish: tuiscint ar úsáid spáis, agus mionchluichí á n-imirt, a fhorbairt

english: develop an understanding of the tactics and strategies for use in mini-games
irish: tuiscint ar na modhanna beartaíochta agus na straitéisí atá inúsáidte i mionchluichí a fhorbairt

english: begin to acquire an understanding of training to prepare for performance in games
irish: tosú ar thuiscint a ghnóthú don traenáil mar ullmhú do ghníomhú i gcluichí

english: become aware of games events and players locally, nationally and internationally
irish: bheith eolach ar chruinnithe spóirt agus ar imreoirí sa cheantar, in Éirinn agus ar fud an domhain

english: avail of opportunities in the community to participate in games
irish: deiseanna bheith páirteach i gcluichí sa phobal a thapú

english: adapt rules for use in mini-games and keep scores of games
irish: rialacha a chur in oiriúint le haghaidh mionchluichí agus na scóir a ghnóthaítear i gcluichí a chlárú

english: practise skills previously experienced
irish: scileanna a raibh taithí aige/aici orthu cheana a chleachtadh

english: develop further and extend kicking skills
irish: scileanna ciceála a fhorbairt a thuilleadh agus a leathnú

english: develop further and extend carrying and striking skills
irish: scileanna iompair agus buailte a fhorbairt a thuilleadh agus a leathnú

english: develop further and extend ball-handling skills
irish: scileanna láimhsithe liathróide a fhorbairt a thuilleadh agus a leathnú

english: play small-sided (mini) versions of games
irish: leaganacha foirne beaga (mionleaganacha) de chluichí a imirt

english: play playground games
irish: cluichí clóis a imirt

english: create and develop games with a partner or with a small group
irish: cluichí a cheapadh agus a fhorbairt i dteannta páirtí nó grúpa bhig

english: observe, describe and discuss own dance and dance of others (including professional dancers, live or video recordings)
irish: a d(h)amhsa féin agus damhsa daoine eile (damhsóirí gairmiúla san áireamh, iad beo nó ar thaifead físe) a bhreathnú, cur síos a dhéanamh orthu agus iad a phlé

english: interpret a mood or emotion seen in dance
irish: meon nó mothúchán a chonacthas i ndamhsa a chiallú

irish: na teicníochtaí a úsáidtear i ndamhsa agus foirm an damhsa a aithint

irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rás sealaíochta i líne dhíreach, bata a úsáid agus ceathrar páistí ar gach foireann

english: jog or run in a non-competitive setting for periods extending from 30 seconds to 5 minutes
irish: bogshodar nó rith a dhéanamh go neamhiomaíoch ar feadh tréimhsí ó 30 soicind go dtí 5 nóiméad

english: practise the standing jump for distance
irish: an léim as seasamh a chleachtadh ar mhaithe le fad

english: practise jumping for height over an obstacle (50-60 cm high approximately), developing a short approach run
irish: léimneach ar mhaithe le fad thar bhacainn a chleachtadh (tuairim is 50-60 cm ar airde) agus ruthag gearr á shaothrú

english: explore the various ways of jumping, to include taking off from one foot and landing on two feet
irish: na bealaí éagsúla chun léimní a iniúchadh, preabadh den talamh ar chos amháin agus tuirlingt ar dhá chos san áireamh

english: explore skipping activities individually and as part of a group, with or without a rope
irish: gníomhaíochtaí scipeála a iniúchadh ina (h)aonar agus mar bhall de ghrúpa, le rópa agus dá uireasa

english: develop a short approach run when taking off from one foot
irish: gearr-ruthag roimh phreabadh den talamh ar chos amháin a fhorbairt

english: participate in pair and group play
irish: bheith páirteach in imirt i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí

english: recognise hazards of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a aithint

english: observe the rules of the local pool
irish: rialacha na linne áitiúla a chomhall

english: identify correct procedure for dealing with hazards
irish: an modh ceart chun déiléail le contúirtí a aithint

english: understand how to stay safe in water
irish: an chaoi le fanacht slán san uisce a thuiscint

english: understand basic hygiene procedures
irish: bunrialacha sláinteachais a thuiscint

english: extend knowledge of swimming strokes
irish: eolas ar bhanganna snámha a mhéadú

english: discuss a wide range of aquatic activities
irish: raon leathan de ghníomhaíochtaí uisce a phlé

english: develop an increased understanding of flotation
irish: tuiscint bhreise ar shnámhacht a fhorbairt

english: develop an appreciation of the freedom of movement in water
irish: tuiscint d'éascaíocht luaile in uisce a fhorbairt

english: become aware of local organisations and clubs that promote aquatics
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí agus ar chlubanna áitiúla a chothaíonn cluichí uisce

english: appreciate the dangers of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a thuiscint

english: develop a selection of swimming strokes
irish: riar maith de bhanganna snámha a shaothrú

english: appreciate the importance of hygiene when using the pool
irish: tábhacht an tsláinteachais nuair a bhíonn an linn á húsáid a thuiscint

english: enter the water
irish: dul isteach san uisce

english: climb out of the water
irish: teacht amach as an uisce

english: walk in shallow water
irish: siúl in uisce éadomhain

english: practice balance, rotation and recovery exercises with and without float
irish: cleachtaí cothromaíochta, rothlaithe agus athghabhála a shaothrú le snámhán agus dá uireasa

english: observe that some objects float and others sink
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara go snámhann nithe áirithe agus go dtéann nithe eile go tóin

english: jump, side-step or run across the pool
irish: dul trasna na linne de léimeanna, de shleaschéimeanna nó de rith

english: glide to the bottom of the pool
irish: sní go dtí tóin na linne

english: glide forward or backwards along the surface in a stretched position
irish: sní ar aghaidh nó ar gcúl feadh an dromchla i gcruth sínte

english: explore use of arms and legs to travel in water
irish: úsáid lámh is cos chun taistil san uisce a iniúchadh

english: undertake forest walks
irish: tabhairt faoi shiúlóidí san fhoraois

english: plan, observe, describe and discuss activities outdoors
irish: gníomhaíochtaí lasmuigh a phleanáil, iad a bhreathnú, cur síos orthu agus iad a phlé

english: develop positive attitudes towards caring for the environment
irish: dearcadh deimhneach a fhorbairt i leith cúram a dhéanamh den imshaol

english: undertake simple co-operative (trust) activities
irish: tabhairt faoi ghníomhaíochtaí simplí comhair (iontaoibhe)

english: undertake an adventure trail
irish: tabhairt faoi chosán eachtraíochta

english: undertake a star orienteering activity
irish: tabhairt faoi ghníomhaíocht réalttreodóireachta

english: identify symbols for familiar features on a map of a familiar area
irish: na siombailí a sheasann do ghnéithe aitheanta ar léarscáil de cheantar atá ar eolas a aithint

english: observe and describe movement and ask and answer questions about it
irish: luail a bhreathnú, cur síos a dhéanamh uirthi agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: develop the ability to lift, carry, set up, dismantle and store apparatus correctly and safely
irish: cumas an fearas a ardú, a iompar, a chur le chéile, a bhaint as a chéile agus a stóráil mar ba cheart agus go sábháilte a fhorbairt

english: develop awareness of others when using apparatus
irish: feasacht faoi dhaoine eile le linn don fhearas a bheith in úsáid a fhorbairt

english: show increased control in take-off, flight and landing
irish: tuilleadh rialaithe a léiriú le linn preabtha, eitilte agus tuirlingthe

english: select and link a range of movement actions to travel on the floor and on apparatus
irish: raon gníomhartha luaile a roghnú agus a nascadh d'fhonn taistil ar an urlár agus ar an bhfearas

english: produce and perform sequences with a partner on the floor and using apparatus
irish: sraitheanna a tháirgeadh agus a chomhall i dteannta páirtí ar an urlár agus ag úsáid fearais

english: practise and perform forward and backward rolls with control
irish: an rolladh ar aghaidh agus an rolladh ar gcúl a chleachtadh agus a chomhall faoi rialú

english: develop good body tension and posture through gymnastic positions and movements
irish: dea-theannas coirp agus dea-staidiúir a fhorbairt i rith suíomh agus luailí gleacaíocha

english: create and perform sequences of movement to develop body awareness with appropriate variations of direction, pathways, levels, shape, speed and effort
irish: sraitheanna luaile a cheapadh agus a chomhall d'fhonn feasacht coirp a fhorbairt agus athruithe cuí a bheith á ndéanamh ar threo, conairí, leibhéil, cruth, luas agus iarracht

english: begin to practise headstand and/or handstand
irish: tosú ar cheannseasamh agus lámhsheasamh, nó an dá rud, a chleachtadh

english: discuss and improve control in movement skills relevant to games
irish: rialú na scileanna luaile a bheadh bainteach le cluichí a phlé agus a fheabhsú

english: develop problem-solving and decision-making strategies, and an understanding of the tactics and strategies for use in modified games situations
irish: scileanna fadhbréitigh agus cinnteoireachta a fhorbairt maille le tuiscint ar na modhanna beartaíochta agus na straitéisí atá inúsáidte i gcluichí modhnaithe

english: develop an increased understanding of use of space
irish: tuiscint sa bhreis ar úsáid spáis a shaothrú

english: adapt rules to modify games and keep scores
irish: ·	rialacha a mhionathrú d'fhonn cluichí a mhodhnú agus scóir a chlárú

english: practise skills previously experienced
irish: scileanna a raibh taithí aige/aici orthu cheana a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise a range of kicking skills
irish: raon de scileanna ciceála a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise a range of carrying and striking skills
irish: raon de scileanna iompair agus buailte a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise a range of ball-handling skills
irish: raon de scileanna láimhsithe liathróide a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: play small-sided (mini) versions of games
irish: leaganacha foirne beaga (mionleaganacha) de chluichí a imirt

english: play playground games
irish: cluichí clóis a imirt

english: create and develop games with a partner or with a small group
irish: cluichí a cheapadh agus a fhorbairt i dteannta páirtí nó grúpa bhig

english: observe, describe and discuss own dance and dance of others
irish: a d(h)amhsa féin agus damhsa páistí eile a bhreathnú agus cur síos agus plé a dhéanamh orthu

english: interpret a mood or emotion seen in dance
irish: meon nó mothúchán a chonacthas i ndamhsa a chiallú

english: identify the beginning, middle and end of a dance and moments when unison or canon occur
irish: tús, lár agus críoch damhsa a aithint mar aon leis na hamanna a tharlaíonn comhréir agus canóin

english: show increased poise, balance, control and co-ordination while moving and stopping
irish: stáidiúlacht, cothromaíocht, rialú agus comhordú sa bhreis a léiriú le linn gluaiseachta agus stoptha

english: respond with increasing sensitivity and imagination in movement to stimuli such as words, stories, poems, pictures and music
irish: freagairt do spreagthaigh mar fhocail, scéalta, dánta, pictiúir agus ceol le breis mothálachta agus samhlaíochta sa luail

english: perform to music, showing a sensitivity to rhythm changes and phrasing
irish: damhsa le tionlacan ceoil agus íogaireacht a léiriú d'athruithe rithime agus do mhíriú

english: perform a variety of selected Irish dances and folk dances that use frequent changes of formation
irish: raon ilghnéitheach tofa de dhamhsaí Gaelacha agus de dhamhsaí tíre -- damhsaí ina n-athraíonn an t-eagar go minic -- a dhéanamh

english: perform a range of steps and movements to rhythmic and melodic phrases, incorporating upper body movement
irish: raon de chéimeanna agus de luailí a d'oirfeadh do mhíreanna rithimeacha agus séiseacha a chomhall, luail uachtar an choirp ina chuid de

english: explore more complex movements of body parts and body actions, to include weight transference
irish: luailí ball coirp agus gníomhartha coirp atá níos casta, aistriú meáchain san áireamh, a iniúchadh

english: explore further different levels, pathways, shapes and directions in space
irish: leibhéil, conairí, cruthanna agus treonna difriúla i spás a iniúchadh a thuilleadh

english: explore and communicate through body movements a range of moods and feelings
irish: raon meonta nó mothúchán a iniúchadh agus a chur in iúl trí luailí coirp

english: develop work with a partner and begin to work in small groups
irish: gníomhaíocht i dteannta páirtí a fhorbairt agus tosú ar bheith ag obair i ngrúpaí beaga

english: create, practise and perform dances showing a clear beginning, middle and end using simple technique of unison (all dancers move at the same time) and introducing canon (dancer A performs a movement, dancer B follows)
irish: damhsaí a mbeidh a dtús, a lár agus a gcríoch soiléir a chumadh, a chleachtadh agus a léiriú, ag baint feidhme as teicníocht shimplí chomhréire (gluaiseann na damhsóirí go léir in éineacht) agus ag tionscnamh canón (déanann damhsóir A luail, déanann damhs

english: continue to explore an increased range of dynamics in movement
irish: leanúint de raon níos mó dinimice sa luail a iniúchadh

english: measure an achievement
irish: gnóthachtáil phearsanta a thomhas

english: develop an understanding of the rules of athletics
irish: tuiscint ar rialacha na lúthchleasaíochta a fhorbairt

english: develop an understanding of pace
irish: tuiscint ar ráta luais a fhorbairt

english: describe and discuss movement and ask and answer questions about it
irish: cur síos ar luail, í a phlé agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: analyse personal performance and performance of a partner in athletic activities
irish: gníomhú pearsanta agus gníomhú páirtí in imeachtaí lúthchleasacha a anailísiú

english: develop the over-arm (javelin) throw from a standing position, using a beanbag, ball or foam javelin
irish: an caitheamh os cionn láimhe (an ga) as seasamh a fhorbairt, agus mála pónairí, liathróid nó ga cúr-rubair á úsáid

english: develop a short approach run (e.g. three strides) before releasing the throwing implement
irish: ruthag gearr a shaothrú (.i. trí abhóg) roimh scaoileadh leis an ngaireas caite

english: begin to throw a quoit or primary discus, practising the grip, swing and release techniques
irish: tosú ar chaidhte nó teasc bhunata a chaitheamh, agus teicníochtaí an ghreama, an luasctha agus an scaoilte a chleachtadh

english: begin to throw (put) a medium-sized ball or primary shot from a standing position
irish: tosú ar liathróid scothmhór nó meáchan bunata a chur (a radadh) as seasamh

english: walk, jog or run in a non-competitive setting for periods extending from 30 seconds to 3 minutes
irish: siúl, bogshodar nó rith a dhéanamh go neamhiomaíoch ar feadh tréimhsí ó 30 soicind go dtí 3 nóiméad

english: sprint distances of 30 to 60 m, developing good acceleration and finishing technique
irish: rábáil feadh achar ó 30 go dtí 60 m agus dea-theicníochtaí luasghéaraithe agus críochnaithe a fhorbairt

english: run a distance of 20 to 40 m over evenly spaced hurdles (30-40 cm high approximately)
irish: fad ó 20 go dtí 40 m a rith thar chliatha agus iad spásáilte go cothrom (tuairim 30-40 cm ar airde)

english: practise the technique of hurdling
irish: teicníocht na cliathreathaíochta a chleachtadh

english: practise the standing start
irish: tosú as seasamh a chleachtadh

english: practise the standard relay (i.e. four children per team, using a baton) in a straight line
irish: an rás sealaíochta caighdeánach a chleachtadh (.i. ceathrar páistí ar gach foireann, bata á úsáid) i líne dhíreach

english: practise reaction sprints
irish: rábáil fhrithghníomhach a chleachtadh

english: practise baton change-over technique while stationary, with a partner, developing into practice with a team of four
irish: teicníocht mhalartú an bhata a chleachtadh le páirtí agus iad ina stad agus dul ar aghaidh uaidh sin chun an teicníocht a cleachtadh le foireann cheathrair

english: practise baton change-over technique while moving slowly, with a partner, developing into practice with a team of four
irish: teicníocht mhalartú an bhata a chleachtadh le linn bheith ag gluaiseacht go mall le páirtí agus, dá thoradh seo, í a chleachtadh le foireann cheathrair

english: participate in team relays or shuttle relays in small groups, using various means of travelling
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rásanna sealaíochta i bhfoirne nó i rásanna sealaíochta tointeála i ngrúpaí beaga, agus bealaí taistil éagsúla á n-úsáid

english: participate in a pair relay using a beanbag, developing simple technique
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rás sealaíochta i mbeirteanna agus mála pónairí á úsáid, d'fhonn teicníochtaí simplí a fhorbairt

irish: an léim as seasamh a chleachtadh ar mhaithe le fad
