english: respond with increasing sensitivity and imagination in movement to stimuli such as words, stories, poems, pictures and music
irish: freagairt do spreagthaigh mar fhocail, scéalta, dánta, pictiúir agus ceol le breis mothálachta agus samhlaíochta sa luail

english: perform to music, showing a sensitivity to rhythm changes and phrasing
irish: damhsa le tionlacan ceoil agus íogaireacht a léiriú d'athruithe rithime agus do mhíriú

english: perform a variety of selected Irish dances and folk dances that use frequent changes of formation
irish: raon ilghnéitheach tofa de dhamhsaí Gaelacha agus de dhamhsaí tíre -- damhsaí ina n-athraíonn an t-eagar go minic -- a dhéanamh

english: perform a range of steps and movements to rhythmic and melodic phrases, incorporating upper body movement
irish: raon de chéimeanna agus de luailí a d'oirfeadh do mhíreanna rithimeacha agus séiseacha a chomhall, luail uachtar an choirp ina chuid de

english: explore more complex movements of body parts and body actions, to include weight transference
irish: luailí ball coirp agus gníomhartha coirp atá níos casta, aistriú meáchain san áireamh, a iniúchadh

english: explore further different levels, pathways, shapes and directions in space
irish: leibhéil, conairí, cruthanna agus treonna difriúla i spás a iniúchadh a thuilleadh

english: explore and communicate through body movements a range of moods and feelings
irish: raon meonta nó mothúchán a iniúchadh agus a chur in iúl trí luailí coirp

english: develop work with a partner and begin to work in small groups
irish: gníomhaíocht i dteannta páirtí a fhorbairt agus tosú ar bheith ag obair i ngrúpaí beaga

english: create, practise and perform dances showing a clear beginning, middle and end using simple technique of unison (all dancers move at the same time) and introducing canon (dancer A performs a movement, dancer B follows)
irish: damhsaí a mbeidh a dtús, a lár agus a gcríoch soiléir a chumadh, a chleachtadh agus a léiriú, ag baint feidhme as teicníocht shimplí chomhréire (gluaiseann na damhsóirí go léir in éineacht) agus ag tionscnamh canón (déanann damhsóir A luail, déanann damhs

english: continue to explore an increased range of dynamics in movement
irish: leanúint de raon níos mó dinimice sa luail a iniúchadh

english: measure an achievement
irish: gnóthachtáil phearsanta a thomhas

english: develop an understanding of the rules of athletics
irish: tuiscint ar rialacha na lúthchleasaíochta a fhorbairt

english: develop an understanding of pace
irish: tuiscint ar ráta luais a fhorbairt

english: describe and discuss movement and ask and answer questions about it
irish: cur síos ar luail, í a phlé agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: analyse personal performance and performance of a partner in athletic activities
irish: gníomhú pearsanta agus gníomhú páirtí in imeachtaí lúthchleasacha a anailísiú

english: develop the over-arm (javelin) throw from a standing position, using a beanbag, ball or foam javelin
irish: an caitheamh os cionn láimhe (an ga) as seasamh a fhorbairt, agus mála pónairí, liathróid nó ga cúr-rubair á úsáid

english: develop a short approach run (e.g. three strides) before releasing the throwing implement
irish: ruthag gearr a shaothrú (.i. trí abhóg) roimh scaoileadh leis an ngaireas caite

english: begin to throw a quoit or primary discus, practising the grip, swing and release techniques
irish: tosú ar chaidhte nó teasc bhunata a chaitheamh, agus teicníochtaí an ghreama, an luasctha agus an scaoilte a chleachtadh

english: begin to throw (put) a medium-sized ball or primary shot from a standing position
irish: tosú ar liathróid scothmhór nó meáchan bunata a chur (a radadh) as seasamh

english: walk, jog or run in a non-competitive setting for periods extending from 30 seconds to 3 minutes
irish: siúl, bogshodar nó rith a dhéanamh go neamhiomaíoch ar feadh tréimhsí ó 30 soicind go dtí 3 nóiméad

english: sprint distances of 30 to 60 m, developing good acceleration and finishing technique
irish: rábáil feadh achar ó 30 go dtí 60 m agus dea-theicníochtaí luasghéaraithe agus críochnaithe a fhorbairt

english: run a distance of 20 to 40 m over evenly spaced hurdles (30-40 cm high approximately)
irish: fad ó 20 go dtí 40 m a rith thar chliatha agus iad spásáilte go cothrom (tuairim 30-40 cm ar airde)

english: practise the technique of hurdling
irish: teicníocht na cliathreathaíochta a chleachtadh

english: practise the standing start
irish: tosú as seasamh a chleachtadh

english: practise the standard relay (i.e. four children per team, using a baton) in a straight line
irish: an rás sealaíochta caighdeánach a chleachtadh (.i. ceathrar páistí ar gach foireann, bata á úsáid) i líne dhíreach

english: practise reaction sprints
irish: rábáil fhrithghníomhach a chleachtadh

english: practise baton change-over technique while stationary, with a partner, developing into practice with a team of four
irish: teicníocht mhalartú an bhata a chleachtadh le páirtí agus iad ina stad agus dul ar aghaidh uaidh sin chun an teicníocht a cleachtadh le foireann cheathrair

english: practise baton change-over technique while moving slowly, with a partner, developing into practice with a team of four
irish: teicníocht mhalartú an bhata a chleachtadh le linn bheith ag gluaiseacht go mall le páirtí agus, dá thoradh seo, í a chleachtadh le foireann cheathrair

english: participate in team relays or shuttle relays in small groups, using various means of travelling
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rásanna sealaíochta i bhfoirne nó i rásanna sealaíochta tointeála i ngrúpaí beaga, agus bealaí taistil éagsúla á n-úsáid

english: participate in a pair relay using a beanbag, developing simple technique
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rás sealaíochta i mbeirteanna agus mála pónairí á úsáid, d'fhonn teicníochtaí simplí a fhorbairt

english: practise the standing jump for distance
irish: an léim as seasamh a chleachtadh ar mhaithe le fad

english: practise jumping for height over an obstacle (40 cm high approximately), developing a short approach run
irish: léimneach ar mhaithe le hairde thar bhacainn a chleachtadh (tuairim 40 cm ar airde) agus ruthag gearr á shaothrú

english: explore the various ways of jumping, to include taking off from one foot or two feet and landing on two feet
irish: na modhanna éagsúla léimní a iniúchadh, éirí den talamh ar chos amháin nó ar dhá chos agus tuirlingt ar dhá chos san áireamh

english: explore skipping activities individually and as part of a group, with or without a rope
irish: gníomhaíochtaí scipeála a iniúchadh ina (h)aonar agus mar bhall de ghrúpa, le rópa agus dá uireasa

english: develop a short approach run when taking off from one foot
irish: gearr-ruthag roimh phreabadh den talamh ar chos amháin a fhorbairt

english: participate in pair and group play
irish: bheith páirteach in imirt i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí

irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a aithint

english: observe the rules of the local pool
irish: rialacha na linne áitiúla a chomhall

irish: an modh ceart chun déiléail le contúirtí a aithint

english: understand how to stay safe in water
irish: an chaoi le fanacht slán san uisce a thuiscint

english: understand basic hygiene procedures
irish: bunrialacha sláinteachais a thuiscint

english: extend knowledge of swimming strokes
irish: eolas ar bhanganna snámha a mhéadú

english: discuss a wide range of aquatic activities
irish: raon leathan de ghníomhaíochtaí uisce a phlé

english: develop an increased understanding of flotation
irish: tuiscint bhreise ar shnámhacht a fhorbairt

english: develop an appreciation of the freedom of movement in water
irish: tuiscint d'éascaíocht luaile in uisce a fhorbairt

english: become aware of local organisations and clubs that promote aquatics
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí agus ar chlubanna áitiúla a chothaíonn cluichí uisce

english: appreciate the dangers of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a thuiscint

english: develop a selection of swimming strokes
irish: riar maith de bhanganna snámha a shaothrú

english: appreciate the importance of hygiene when using the pool
irish: tábhacht an tsláinteachais nuair a bhíonn an linn á húsáid a thuiscint

english: enter the water
irish: dul isteach san uisce

english: climb out of the water
irish: teacht amach as an uisce

english: walk in shallow water
irish: siúl in uisce éadomhain

english: practice balance, rotation and recovery exercises with and without float
irish: cleachtaí cothromaíochta, rothlaithe agus athghabhála a shaothrú le snámhán agus dá uireasa

english: observe that some objects float and others sink
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara go snámhann nithe áirithe agus go dtéann nithe eile go tóin

english: jump, side-step or run across the pool
irish: dul trasna na linne de léimeanna, de shleaschéimeanna nó de rith

english: glide to the bottom of the pool
irish: sní go dtí tóin na linne

english: glide forward or backwards along the surface in a stretched position
irish: sní ar aghaidh nó ar gcúl feadh an dromchla i gcruth sínte

english: explore use of arms and legs to travel in water
irish: úsáid lámh is cos chun taistil san uisce a iniúchadh

english: undertake short walks, outside the school site where possible
irish: tabhairt faoi shiúlóidí gearra, lasmuigh de chlós na scoile nuair is féidir

english: find an object on the school site, given simple clues
irish: ní a aimsiú i gclós na scoile, ach leideanna simplí a bheith tugtha

irish: gnéithe sábháilteachta na ngníomhaíochtaí ar tugadh fúthu a phlé

irish: léirthuiscint agus meas ar an timpeallacht a iniúchadh a fhorbairt

irish: tabhairt faoi ghníomhaíochtaí simplí comhair (iontaoibhe)

english: undertake adventure trails
irish: tabhairt faoi chosán eachtraíochta

english: identify areas of the hall, playing-field or school site
irish: achair den halla, den pháirc imeartha nó de chlós na scoile a aithint

english: find objects or areas by following a simple plan (set of drawings)
irish: nithe nó achair a aimsiú trí phlean simplí (sraith líníochtaí) a leanúint

english: observe and describe movement and ask and answer questions about it
irish: luail a bhreathnú, cur síos a dhéanamh uirthi agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: develop the ability to lift, carry and place apparatus correctly
irish: cumas fearas a ardú, a iompar agus a shuí i gceart a fhorbairt

english: develop awareness of others when using apparatus
irish: feasacht faoi dhaoine eile le linn don fhearas a bheith in úsáid a fhorbairt

english: transfer floorwork onto apparatus
irish: gníomhaíocht urláir a aistriú go dtí an fearas

english: show control in take-off and flight and develop the ability to absorb energy to avoid shock when landing
irish: smacht a léiriú le linn éirí agus eitilte agus an cumas súite fuinnimh a fhorbairt d'fhonn tuairt a sheachaint le linn tuirlingthe

english: practise and perform the forward roll with control
irish: rolladh ar aghaidh faoi rialú a chleachtadh agus a chomhall

english: develop the basic movement actions of balancing, rolling, turning, twisting, stretching, climbing and transferring weight using a variety of body parts while exploring space
irish: na bunghníomhartha luaile seo a fhorbairt: cothromú, rolladh, iompú, casadh, síneadh, dreapadh agus aistriú meáchain, agus baill éagsúla choirp á n-úsáid chun an spás a iniúchadh

english: develop good body tension and posture through gymnastic positions and movements
irish: dea-theannas coirp agus dea-staidiúir a fhorbairt i rith suíomh agus luailí gleacaíocha

english: continue to develop body awareness through further movement variations of direction, pathways, levels, shape, speed and effort
irish: leanúint d'fheasacht coirp a fhorbairt trí níos mó éagsúlachta a aimsiú sa luail maidir le treo, conairí, leibhéil, cruth, luas agus iarracht

english: continue linking of movement skills to produce individual and pair sequences on the floor and using apparatus
irish: leanúint le scileanna luaile a nascadh, agus sraitheanna aonair agus sraitheanna beirte a chomhall ar an urlár agus ar an bhfearas

english: begin to practise and perform the backward roll from initial rocking and rolling activities
irish: tosú ar rolladh ar gcúl a chleachtadh agus a chomhall i ndiaidh gníomhaíochtaí tosaigh bogtha agus rollta

english: discuss and develop control in movement skills relevant to games
irish: rialú scileanna luaile atá bainteach le cluichí a phlé agus a fhorbairt

english: develop problem-solving and decision-making strategies
irish: straitéisí fadhbréitigh agus cinnteoireachta a fhorbairt

english: develop an understanding of the use of space
irish: tuiscint ar úsáid spáis a fhorbairt

english: apply simple rules to small-sided games
irish: rialacha simplí a chur i bhfheidhm i gcluichí foirne beaga

english: practise skills previously experienced
irish: scileanna a raibh taithí aige/aici orthu cheana a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise kicking skills
irish: scileanna ciceála a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise carrying and striking skills
irish: scileanna iompair agus buailte a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise ball-handling skills
irish: scileanna láimhsithe liathróide a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: play small-sided (mini) versions of games
irish: leaganacha foirne beaga (mionleaganacha) de chluichí a imirt

irish: damhsaí simplí a bhreathnú agus cur síos agus plé a dhéanamh orthu

english: interpret a mood or emotion observed in movement
irish: meon nó mothúchán a sonraíodh sa luail a chiallú

english: identify the sections of a dance as beginning, middle and end
irish: fo-ranna damhsa a aithint sna téarmaí: 'tús', 'lár', agus 'críoch'

irish: raon ilghnéitheach tofa de dhamhsaí Gaelacha agus de dhamhsaí tíre a dhéanamh

irish: raon de chéimeanna agus de luailí simplí a d'oirfeadh do fhrásaí séiseacha agus rithimeacha ar leith a chomhall

irish: raon mothúchán nó braistintí a iniúchadh agus a chur in iúl trí luail choirp shimplí

english: explore a range of dynamics in movement
irish: raon dinimice sa luail a iniúchadh

english: develop the basic movement actions of balancing, rolling, turning, twisting, stretching, climbing and transferring weight using a variety of body parts while exploring space
irish: na bunghníomhartha luaile seo a fhorbairt: cothromú, rolladh, iompú, casadh, síneadh, dreapadh agus aistriú meáchain, agus baill éagsúla choirp á n-úsáid chun an spás a iniúchadh

english: develop good body tension and posture through gymnastic positions and movements
irish: dea-theannas coirp agus dea-staidiúir a fhorbairt i rith suíomh agus luailí gleacaíocha

english: continue to develop body awareness through further movement variations of direction, pathways, levels, shape, speed and effort
irish: leanúint d'fheasacht coirp a fhorbairt trí níos mó éagsúlachta a aimsiú sa luail maidir le treo, conairí, leibhéil, cruth, luas agus iarracht

english: continue linking of movement skills to produce individual and pair sequences on the floor and using apparatus
irish: leanúint le scileanna luaile a nascadh, agus sraitheanna aonair agus sraitheanna beirte a chomhall ar an urlár agus ar an bhfearas

english: begin to practise and perform the backward roll from initial rocking and rolling activities
irish: tosú ar rolladh ar gcúl a chleachtadh agus a chomhall i ndiaidh gníomhaíochtaí tosaigh bogtha agus rollta

english: discuss and develop control in movement skills relevant to games
irish: rialú scileanna luaile atá bainteach le cluichí a phlé agus a fhorbairt

english: develop problem-solving and decision-making strategies
irish: straitéisí fadhbréitigh agus cinnteoireachta a fhorbairt

english: develop an understanding of the use of space
irish: tuiscint ar úsáid spáis a fhorbairt

english: apply simple rules to small-sided games
irish: rialacha simplí a chur i bhfheidhm i gcluichí foirne beaga

english: practise skills previously experienced
irish: scileanna a raibh taithí aige/aici orthu cheana a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise kicking skills
irish: scileanna ciceála a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise carrying and striking skills
irish: scileanna iompair agus buailte a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: develop and practise ball-handling skills
irish: scileanna láimhsithe liathróide a fhorbairt agus a chleachtadh

english: play small-sided (mini) versions of games
irish: leaganacha foirne beaga (mionleaganacha) de chluichí a imirt

english: play playground games
irish: cluichí clóis a imirt

english: create and develop games in pairs or small groups
irish: cluichí a cheapadh agus a fhorbairt, na páistí ina mbeirteanna nó ina ngrúpa beag

english: observe, describe and discuss simple dances
irish: damhsaí simplí a bhreathnú agus cur síos agus plé a dhéanamh orthu

english: interpret a mood or emotion observed in movement
irish: meon nó mothúchán a sonraíodh sa luail a chiallú

english: identify the sections of a dance as beginning, middle and end
irish: fo-ranna damhsa a aithint sna téarmaí: 'tús', 'lár', agus 'críoch'

english: perform a variety of selected Irish dances and folk dances
irish: raon ilghnéitheach tofa de dhamhsaí Gaelacha agus de dhamhsaí tíre a dhéanamh

english: perform a range of simple steps and movements to given rhythmic and melodic phrases
irish: raon de chéimeanna agus de luailí simplí a d'oirfeadh do fhrásaí séiseacha agus rithimeacha ar leith a chomhall

english: explore further different levels, pathways and shape in space and begin to explore directions
irish: leibhéil, conairí agus cruthanna difriúla a iniúchadh a thuilleadh sa spás agus tosú ar threonna a iniúchadh

english: explore and develop a greater range of movements of body parts and body actions, to include turning
irish: raon níos mó de luailí ball coirp agus de ghníomhartha coirp, iompú san áireamh, a iniúchadh agus a fhorbairt

english: explore and communicate through simple body movement a range of moods or feelings
irish: raon mothúchán nó braistintí a iniúchadh agus a chur in iúl trí luail choirp shimplí

english: explore a range of dynamics in movement
irish: raon dinimice sa luail a iniúchadh

english: develop work with a partner
irish: gníomhaíocht a fhorbairt i dteannta páirtí

english: develop increased poise, balance and coordination while moving and stopping
irish: stáidiúlacht, cothromaíocht agus comhordú sa bhreis a fhorbairt le linn gluaiseachta agus stoptha

english: develop an awareness of the relationship between music and movement, showing sensitivity in movement to rhythm and phrasing of music
irish: feasacht ar an ngaol atá idir ceol agus luail a fhorbairt; mothálacht a léiriú sa ghluaiseacht i leith rithim agus mhíriú an cheoil

english: create, practise and perform dances showing a clear beginning, middle and end
irish: damhsaí a mbeidh a dtús, a lár agus a gcríoch soiléir a chumadh, a chleachtadh, agus a léiriú

english: continue to respond imaginatively through movement to stimuli such as words, stories, poems, pictures, songs and music
irish: leanúint de bheith ag freagairt go samhlaíoch trí mheán luaile do spreagthaigh mar fhocail, scéalta, dánta, pictiúir, amhráin agus ceol

english: measure an achievement
irish: gnóthachtáil phearsanta a thomhas

english: develop an understanding of some of the basic rules of athletics
irish: tuiscint ar roinnt de bhunrialacha na lúthchleasaíochta a fhorbairt

english: develop an understanding of pace
irish: tuiscint ar ráta luais a fhorbairt

english: describe and discuss movement and ask and answer questions about it
irish: cur síos ar luail, í a phlé agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: experiment with appropriate objects and methods of throwing, aiming for height and distance
irish: gairis agus modhanna oiriúnacha caite a iniúchadh, airde agus fad a bheith mar aidhm

english: walk or jog in a non-competitive setting for periods extending from 30 seconds to two minutes
irish: siúl nó bogshodar go neamhiomaíoch ar feadh tréimhsí ó 30 soicind go dtí dhá nóiméad

english: sprint distances of 20 to 30 m with the emphasis on sustained effort throughout the sprint
irish: rábáil feadh achar ó 20 go dtí 30 m agus an bhéim a bheith ar iarracht mharthanach i gcaitheamh na rábála

english: run over evenly spaced low hurdles (30 cm high approximately)
irish: rith thar chliatha ísle agus iad spásáilte go cothrom (tuairim is 30 cm ar airde)

english: practise the technique of hurdling
irish: teicníocht na cliathreathaíochta a chleachtadh

english: practise the standing start
irish: tosú as seasamh a chleachtadh

english: practise reaction sprints
irish: rábáil fhrithghníomhach a chleachtadh

english: participate in team relays or shuttle relays in small groups, using various means of travelling
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rásanna sealaíochta i bhfoirne nó i rásanna sealaíochta tointeála i ngrúpaí beaga, agus bealaí taistil éagsúla á n-úsáid

english: participate in a pair relay using a beanbag, developing simple technique
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rás sealaíochta i mbeirteanna agus mála pónairí á úsáid, d'fhonn teicníochtaí simplí a fhorbairt

english: practise the standing jump for distance and height
irish: an léim as seasamh a chleachtadh ar mhaithe le fad agus airde

english: practise skipping activities with and without ropes
irish: gníomhaíochtaí scipeála a chleachtadh le rópaí agus gan rópaí

english: explore the various ways of jumping
irish: na modhanna éagsúla léimní a iniúchadh

english: develop a short approach run when taking off from one foot
irish: gearr-ruthag roimh phreabadh den talamh ar chos amháin a fhorbairt

english: participate in pair and group play
irish: bheith páirteach in imirt i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí

english: recognise hazards of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a aithint

english: observe the rules of the local pool
irish: rialacha na linne áitiúla a chomhall

english: identify correct procedure for dealing with hazards
irish: an modh ceart chun déiléail le contúirtí a aithint

english: understand how to stay safe in water
irish: an chaoi le fanacht slán san uisce a thuiscint

english: understand basic hygiene procedures
irish: bunrialacha sláinteachais a thuiscint

english: extend knowledge of swimming strokes
irish: eolas ar bhanganna snámha a mhéadú

english: discuss a wide range of aquatic activities
irish: raon leathan de ghníomhaíochtaí uisce a phlé

english: develop an increased understanding of flotation
irish: tuiscint bhreise ar shnámhacht a fhorbairt

english: develop an appreciation of the freedom of movement in water
irish: tuiscint d'éascaíocht luaile in uisce a fhorbairt

english: become aware of local organisations and clubs that promote aquatics
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí agus ar chlubanna áitiúla a chothaíonn cluichí uisce

english: appreciate the dangers of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a thuiscint

english: develop a selection of swimming strokes
irish: riar maith de bhanganna snámha a shaothrú

english: appreciate the importance of hygiene when using the pool
irish: tábhacht an tsláinteachais nuair a bhíonn an linn á húsáid a thuiscint

english: enter the water
irish: dul isteach san uisce

english: climb out of the water
irish: teacht amach as an uisce

english: walk in shallow water
irish: siúl in uisce éadomhain

english: practice balance, rotation and recovery exercises with and without float
irish: cleachtaí cothromaíochta, rothlaithe agus athghabhála a shaothrú le snámhán agus dá uireasa

english: observe that some objects float and others sink
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara go snámhann nithe áirithe agus go dtéann nithe eile go tóin

english: jump, side-step or run across the pool
irish: dul trasna na linne de léimeanna, de shleaschéimeanna nó de rith

english: glide to the bottom of the pool
irish: sní go dtí tóin na linne

english: glide forward or backwards along the surface in a stretched position
irish: sní ar aghaidh nó ar gcúl feadh an dromchla i gcruth sínte

english: explore use of arms and legs to travel in water
irish: úsáid lámh is cos chun taistil san uisce a iniúchadh

english: undertake short walks within or adjacent to the school grounds
irish: tabhairt faoi shiúlóidí gearra laistigh de chlós na scoile nó cóngarach dó

english: find an object in a confined area of the school site, given simple clues
irish: ní a aimsiú in achar teoranta de chlós na scoile tar éis leideanna simplí a bheith tugtha

english: begin to develop an appreciation of and respect for the environment
irish: tosú ar léirthuiscint agus meas ar an timpeallacht a fhorbairt

english: undertake simple co-operative (trust) activities
irish: tabhairt faoi ghníomhaíochtaí simplí comhair (iontaoibhe)

english: undertake adventure trails
irish: tabhairt faoi chosán eachtraíochta

irish: achair den halla, den pháirc imeartha nó de chlós na scoile a aithint

english: talk about movement and ask and answer questions about it

irish: cumas fearas a ardú, a iompar agus a shuí i gceart a fhorbairt

english: develop awareness of others when using apparatus
irish: feasacht faoi dhaoine eile le linn don fhearas a bheith in úsáid a fhorbairt

english: practise rocking and rolling activities leading to the forward roll
irish: bogadh agus rolladh a chleachtadh, agus de thoradh na ngníomhaíochtaí seo an rolladh ar aghaidh a dhéanamh

english: link skills to produce a short sequence of movement
irish: scileanna a nascadh d'fhonn gearrshraith luailí a sholáthar

irish: tosú ar ghníomhaíocht a aistriú go dtí an fearas

irish: tosú ar ghníomhaíocht a fhorbairt i dteannta páirtí

irish: tosú ar scileanna iompair agus buailte a fhorbairt

english: begin to develop ball-handling skills
irish: tosú ar scileanna láimhsithe liathróide a fhorbairt

english: play simple playground games
irish: cluichi simplí clóis a imirt

english: create and develop games in pairs
irish: cluichí a cheapadh agus a fhorbairt agus na páistí ina mbeirteanna

english: talk about dance phrases
irish: labhairt faoi mhíreanna damhsa

english: interpret a mood or emotion observed in movement
irish: meon nó mothúchán a sonraíodh sa luail a chiallú

english: respond imaginatively through movement to stimuli such as words, stories, poems, pictures, music
irish: freagairt go samhlaíoch trí mheán luaile do spreagthaigh mar fhocail, scéalta, dánta, pictiúir, ceol

english: perform simple singing games and folk dances
irish: cluichí cantana simplí agus damhsaí tíre a chomhal

english: perform simple movements to given rhythmic and melodic phrases
irish: luailí simplí a chomhall in éineacht le frásaí rithimeacha, séiseacha ar leith

english: explore the movements of different parts of the body and the ways in which the body can move in space using simple body actions such as travelling (walking, running, skipping) and jumping, gesture and stillness
irish: luailí ball difriúil den chorp agus na bealaí inar féidir leis an gcorp gluaiseacht i spás a iniúchadh, ag baint feidhme as gníomhartha coirp simplí mar thaisteal (siúl, rith, scipeáil) agus léimneach, geáitsíocht agus socracht

english: explore and create movement at different levels, using different pathways and forming different shapes in space
irish: luail a iniúchadh agus a chruthú ag leibhéil dhifriúla -- conairí difriúla a bheith á n-úsáid agus cruthanna difriúla a bheith á gcumadh sa spás

english: explore and communicate through simple body movement a range of moods or feelings
irish: raon mothúchán nó braistintí a iniúchadh agus a chur in iúl trí luail choirp shimplí

english: explore an appropriate range of dynamics in movement
irish: raon cuí dinimice sa luail a iniúchadh

english: develop poise, balance and co-ordination while moving and stopping
irish: stáidiúlacht, cothromaíocht agus comhordú a fhorbairt le linn gluaiseachta agus stoptha

english: create and perform simple dances with teacher's guidance
irish: damhsaí simplí a chumadh agus a léiriú faoi threoir an mhúinteora

english: begin to show sensitivity in movement to music
irish: tosú ar mhothálacht a léiriú le linn gluaiseachta le ceol

english: begin to develop work with a partner
irish: tosú ar ghníomhaíocht a fhorbairt i dteannta páirtí

english: talk about movement and ask and answer questions about it
irish: abhairt faoin luail agus ceisteanna mar gheall uirthi a chur agus a fhreagairt

english: develop an understanding of the basic rules of the individual athletic events
irish: tuiscint ar bhunrialacha na n-imeachtaí lúthchleasaíochta ar leith a fhorbairt

english: experiment with appropriate objects and methods of throwing, aiming for height and distance
irish: gairis agus modhanna oiriúnacha caite a iniúchadh, airde agus fad a bheith mar aidhm

english: walk or jog in a non-competitive setting for periods extending from 30 seconds to 90 seconds
irish: siúl nó bogshodar a dhéanamh go neamhiomaíoch ar feadh tréimhse ó 30 go dtí 90 soicind

english: sprint distances of 10 to 20 m
irish: rábáil feadh achar ó 10 go dtí 20 m

english: run over low hurdles, i.e. less than 20 cm high
irish: rith thar chliatha ísle, .i. níos lú ná 20 cm ar airde

english: run over low hurdles, evenly spaced
irish: rith thar chliatha ísle agus iad spásáilte go cothrom

english: run over flat markers evenly spaced
irish: rith thar loirg agus iad spásáilte go cothrom

english: run over flat markers
irish: rith thar loirg ar an talamh

english: practise the standing start
irish: tosú as seasamh a chleachtadh

english: practise reaction sprints
irish: rábáil fhrithghníomhach a chleachtadh

english: participate in team relays, in small groups, using various means of travelling
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rásanna sealaíochta i bhfoirne agus i ngrúpaí beaga agus bealaí taistil éagsúla á n-úsáid

english: participate in a pair relay using a beanbag
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i rás sealaíochta i mbeirteanna agus mála pónairí á úsáid

english: practise skipping activities with and without ropes
irish: gníomhaíochtaí scipeála a chleachtadh le rópaí agus gan rópaí

english: experiment with various ways of jumping
irish: modhanna éagsúla léimní a thriail

english: participate in pair and group play
irish: bheith páirteach in imirt i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí

english: recognise hazards of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a aithint

english: observe the rules of the local pool
irish: rialacha na linne áitiúla a chomhall

english: identify correct procedure for dealing with hazards
irish: an modh ceart chun déiléail le contúirtí a aithint

english: understand how to stay safe in water
irish: an chaoi le fanacht slán san uisce a thuiscint

english: understand basic hygiene procedures
irish: bunrialacha sláinteachais a thuiscint

english: extend knowledge of swimming strokes
irish: eolas ar bhanganna snámha a mhéadú

english: discuss a wide range of aquatic activities
irish: raon leathan de ghníomhaíochtaí uisce a phlé

english: develop an increased understanding of flotation
irish: tuiscint bhreise ar shnámhacht a fhorbairt

english: develop an appreciation of the freedom of movement in water
irish: tuiscint d'éascaíocht luaile in uisce a fhorbairt

english: become aware of local organisations and clubs that promote aquatics
irish: bheith eolach ar eagraíochtaí agus ar chlubanna áitiúla a chothaíonn cluichí uisce

english: appreciate the dangers of water
irish: na contúirtí a bhaineann le huisce a thuiscint

english: develop a selection of swimming strokes
irish: riar maith de bhanganna snámha a shaothrú

english: appreciate the importance of hygiene when using the pool
irish: tábhacht an tsláinteachais nuair a bhíonn an linn á húsáid a thuiscint

english: enter the water
irish: dul isteach san uisce

english: climb out of the water
irish: teacht amach as an uisce

english: walk in shallow water
irish: siúl in uisce éadomhain

english: practice balance, rotation and recovery exercises with and without float
irish: cleachtaí cothromaíochta, rothlaithe agus athghabhála a shaothrú le snámhán agus dá uireasa

english: observe that some objects float and others sink
irish: a thabhairt faoi deara go snámhann nithe áirithe agus go dtéann nithe eile go tóin

english: jump, side-step or run across the pool
irish: dul trasna na linne de léimeanna, de shleaschéimeanna nó de rith

english: glide to the bottom of the pool
irish: sní go dtí tóin na linne

english: glide forward or backwards along the surface in a stretched position
irish: sní ar aghaidh nó ar gcúl feadh an dromchla i gcruth sínte

english: explore use of arms and legs to travel in water
irish: úsáid lámh is cos chun taistil san uisce a iniúchadh

english: sing independently, with increasing awareness and control of pulse, tempo, pitch, diction and posture
irish: canadh go neamhspleách, le breis feasachta agus smachta ar bhuille, ar luas, ar thuinairde, ar urlabhra agus ar staidiúir

english: relate words and mood of a song to style of performance
irish: an stíl léirithe a chur in oiriúint d'fhocail agus do ghiúmar amhráin

english: recognise and sing from memory a more demanding repertoire of songs with an awareness of the music's social, historical and cultural contexts
irish: stór amhrán níos dúshlánaí a aithint agus a chanadh ó mheabhair le feasacht ar chomhthéacs sóisialta, stairiúil agus cultúrtha an cheoil

english: performing a round in several different textures
irish: rothlaim a léiriú le héagsúlachtaí uigeachta

english: perform, as part of a group, two songs sung individually and as partner songs
irish: mar bhall de ghrúpa, dhá amhrán a léiriú, iad á gcanadh ina n-aonar agus mar amhráin i bpáirt

english: perform, as part of a group, arrangements of songs that include simple countermelodies or harmony parts
irish: cóirithe amhrán le contrashéiseanna nó le páirteanna armónacha simplí iontu a léiriú mar bhall de ghrúpa

english: perform familiar songs with increased control of dynamics, phrasing and expression
irish: amhráin choitianta a léiriú le breis smachta ar dhinimic, míriú agus mothú

english: perform a rhythmic or melodic ostinato (a pattern that is repeated over and over) or drone (long, held notes) in accompanying a song
irish: ostinato (patrún a athdhéantar arís agus arís eile) rithimeach nó séiseach nó dordán (nótaí fada marthanacha) a léiriú agus amhrán á thionlacan

english: notice the differences created between the sections of songs in different forms
irish: na difríochtaí a chruthaítear idir mhíreanna amhráin i bhfoirmeacha éagsúla a thabhairt faoi deara

english: identify unison parts (playing or singing the same line) and harmony parts (two or more independent parts together) visually (from notation) and aurally
irish: páirteanna aoncheoil (ag seinm nó ag canadh na líne céanna) agus páirteanna armónacha (dhá pháirt neamhspleácha nó níos mó le chéile) a aithint leis an tsúil (ó nodaireacht) nó leis an gcluas

english: explore structural elements within familiar songs
irish: gnéithe comhdhéanaimh in amhráin choitianta a iniúchadh

english: distinguish individual parts in a round by singing, listening, moving, or by observing notational cues
irish: páirteanna aonánacha rothlaim a idirdhealú trí chanadh, trí éisteacht, trí ghluaiseacht nó trí leideanna nodaireachta a thabhairt faoi deara

english: use percussion instruments with increasing confidence and skill to accompany tunes, songs and chants
irish: cnaguirlisí a úsáid le breis muiníne agus scile mar thionlacan d'fhoinn, d'amhráin agus do chantaireachtaí

english: perform a range of playing techniques on a wide selection of percussion and melodic instruments
irish: raon de theicníochtaí seanma a léiriú ar líon leathan de chnaguirlisí agus d'uirlisí séiseacha

english: identify and perform familiar tunes from memory or from notation independently instruments may include:
irish: foinn choitianta a aithint agus a léiriú ó mheabhair nó ó nodaireacht go neamhspleách

english: use standard symbols with increasing fluency and accuracy to notate simple rhythm and pitch
irish: siombailí caighdeánacha a úsáid le breis saoráide agus le breis cruinnis chun rithim agus tuinairde shimplí a bhreacadh síos

english: use standard symbols to read, sing and play simple melodies from sight
irish: siombailí caighdeánacha a úsáid chun séiseanna simplí* a léamh, a chanadh nó a sheinm ar a bhfeiceáil

english: understand the function of major key signatures as indicating the position of doh
irish: feidhm na mór-ghléaschomharthaí chun suíomh doh a chur in iúl a thuiscint

english: recognise, name and use some standard symbols to notate metre (time) and rhythm
irish: roinnt siombailí caighdeánacha chun méadar (am) agus rithim a chlárú a aithint, a ainmniú agus a úsáid

english: recognise the shape (contour) of a melody and movement by steps or by leaps, from a graphic score or from notation
irish: cruth (comhrian) séise agus gluaiseacht i gcéimeanna nó i bpreabanna a aithint ó scór grafach nó ó nodaireacht

english: recognise that melodies can be read, sung or played in different keys
irish: a aithint gur féidir séiseanna a léamh, a chanadh nó a sheinm i ngléasanna éagsúla

english: recognise longer and more complex rhythm patterns of familiar songs and chants
irish: rithimphatrúin níos faide agus níos casta a aithint in amhráin agus i gcantaireachtaí coitianta

english: recognise and sing familiar tunes in an increasing variety of ways
irish: foinn choitianta simplí a aithint agus a chanadh ar líon forásach de bhealaí éagsúla

english: read, sing and play simple tunes from sight with C doh, G doh or F doh
irish: foinn shimplí le doh C, doh G nó doh F a léamh, a chanadh agus a sheinm ar a bhfeiceáil

english: respond imaginatively to music in a variety of ways
irish: freagairt go samhlaíoch do cheol i mbealaí éagsúla

english: recognise strong and weak-beat patterns, illustrating them through gestures
irish: patrúin le buillí tréana agus buillí laga a aithint agus iad a léiriú le gothaí

english: recognise and understand how tempo and dynamic choices contribute to an expressive musical performance
irish: a aithint agus a thuiscint mar a chuireann an luas agus an dinimic a roghnaítear le lánléiritheacht an cheoil

english: listen to his/her own compositions and the compositions of others (recordings or live performances) and evaluate in terms of personal response, choice of instruments and expressive qualities
irish: éisteacht lena p(h)íosaí cumadóireachta féin agus le píosaí daoine eile (idir thaifeadtaí agus léirithe beo) agus meastóireacht a dhéanamh orthu maidir le freagairt phearsanta, roghnú uirlisí agus cáilíochtaí lánléiritheacha

english: listen to and describe a broad range of musical styles and traditions, including familiar excerpts, recognising where appropriate its function and historical context; Irish music, traditional and contemporary:
irish: éisteacht le raon leathan de stíleanna agus de thraidisiúin cheoil, sleachta coitianta san áireamh, feidhm agus comhthéacs staire (más cuí) an cheoil sin a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh air; sleachta ceoil Éireannach

english: listen to and describe a broad range of musical styles and traditions, including familiar excerpts, recognising where appropriate its function and historical context; excerpts from classical music:
irish: éisteacht le raon leathan de stíleanna agus de thraidisiúin cheoil, sleachta coitianta san áireamh, feidhm agus comhthéacs staire (más cuí) an cheoil sin a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh air; sleachta ceoil clasaiceach

english: listen to and describe a broad range of musical styles and traditions, including familiar excerpts, recognising where appropriate its function and historical context
irish: éisteacht le raon leathan de stíleanna agus de thraidisiúin cheoil, sleachta coitianta san áireamh, feidhm agus comhthéacs staire (más cuí) an cheoil sin a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh air

english: identify two-beat or three-beat time in moving to music
irish: am dhá bhuille agus trí bhuille a aithint i ngluaiseacht do cheol

english: identify six-eight time in moving to music
irish: am a sé a hocht a aithint i ngluaiseacht do cheol

english: identify families of instruments
irish: finte d'uirlisí ceoil a aithint

english: experience dotted rhythms or syncopation (emphasis on normally weak beats) in familiar tunes through gestures and movement
irish: taithí a fháil ar rithimí poncaithe nó sioncóipiú (béim ar bhuillí ar gnách leo a bheith lag) i bhfoinn choitianta trí gheáitsí agus trí ghluaiseacht

english: examine the effects produced by different instruments
irish: maisíochtaí fuaime na n-uirlisí difriúla a scrúdú

english: distinguish the main instrument heard in a piece of music
irish: an phríomhuirlis a chloistear i bpíosa ceoil a aithint

english: determine simple form and represent through gestures
irish: foirm shimplí a chinneadh agus a léiriú trí ghothaí

english: listen to sounds in the environment with an increased understanding of how sounds are produced and organised
irish: éisteacht le fuaimeanna sa timpeallacht le breis tuisceana ar an dóigh a ndéantar agus a n-eagraítear fuaimeanna

english: identify a variety of ways of making sounds using body percussion in pairs and in small and large groups
irish: raon slite a aithint chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí beaga is móra trí chnagadh coirp a úsáid

english: explore ways of making sounds using manufactured and home-made instruments
irish: bealaí a iniúchadh chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh ag úsáid uirlisí saothraithe agus uirlisí a rinneadh sa bhaile

english: explore how the tone colours of suitable instruments can suggest various sounds and sound pictures
irish: iniúchadh a dhéanamh ar an dóigh ar féidir tondath uirlisí oiriúnacha a úsáid chun fuaimeanna agus fuaimphictiúir éagsúla a chur in iúl

english: explore a range of sounds that the singing voice and the speaking voice can make
irish: raon fuaimeanna a iniúchadh ar féidir leis an nguth canta agus leis an nguth labhartha iad a dhéanamh

english: distinguish and describe vocal ranges and tone colours heard in a piece of music
irish: na raonta gutha agus na tondathanna a chloistear i bpíosa ceoil a idirdhealú agus cur síos a dhéanamh orthu

english: reflect upon and evaluate his/her work and the work of other children discussing and explaining:
irish: léirsmaoineamh agus meastóireacht a dhéanamh ar a c(h)uid oibre féin agus ar obair páistí eile

english: record compositions on electronic media
irish: na píosaí cumadóireachta a thaifeadadh le meáin leictreonacha

english: devise and use graphic symbols and/or use standard notation to record different lines of musical patterns and inventions
irish: siombailí grafacha a chumadh agus a úsáid agus/nó nodaireacht chaighdeánach a úsáid chun línte difriúla de phatrúin agus de thionscnaimh cheoil a thaifeadadh

english: select from a wide variety of sound sources (voice, body percussion, untuned and tuned percussion, melodic instruments and technology) for a range of musical purposes
irish: rogha a dhéanamh as raon leathan d'fhoinsí fuaime (guth, cnagadh coirp, cnaguirlisí tiúnta agus neamhthiúnta, uirlisí agus teicneolaíocht shéiseach) le haghaidh raon de chuspóirí sa cheol

english: recall, answer and invent melodic and rhythmic patterns, using voices, body percussion and instruments
irish: patrúin shéiseacha agus rithimeacha a athghairm, a fhreagairt agus a chruthú, ag úsáid guthanna, cnagadh coirp agus uirlisí

english: invent and perform pieces that show an increasing awareness and control of musical elements
irish: píosaí ina dtaispeántar feasacht agus smacht forásach ar gnéithe an cheoil a chumadh agus a léiriú

irish: éisteacht le raon leathan de stíleanna agus de thraidisiúin cheoil, sleachta coitianta san áireamh, feidhm agus comhthéacs staire (más cuí) an cheoil sin a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh air; sleachta ceoil Éireannach

english: listen to and describe a broad range of musical styles and traditions, including familiar excerpts, recognising where appropriate its function and historical context; excerpts from classical music:
irish: éisteacht le raon leathan de stíleanna agus de thraidisiúin cheoil, sleachta coitianta san áireamh, feidhm agus comhthéacs staire (más cuí) an cheoil sin a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh air; sleachta ceoil clasaiceach

english: listen to and describe a broad range of musical styles and traditions, including familiar excerpts, recognising where appropriate its function and historical context
irish: éisteacht le raon leathan de stíleanna agus de thraidisiúin cheoil, sleachta coitianta san áireamh, feidhm agus comhthéacs staire (más cuí) an cheoil sin a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh air

english: identify two-beat or three-beat time in moving to music
irish: am dhá bhuille agus trí bhuille a aithint i ngluaiseacht do cheol

english: identify six-eight time in moving to music
irish: am a sé a hocht a aithint i ngluaiseacht do cheol

english: identify families of instruments
irish: finte d'uirlisí ceoil a aithint

english: experience dotted rhythms or syncopation (emphasis on normally weak beats) in familiar tunes through gestures and movement
irish: taithí a fháil ar rithimí poncaithe nó sioncóipiú (béim ar bhuillí ar gnách leo a bheith lag) i bhfoinn choitianta trí gheáitsí agus trí ghluaiseacht

english: examine the effects produced by different instruments
irish: maisíochtaí fuaime na n-uirlisí difriúla a scrúdú

english: distinguish the main instrument heard in a piece of music
irish: an phríomhuirlis a chloistear i bpíosa ceoil a aithint

english: determine simple form and represent through gestures
irish: foirm shimplí a chinneadh agus a léiriú trí ghothaí

english: listen to sounds in the environment with an increased understanding of how sounds are produced and organised
irish: éisteacht le fuaimeanna sa timpeallacht le breis tuisceana ar an dóigh a ndéantar agus a n-eagraítear fuaimeanna

english: identify a variety of ways of making sounds using body percussion in pairs and in small and large groups
irish: raon slite a aithint chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí beaga is móra trí chnagadh coirp a úsáid

english: explore ways of making sounds using manufactured and home-made instruments
irish: bealaí a iniúchadh chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh ag úsáid uirlisí saothraithe agus uirlisí a rinneadh sa bhaile

english: explore how the tone colours of suitable instruments can suggest various sounds and sound pictures
irish: iniúchadh a dhéanamh ar an dóigh ar féidir tondath uirlisí oiriúnacha a úsáid chun fuaimeanna agus fuaimphictiúir éagsúla a chur in iúl

english: explore a range of sounds that the singing voice and the speaking voice can make
irish: raon fuaimeanna a iniúchadh ar féidir leis an nguth canta agus leis an nguth labhartha iad a dhéanamh

english: distinguish and describe vocal ranges and tone colours heard in a piece of music
irish: na raonta gutha agus na tondathanna a chloistear i bpíosa ceoil a idirdhealú agus cur síos a dhéanamh orthu

english: reflect upon and evaluate his/her work and the work of other children discussing and explaining:
irish: léirsmaoineamh agus meastóireacht a dhéanamh ar a c(h)uid oibre féin agus ar obair páistí eile

english: record compositions on electronic media
irish: na píosaí cumadóireachta a thaifeadadh le meáin leictreonacha

english: devise and use graphic symbols and/or use standard notation to record different lines of musical patterns and inventions
irish: siombailí grafacha a chumadh agus a úsáid agus/nó nodaireacht chaighdeánach a úsáid chun línte difriúla de phatrúin agus de thionscnaimh cheoil a thaifeadadh

english: select from a wide variety of sound sources (voice, body percussion, untuned and tuned percussion, melodic instruments and technology) for a range of musical purposes
irish: rogha a dhéanamh as raon leathan d'fhoinsí fuaime (guth, cnagadh coirp, cnaguirlisí tiúnta agus neamhthiúnta, uirlisí agus teicneolaíocht shéiseach) le haghaidh raon de chuspóirí sa cheol

english: recall, answer and invent melodic and rhythmic patterns, using voices, body percussion and instruments
irish: patrúin shéiseacha agus rithimeacha a athghairm, a fhreagairt agus a chruthú, ag úsáid guthanna, cnagadh coirp agus uirlisí

english: invent and perform pieces that show an increasing awareness and control of musical elements
irish: píosaí ina dtaispeántar feasacht agus smacht forásach ar gnéithe an cheoil a chumadh agus a léiriú

english: understand the difference between beat and rhythm
irish: an difríocht idir buille agus rithim a thuiscint

english: sing from memory a widening repertoire of songs with increasing vocal control, confidence and expression
irish: stór forásach d'amhráin a chanadh ó chuimhne le breis smachta gutha, muiníne agus mothaithe

english: show greater control of pulse (steady beat) and tempo while singing well known tunes
irish: breis smachta ar chuisle (buille cothrom) agus ar luas a thaispeáint agus é/í ag canadh fonn coitianta

english: perform, in groups, simple rounds in two or more parts
irish: rothlaim shimplí in dhá pháirt nó níos mó a léiriú, i ngrúpaí

english: perform familiar songs with increasing understanding and control of pitch (accurate intervals) and extended vocal range
irish: amhráin choitianta a léiriú le tuilleadh tuisceana agus smachta thuinairde (idirchéimeanna cruinne) agus i raon leathnaithe gutha

english: perform familiar songs with increasing awareness of dynamics, phrasing (appropriate breaks in the music) and expression
irish: amhráin choitianta a léiriú le tuilleadh feasachta ar dhinimic, ar mhíriú (sosanna oiriúnacha sa cheol) agus ar mhothú

english: perform a rhythmic or melodic ostinato (a pattern that is repeated over and over) or a drone (long, held notes) to accompany a song
irish: ostinato (patrún a athdhéantar arís agus arís eile) rithimeach nó séiseach nó dordán (nótaí fada marthanacha) a léiriú mar thionlacan d'amhrán

english: notice differences created between the sections of songs in various forms
irish: na difríochtaí a chruthaítear idir mhíreanna d'amhráin i bhfoirmeacha éagsúla a shonrú

english: use percussion instruments to show the beat or rhythm in accompanying songs or rhythmic chants
irish: cnaguirlisí a úsáid chun an buille nó rithim a thaispeáint agus é/í ag tionlacan amhrán nó cantaireachtaí rithimeacha

english: identify and perform simple, familiar tunes from memory or from notation
irish: foinn shimplí choitianta a aithint agus a léiriú ó mheabhair nó ó nodaireacht

english: discover different ways of playing percussion and melodic instruments
irish: bealaí éagsúla a aimsiú chun cnaguirlisí agus uirlisí séiseacha a sheinm

english: use standard symbols to notate simple rhythm and pitch
irish: siombailí caighdeánacha a úsáid chun rithim agus tuinairde shimplí a bhreacadh síos

english: use standard symbols to identify and sing a limited range of notes and melodic patterns
irish: siombailí caighdeánacha a úsáid chun raon teoranta de nótaí agus de phatrúin shéiseacha a aithint agus a chanadh

english: recognise the shape (contour) of melodies on a graphic score or in standard notation
irish: cruth (comhrian) séiseanna a aithint ar scór grafach nó i nodaireacht chaighdeánach

english: recognise and use some standard symbols to notate metre (time) and rhythm
irish: roinnt siombailí caighdeánacha a aithint agus a úsáid chun méadar (am) agus rithim a chlárú

english: recognise and sing familiar, simple tunes in a variety of ways
irish: foinn choitianta shimplí a aithint agus a chanadh ar bhealaí éagsúla

english: identify and define the rhythm patterns of well-known songs and chants
irish: rithimphatrúin amhrán agus cantaireachtaí aithnidiúla a aithint agus a shonrú

english: discover how pentatonic tunes (based on five notes: d, r, m, s, l) can be read, sung and played in G doh, C doh, or F doh
irish: a fhionnachtain mar is féidir foinn pheinteatonacha (bunaithe ar chúig nóta: d, r, m, s, l) a léamh, a chanadh agus a sheinm in doh G, doh C, nó doh F

english: show the steady beat in listening to live or recorded music accompanying songs or chants
irish: an buille cothrom a thaispeáint agus é/í ag éisteacht le ceol beo nó ceol taifeadta á sheinm mar thionlacan d'amhráin nó do chantaireachtaí

english: respond imaginatively to longer pieces of music in a variety of ways
irish: freagairt go samhlaíoch do phíosaí níos faide ceoil i raon de shlite éagsúla

english: respond appropriately to obviously different sections in a piece
irish: freagairt go cuí do mhíreanna i ndréacht ceoil ar léir iad a bheith difriúil

english: recognise strong and weak beats, illustrating them through gestures
irish: buillí tréana agus buillí laga a aithint agus a léiriú trí ghothaí

english: listen to and describe music in various styles and genres, including familiar excerpts, recognising its function and historical context where appropriate
irish: éisteacht le stíleanna agus genre éagsúla ceoil, sleachta coitianta san áireamh, feidhm agus comhthéacs staire (más cuí) an cheoil sin a aithint agus cur síos air

english: identify some families of instruments
irish: roinnt finte uirlisí a aithint

english: identify and describe the tempo of the music as fast or slow, or getting faster or getting slower
irish: luas an cheoil a bheith tapa nó mall, ag éirí níos tapúla nó níos moille a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh air

english: experience six-eight time (like a jig)
irish: taithí a fháil ar am a sé a hocht (ar nós port)

english: distinguish between sounds of different duration (long or short) while listening to music
irish: idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir fuaimeanna a bheadh difriúil ó thaobh ré (fada nó gearr) agus é/í ag éisteacht le ceol

english: discover two-beat time (like a march) and three-beat time (like a waltz) byusing gestures to accompany music
irish: am dhá-bhuille (ar nós máirseála) agus trí-bhuille (ar nós válsa) a aimsiú trí ghothaí a úsáid mar thionlacan do cheol

english: differentiate between steady beat and music without a strong beat in music
irish: idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir ceol le buille cothrom agus ceol gan buille tréan

english: describe initial reactions to, or feelings about, his/her compositions and the compositions of others (recordings or live performances), giving preferences
irish: cur síos a dhéanamh ar a f(h)rithghníomhartha nó ar a m(h)othúcháin tosaigh i leith a p(h)íosaí cumadóireachta féin nó i leith píosaí le daoine eile (bíodh na píosaí sin taifeadta nó á léiriú beo) agus tosaíochta a lua

english: recognise and demonstrate pitch differences
irish: difríochtaí tuinairde a aithint agus a léiriú

english: listen to and describe a widening variety of sound from an increasing range of sources
irish: éisteacht le raon forásach d'fhuaimeanna éagsúla as raon forásach foinsí agus cur síos orthu

english: imitate patterns of long or short sounds vocally
irish: aithris a dhéanamh leis an nguth ar phatrúin d'fhuaimeanna fada agus gearra

english: explore ways of making sounds using manufactured and home-made instruments
irish: bealaí a iniúchadh chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh ag úsáid uirlisí saothraithe agus uirlisí a rinneadh sa bhaile

english: explore how the tone colours of suitable instruments can suggest various sounds and sound pictures

irish: bealaí éagsúla a aimsiú chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh trí chnagadh coirp, i mbeirteanna agus i ngrúpaí beaga

irish: na cineálacha difriúla fuaime ar féidir leis an nguth canta agus leis an nguth labhartha iad a dhéanamh

english: classify and describe sounds within a narrow range
irish: fuaimeanna laistigh de raon caol a rangú agus cur síos a dhéanamh orthu

english: record compositions on electronic media
irish: na píosaí cumadóireachta a thaifeadadh le meáin leictreonacha

irish: siombailí grafacha a chumadh agus a úsáid agus/nó nodaireacht chaighdeánach a úsáid chun patrúin agus tionscnaimh shimplí cheoil a thaifeadadh

english: describe and discuss his/her work and the work of other children
irish: ur síos a dhéanamh ar a c(h)uid oibre féin agus obair páistí eile agus í a phlé

english: select different kinds of sounds (voice, body percussion, untuned and tuned percussion, simple melodic instruments, electronic instruments) to portray a character, a sequence of events or an atmosphere in sound stories
irish: cineálacha difriúla fuaime (guth, cnagadh coirp, cnagadh neamhthiúnta agus tiúnta, uirlisí simplí séiseacha, uirlisí leictreonacha) a roghnú chun pearsana, sraith eachtraí nó atmaisféar i scéalta fuaime a léiriú

irish: patrúin shéiseacha agus rithimeacha shimplí a thabhairt chun cuimhne, a fhreagairt agus a chruthú agus an guth, cnagadh coirp agus uirlisí á n-úsáid chuige

english: recognise and imitate short melodies in echoes
irish: séiseanna gearra a aithint agus aithris a dhéanamh orthu mar mhacalla

english: perceive the shape of melodies as moving upwards, downwards or staying the same
irish: cruth séiseanna a aireachtáil a bheith ag dul suas, ag teacht anuas nó ag fanacht mar an gcéanna

english: notice obvious differences created between sections of songs in various forms
irish: difríochtaí soiléire a chruthaítear idir coda amhrán i bhfoirmeacha éagsúla a thabhairt faoi deara

english: use percussion instruments to show the beat or rhythm in accompanying songs or rhythmic chants
irish: cnaguirlisí a úsáid chun an buille nó rithim a thaispeáint agus é/í ag tionlacan amhrán nó cantaireachtaí rithimeacha

english: play some percussion instruments with confidence
irish: uirlisí simplí a rinneadh sa bhaile agus uirlisí saothraithe simplí a úsáid mar thionlacan d'amhráin, do rainn pháistí nó do chantaireachtaí rithimeacha

english: identify and perform simple two-note or three-note tunes by ear or from simple notation
irish: foinn shimplí dhánóta nó trínóta a aithint agus a léiriú ó chluas nó ó nodaireacht shimplí

english: recognise the shape (contour) of a simple melody
irish: cruth (comhrian) séise simplí a aithint

english: recognise and sing simple tunes, from simplified notation, combining rhythm and pitch
irish: foinn shimplí ina gcónasctar rithim agus tuinairde a aithint agus a chanadh ó nodaireacht shimplithe

english: recognise and sing familiar tunes and singing games within a range of two or three notes*
irish: foinn agus cluichí canta coitianta laistigh de raon dhá nóta nó trí a aithint agus a chanadh*

english: identify and perform familiar rhythm patterns from memory and from notation
irish: rithimphatrúin choitianta a aithint agus a léiriú ó mheabhair agus ó nodaireacht

english: talk about pieces of music, giving preferences, and illustrate responses in a variety of ways
irish: labhairt faoi phíosaí ceoil, tosaíochtaí a lua agus freagraí a léiriú ar bhealaí éagsúla

english: show the steady beat in listening to a variety of live or recorded music, accompanying songs or chants
irish: an buille cothrom a thaispeáint agus é/í ag éisteacht le píosaí éagsúla de cheol beo nó de cheol taifeadta, ag tionlacan amhrán nó cantaireachtaí

english: respond imaginatively to pieces of music through movement
irish: freagairt go samhlaíoch do phíosaí ceoil trí ghluaiseacht

english: perceive the difference between long and short sounds
irish: an difríocht idir fuaimeanna fada agus fuaimeanna gearra a aireachtáil

english: listen to a range of short, familiar and unfamiliar pieces of music or excerpts from popular music:
irish: éisteacht le raon de phíosaí gearra ceoil aithnidiúil nó ceoil anaithnid nó le sleachta astu (ceol pobail)

english: listen to a range of short, familiar and unfamiliar pieces of music or excerpts from musicals:
irish: éisteacht le raon de phíosaí gearra ceoil aithnidiúil nó ceoil anaithnid nó le sleachta astu (seónna)

english: listen to a range of short, familiar and unfamiliar pieces of music or excerpts from Irish music:
irish: éisteacht le raon de phíosaí gearra ceoil aithnidiúil nó ceoil anaithnid nó le sleachta astu (ceol Éireannach)

english: listen to a range of short, familiar and unfamiliar pieces of music or excerpts from classical music:
irish: éisteacht le raon de phíosaí gearra ceoil aithnidiúil nó ceoil anaithnid nó le sleachta astu (ceol clasaiceach)

english: identify obviously different instruments
irish: uirlisí ar léir iad a bheith difriúil a aithint

english: identify and show the tempo of the music as fast or slow, getting faster or getting slower
irish: a aithint agus a léiriú go raibh luas an cheoil tapa nó mall, ag éirí níos tapúla nó níos moille

english: differentiate between steady beat and music without a steady beat
irish: ceol le buille cothrom agus ceol gan buille cothrom a idirdhealú

english: differentiate between sounds at different dynamic levels (loud and soft, getting louder and getting softer)
irish: fuaimeanna ag leibhéil éagsúla dinimice (glórach agus bog, ag éirí níos glóraí agus ag éirí níos boige) a idirdhealú

english: recognise and demonstrate pitch differences
irish: difríochtaí tuinairde a aithint agus a léiriú

english: recognise and classify sounds using differing criteria
irish: fuaimeanna a aithint agus a rangú de réir critéar éagsúil

english: listen to, identify and describe sounds in the environment with increasing awareness
irish: éisteacht le fuaimeanna sa timpeallacht, iad a aithint agus cur síos a dhéanamh orthu le feasacht fhorásach

english: identify pitch differences in different voices
irish: difríochtaí tuinairde i nguthanna difriúla a aithint

english: explore ways of making sounds using manufactured and home-made instruments
irish: bealaí a iniúchadh chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh ag úsáid uirlisí saothraithe agus uirlisí a rinneadh sa bhaile

english: explore the natural speech rhythm of familiar words
irish: rithim chainte nádúrtha focal coitianta a iniúchadh

english: explore how the sounds of different instruments can suggest various sounds and sound pictures
irish: a iniúchadh mar is féidir na fuaimeanna a dhúisítear le huirlisí difriúla a úsáid chun fuaimeanna agus fuaimphictiúir a chur in iúl

english: discover ways of making sounds using body percussion
irish: bealaí éagsúla a aimsiú chun fuaimeanna a dhéanamh trí chnagadh coirp

english: talk about his/her work and the work of other children
irish: cur síos ar a c(h)uid oibre féin agus obair páistí eile

irish: na píosaí cumadóireachta a thaifeadadh le meáin leictreonacha

english: invent graphic symbols or use standard notation to represent selected sounds
irish: siombailí grafacha a chumadh nó nodaireacht chaighdeánach a úsáid chun fuaimeanna roghnaithe a léiriú

english: select sounds from a variety of sources to illustrate a character or a sequence of events, individually and in groups
irish: agus é/í ag obair ina (h)aonar nó mar bhall de ghrúpa fuaimeanna a roghnú ó fhoinsí éagsúla chun pearsana nó sraith eachtraí a léiriú

english: compare and order objects according to length or height
irish: rudaí a chur in ord agus i gcomparáid ar bhonn faid nó airde

english: select and use appropriate non-standard units to measure capacity
irish: aonaid neamhchaighdeánacha chuí a roghnú agus a úsáid chun toilleadh a thomhas

english: estimate and measure capacity in non-standard units
irish: toilleadh a mheas agus a thomhas in aonaid neamhchaighdeánacha

english: develop an understanding of the concept of capacity through exploration and the use of appropriate vocabulary
irish: tuiscint ar choincheap toillidh a fhorbairt trí iniúchadh agus trí fhoclóir cuí a úsáid

english: compare and order containers according to capacity
irish: soithigh a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile agus in ord de réir toillidh

english: sort and classify sets of objects by one and two criteria
irish: tacair de rudaí a shórtáil agus a rangú de réir critéir amháin agus de réir dhá cheann

english: represent and interpret data in two rows or columns using real objects, models and pictures
irish: sonraí a léiriú agus a déirmhíniú in dhá shraith nó cholún agus réada, samhla agus pictiúir in úsáid

english: recognise patterns and predict subsequent numbers
irish: patrúin a aithint agus na chéad uimhreacha eile a réamhinsint

english: identify, copy and extend patterns in colour, shape, size and number (3-4 elements)
irish: patrúin i ndath, i gcruth, i méid agus in uimhreacha (a trí nó a ceathair de bhaill) a aithint, a chóipeáil, agus a fhorleathnú

english: discover different arrays of the same number
irish: sraitheanna difriúla d'uimhir amháin a fhionnachtan

english: explore, discuss, develop and use the vocabulary of spatial relations
irish: an foclóir a bhaineann le coibhneasa spásúla a iniúchadh, a phlé, a fhorbairt agus a úsáid

english: sort 3-D shapes, regular and irregular
irish: cruthanna 3-T, idir rialta agus neamhrialta, a shórtáil

english: solve tasks and problems involving shape
irish: fadhbanna is tascanna bunaithe ar chruth a réiteach

english: use suitable structured materials to create pictures
irish: ábhair fhorganta oiriúnacha a úsáid chun pictiúir a dhéanamh

english: sort and name 2-D shapes: square, circle, triangle, rectangle
irish: cruthanna 2-T -- cearnóg, ciorcal, triantán, dronuilleog -- a shórtáil agus a ainmniú

english: solve problems involving shape
irish: fadhbanna bunaithe ar chruth a réiteach

english: count the number of objects in a set, 1-10
irish: an líon rudaí i dtacar a chomhaireamh, 1-10

english: use the language of ordinal number: first, last
irish: teanga orduimhreach a úsáid: an chéad, deireanach

english: order sets of objects by number, 1-5
irish: tacair de rudaí a ordú de réir uimhreacha, 1-5

english: compare equivalent and non-equivalent sets 1-5 by matching without using symbols
irish: tacair choibhéiseacha agus neamhchoibhéiseacha (1-5) a chur i gcomparáid trí mheaitseáil gan siombailí a úsáid

english: partition sets of objects, 1-5
irish: tacair de rudaí, 1-5, a fhoroinnt

english: subitise (tell at a glance) the number of objects in a set, 1-5
irish: an líon rudaí, 1-5, i dtacar a insint le sracfhéachaint

english: solve simple oral problems, 0-5
irish: fadhbanna simplí ó bhéal a réiteach, 0-5

english: read, write and order numerals, 1-5
irish: uimhreacha, 1-5, a léamh, a scríobh, agus a chur in ord

english: identify the empty set and the numeral zero
irish: an tacar folamh agus an uimhir nialas a aithint

english: develop an understanding of the conservation of number, 1-5
irish: tuiscint ar neamhaithreacht uimhris, 1-5, a fhorbairt

english: explore the components of number, 1-5
irish: comhpháirteanna uimhreacha, 1-5, a iniúchadh

english: combine sets of objects, totals to 5
irish: tacair de rudaí a chur le chéile, iomláin go dtí 5

english: develop an understanding of the concept of weight through exploration, handling of objects, and use of appropriate vocabulary
irish: tuiscint ar choincheap meáchain a fhorbairt trí iniúchadh, trí rudaí a láimhsiú, agus trí fhoclóir oiriúnach a úsáid

english: compare objects according to weight
irish: rudaí a chur i gcomparáid ar bhonn meáchain

english: sequence daily events or stages in a story
irish: imeachtaí laethúla agus céimeanna scéil a chur in ord leanúnach

english: develop an understanding of the concept of time through the use of appropriate vocabulary
irish: tuiscint ar choincheap ama a fhorbairt trí úsáid a bhaint as foclóir cuí

english: solve practical tasks and problems using money
irish: tascanna praiticiúla agus fadhbanna bunaithe ar airgead a réiteach

english: recognise and use coins (up to 5 cents)
irish: boinn airgid (go dtí 5 cent) a aithint agus a úsáid

english: develop an understanding of the concept of length through exploration, discussion, and use of appropriate vocabulary
irish: tuiscint ar choincheap faid a fhorbairt trí iniúchadh, trí dhíospóireacht agus trí fhoclóir oiriúnach a úsáid

english: compare and order objects according to length or height
irish: rudaí a chur in ord agus i gcomparáid ar bhonn faid nó airde

english: develop an understanding of the concept of capacity through exploration and the use of appropriate vocabulary
irish: tuiscint ar choincheap toillidh a fhorbairt trí iniúchadh agus trí fhoclóir cuí a úsáid

english: compare containers according to capacity
irish: soithigh a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile ó thaobh toillidh

english: order sets without counting
irish: tacair a chur in ord gan chomhaireamh

english: order objects according to length or height
irish: rudaí a chur in ord de réir faid nó airde

english: match equivalent and non-equivalent sets using one-to-one correspondence
irish: tacair choibhéiseacha agus neamhchoibhéiseacha a mheaitseáil, ag úsáid comhfhreagrais aon lena haon

english: compare sets without counting
irish: tacair a chur i gcomparáid gan chomhaireamh

english: compare objects according to length, width, height, weight, quantity, thickness or size
irish: rudaí a chur i gcomparáid maidir le fad, leithead, airde, meáchan, cainníocht, tiús, méid

english: identify the complement of a set (i.e. elements not in a set)
irish: comhlánú tacair a aithint (.i. baill nach bhfuil i dtacar)

english: classify objects on the basis of one attribute, such as colour, shape, texture or size
irish: rudaí a rangú ar bhonn tréithe amháin, mar shampla dath, cruth, uigeacht nó méid

english: sort and classify sets of objects by one criterion
irish: tacair de rudaí a shórtáil agus a rangú de réir critéir amháin

english: represent and interpret a set of simple mathematical data using real objects, models and pictures
irish: tacar de shonraí simplí matamaiticiúla a léiriú agus a léirmhíniú agus réada, samhla agus pictiúir in úsáid

english: match sets, equal and unequal
irish: tacair chothroma agus éagothroma a mheaitseáil

english: identify, copy and extend patterns in colour, shape and size
irish: patrúin i ndath, i gcruth agus i méid a aithint, a chóipeáil, agus a fhorleathnú

english: use appropriate timelines
irish: línte ama cuí a úsáid

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a wide range of stories from the lives of people who have made a contribution to local and/or national life and to the lives of people in other countries through technological, scientific, cultural and artistic activi
irish: éisteacht le raon leathan scéalta as saol daoine a chuir leis an saol áitiúil nó leis an saol náisiúnta agus le saol daoine i dtíortha eile trí ghníomhaíochtaí teicneolaíocha, eolaíocha, cultúrtha agus ealaíonta, chomh maith le trína bheith ag cur le hime

english: listen to local people telling stories about their past
irish: éisteacht le daoine de chuid na háite ag insint scéalta faoin am atá thart

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, music, drama, mime, movement, information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint, a scríobh, nó trí obair ealaíne, dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht agus trí theicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide a úsáid

english: examine and begin to make deductions from some simple relevant evidence
irish: píosaí simplí fianaise a bhfuil baint acu le hábhar a scrúdú agus tosú ar thátail a bhaint astu

english: discuss the chronology of events in a story
irish: cróineolaíocht imeachtaí i scéal a phlé

english: discuss the attitudes and motivations of characters in their historical context
irish: dearcadh agus inspreagadh pearsan a phlé ina gcomhthéacs stairiúil

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: become aware of the lives of women, men and children from different social, cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds, including the lives of 'ordinary' as well as 'more famous' people
irish: eolas a chur ar shaol ban, fear agus páistí ó chúlraí éagsúla sóisialta, cultúrtha, eitneacha agus reiligiúnacha, saol 'gnáthdhaoine' san áireamh, chomh maith le saol daoine 'níos cáiliúla'

english: relate the myths and legends to the beliefs, values and traditions of the peoples from which they came
irish: na miotais agus na finscéalta a cheangal le creideamh, luachanna agus traidisiúin na ndaoine ónar tháinig siad

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a wider range of more complex myths and legends from different cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds in Ireland and other countries
irish: éisteacht le raon níos leithne de mhiotais agus d'fhinscéalta atá níos casta ó chúlraí éagsúla cultúrtha, eitneacha agus creidimh in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile, iad a phlé, a athinsint, agus a thaifeadadh

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, drama, mime, movement, information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint nó a scríobh, nó trí obair ealaíne, dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht agus trí theicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide a úsáid

english: explore and discuss common themes and features which are to be found in the myths and legends of different peoples
irish: téamaí agus gnéithe comhchoiteanna atá le fáil i miotais agus i bhfinscéalta pobal éagsúla a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: discuss the forms of expression and conventions used in myths and their retelling
irish: nathanna cainte agus coinbhinsiúin a fhaightear i miotais agus an chaoi a n-insítear iad a phlé

english: discuss the chronology of events in the stories
irish: cróineolaíocht na n-imeachtaí sna scéalta a phlé

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: explore, discuss, compare and develop some simple understanding of the attitudes, beliefs, motivations and actions of differing individuals and groups of people in the past
irish: dearcadh, creideamh, inspreagadh agus gníomhartha daoine agus grúpaí éagsúla san am atá thart a iniúchadh, a phlé agus a chur i gcomparáid le chéile agus tuiscint shimplí orthu a fhorbairt

english: engage in simple studies of some of the more important aspects of periods in which political changes or movements have had an important influence on the lives of people in Ireland
irish: staidéar simplí a dhéanamh ar chuid de na gnéithe is tábhachtaí de na tréimhsí inar tharla athruithe nó gluaiseachtaí polaitiúla a raibh tionchar tábhachtach acu ar shaol daoine in Éirinn

english: develop a growing sense of personal, national, European and wider identities
irish: tuiscint a fhorbairt d'fhéiniúlacht phearsanta, náisiúnta agus Eorpach, mar aon le féiniúlacht níos leithne

english: begin to develop some appreciation of the ÔÇÿmind-setÔÇÖ of former generations
irish: tosú a theacht ar thuiscint ar leagan amach agus dearcadh na nglún a chuaigh romhainn

english: acquire some knowledge of the major personalities, events or developments in these periods
irish: roinnt eolais a shealbhú ar na daoine nó ar na himeachtaí ba mhó le rá sna tréimhsí sin

english: acquire insights into the attitudes and actions of people in contemporary Ireland
irish: léargas a fháil ar dhearcadh agus ar ghníomhartha daoine in Éirinn na linne seo

irish: roinnt eolais a shealbhú ar na daoine nó ar na himeachtaí ba mhó le rá sna tréimhsí sin

english: acquire insights into the attitudes and actions of people in contemporary Ireland
irish: léargas a fháil ar dhearcadh agus ar ghníomhartha daoine in Éirinn na linne seo

english: use documentary and other sources
irish: úsáid a bhaint as foinsí scríofa agus as foinsí eile

english: study the development of the school over a period
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar fhorbairt na scoile thar thréimhse

english: relate the history of the school to the history of education in the parish or local area
irish: stair na scoile a cheangal le stair an oideachais sa pharóiste nó sa cheantar áitiúil

english: explore the history of the school in the wider context of educational development in Ireland
irish: stair na scoile a iniúchadh i gcomhthéacs fhorbairt an oideachais in Éirinn

english: use evidence which is more diverse and more complex than heretofore
irish: fianaise níos casta agus níos ilghnéithí ná í sin a úsáideadh roimhe seo a úsáid

english: study a period or periods in the history of the local village, town, city area, townland, parish or county; in fifth and sixth classes children should study periods not already covered in third and fourth classes
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar thréimhse nó ar thréimhsí i stair an tsráidbhaile, an bhaile mhóir, cheantar na cathrach, an bhaile fhearainn, an pharóiste nó an chontae; i ranganna 5 agus 6 ba chóir go ndéanfadh na páistí staidéar ar thréimhsí nár clúdaíodh chean

english: collect local ballads, stories and traditions relating to these events
irish: bailéid, scéalta agus traidisiúin de chuid na háite a mbeadh baint acu leis na himeachtaí seo a bhailiú

english: become familiar with impor tant events in the history of the locality, setting local figures or events in the national and international context where relevant. In addition to the developments suggested for this unit in third and fourth classes, suitable
irish: eolas a chur ar imeachtaí tábhachtacha i stair na háite, ag ceangal pearsana nó imeachtaí áitiúla leis an gcomhthéacs náisiúnta de réir mar a thagann sin i gceist. D'fhéadfadh na topaicí seo thíos bheith feiliúnach chomh maith leo sin a moladh do na meánr

english: investigate local and/or regional variations or similarities in building styles and materials
irish: éagsúlachtaí nó cosúlachtaí áitiúla nó réigiúnda sa stíl tógála nó sna hábhair thógála a fhiosrú

english: investigate links between the age of houses and their location
irish: aon cheangal a bheadh idir aois tithe agus an láthair ar a bhfuil siad suite a fhiosrú

english: compare and classify a range of homes in the area (ideally homes from a variety of periods)
irish: áitribh éagsúla sa cheantar a chur i gcomparáid le chéile agus a chlárú (áitribh ó thréimhsí éagsúla ab fhearr)

english: collect, study and classify domestic artefacts
irish: earraí nó lámhdhéantúsáin tí a bhailiú agus a thaifeadadh agus staidéar a dhéanamh orthu

english: explore aspects of the leisure interests and games of local people in the past
irish: gnéithe de spéiseanna fóillíochta agus de chluichí mhuintir na háite san am atá thart a iniúchadh

english: become familiar with aspects of the history of games in the locality
irish: eolas a chur ar ghnéithe de stair cluichí sa cheantar

english: explore, discuss and record some of the ceremonies, stories, legends, poetry, music, dances and games associated with these feasts and festivals
irish: searmanais, scéalta, finscéalta, filíocht, ceol, damhsaí agus cluichí a bhaineann leis na féilte sin a iniúchadh, a phlé, agus a thaifeadadh

english: become familiar with the origins and traditions associated with a range of festivals in Ireland and other countries
irish: eolas a chur ar bhunús raonta d'fhéilte in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile agus ar na traidisiúin a bhaineann leo

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: investigate various aspects of these sites
irish: gnéithe éagsúla de na láithreáin sin a imscrúdú

english: identify opportunities to become involved in enhancing and protecting the environmental features
irish: bealaí a aithint a bhféadfaí páirt a ghlacadh san iarracht gnéithe den timpeallacht a chosaint agus a fheabhsú

english: actively explore some features of the local environment; suitable items or places might include
irish: gnéithe den timpeallacht áitiúil a iniúchadh go gníomhach; d'fhéadfaí a leithéidí seo a leanas a chur san áireamh:

english: record the place of peoples and events on appropriate timelines
irish: ionaid daoine agus imeachtaí a thaifeadadh ar línte ama feiliúnacha?
