english: study aspects of social, artistic, technological and scientific developments over long periods
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar dhul chun cinn sóisialta, ealaíne, teicneolaíoch agus eolaíoch, thar thréimhsí fada

english: refer to or use appropriate timelines
irish: tagairt a dhéanamh do línte ama cuí nó úsáid a bhaint astu

english: identify the factors which may have caused or prevented change
irish: na tosca arbh fhéidir ba chúis le hathrú nó a chuir bac le hathrú a thaispeáint

english: identify examples of change and continuity in the ÔÇÿline of developmentÔÇÖ
irish: samplaí d'athrú agus de leanúnachas ar an 'líne fhorbhartha' a thaispeáint

irish: línte ama cuí a úsáid

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a wide range of stories from the lives of people who have made a contribution to local and/or national life and to the lives of people in other countries through technological, scientific, cultural and artistic activi
irish: éisteacht le raon leathan scéalta as saol daoine a chuir leis an saol áitiúil nó leis an saol náisiúnta agus le saol daoine i dtíortha eile trí ghníomhaíochtaí teicneolaíocha, eolaíocha, cultúrtha agus ealaíonta, chomh maith le trína bheith ag cur le hime

english: listen to local people telling stories about their past
irish: éisteacht le daoine de chuid na háite ag insint scéalta faoin am atá thart

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, music, drama, mime, movement, information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint, a scríobh, nó trí obair ealaíne, dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht agus trí theicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide a úsáid

english: examine and begin to make deductions from some simple relevant evidence
irish: píosaí simplí fianaise a bhfuil baint acu le hábhar a scrúdú agus tosú ar thátail a bhaint astu

english: discuss the chronology of events in a story
irish: cróineolaíocht imeachtaí i scéal a phlé

english: discuss the attitudes and motivations of characters in their historical context
irish: dearcadh agus inspreagadh pearsan a phlé ina gcomhthéacs stairiúil

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: become aware of the lives of women, men and children from different social, cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds, including the lives of 'ordinary' as well as 'more famous' people
irish: eolas a chur ar shaol ban, fear agus páistí ó chúlraí éagsúla sóisialta, cultúrtha, eitneacha agus reiligiúnacha, saol 'gnáthdhaoine' san áireamh, chomh maith le saol daoine 'níos cáiliúla'

english: relate the myths and legends to the beliefs, values and traditions of the peoples from which they came
irish: na miotais agus na finscéalta a cheangal le creideamh, luachanna agus traidisiúin na ndaoine ónar tháinig siad

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a wider range of more complex myths and legends from different cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds in Ireland and other countries
irish: éisteacht le raon níos leithne de mhiotais agus d'fhinscéalta atá níos casta ó chúlraí éagsúla cultúrtha, eitneacha agus creidimh in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile, iad a phlé, a athinsint, agus a thaifeadadh

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, drama, mime, movement, information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint nó a scríobh, nó trí obair ealaíne, dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht agus trí theicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide a úsáid

english: explore and discuss common themes and features which are to be found in the myths and legends of different peoples
irish: téamaí agus gnéithe comhchoiteanna atá le fáil i miotais agus i bhfinscéalta pobal éagsúla a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: discuss the forms of expression and conventions used in myths and their retelling
irish: nathanna cainte agus coinbhinsiúin a fhaightear i miotais agus an chaoi a n-insítear iad a phlé

english: discuss the chronology of events in the stories
irish: cróineolaíocht na n-imeachtaí sna scéalta a phlé

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: explore, discuss, compare and develop some simple understanding of the attitudes, beliefs, motivations and actions of differing individuals and groups of people in the past
irish: dearcadh, creideamh, inspreagadh agus gníomhartha daoine agus grúpaí éagsúla san am atá thart a iniúchadh, a phlé agus a chur i gcomparáid le chéile agus tuiscint shimplí orthu a fhorbairt

english: engage in simple studies of some of the more important aspects of periods in which political changes or movements have had an important influence on the lives of people in Ireland
irish: staidéar simplí a dhéanamh ar chuid de na gnéithe is tábhachtaí de na tréimhsí inar tharla athruithe nó gluaiseachtaí polaitiúla a raibh tionchar tábhachtach acu ar shaol daoine in Éirinn

english: develop a growing sense of personal, national, European and wider identities
irish: tuiscint a fhorbairt d'fhéiniúlacht phearsanta, náisiúnta agus Eorpach, mar aon le féiniúlacht níos leithne

english: begin to develop some appreciation of the ÔÇÿmind-setÔÇÖ of former generations
irish: tosú a theacht ar thuiscint ar leagan amach agus dearcadh na nglún a chuaigh romhainn

english: acquire some knowledge of the major personalities, events or developments in these periods
irish: roinnt eolais a shealbhú ar na daoine nó ar na himeachtaí ba mhó le rá sna tréimhsí sin

english: acquire insights into the attitudes and actions of people in contemporary Ireland
irish: léargas a fháil ar dhearcadh agus ar ghníomhartha daoine in Éirinn na linne seo

english: explore, discuss, compare and develop some simple understanding of the attitudes, beliefs, motivations and actions of differing individuals and groups of people in the past

english: acquire insights into the attitudes and actions of people in contemporary Ireland
irish: léargas a fháil ar dhearcadh agus ar ghníomhartha daoine in Éirinn na linne seo

english: use documentary and other sources
irish: úsáid a bhaint as foinsí scríofa agus as foinsí eile

english: study the development of the school over a period
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar fhorbairt na scoile thar thréimhse

english: relate the history of the school to the history of education in the parish or local area
irish: stair na scoile a cheangal le stair an oideachais sa pharóiste nó sa cheantar áitiúil

english: explore the history of the school in the wider context of educational development in Ireland
irish: stair na scoile a iniúchadh i gcomhthéacs fhorbairt an oideachais in Éirinn

english: use evidence which is more diverse and more complex than heretofore
irish: fianaise níos casta agus níos ilghnéithí ná í sin a úsáideadh roimhe seo a úsáid

english: study a period or periods in the history of the local village, town, city area, townland, parish or county; in fifth and sixth classes children should study periods not already covered in third and fourth classes
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar thréimhse nó ar thréimhsí i stair an tsráidbhaile, an bhaile mhóir, cheantar na cathrach, an bhaile fhearainn, an pharóiste nó an chontae; i ranganna 5 agus 6 ba chóir go ndéanfadh na páistí staidéar ar thréimhsí nár clúdaíodh chean

english: collect local ballads, stories and traditions relating to these events
irish: bailéid, scéalta agus traidisiúin de chuid na háite a mbeadh baint acu leis na himeachtaí seo a bhailiú

english: become familiar with impor tant events in the history of the locality, setting local figures or events in the national and international context where relevant. In addition to the developments suggested for this unit in third and fourth classes, suitable
irish: eolas a chur ar imeachtaí tábhachtacha i stair na háite, ag ceangal pearsana nó imeachtaí áitiúla leis an gcomhthéacs náisiúnta de réir mar a thagann sin i gceist. D'fhéadfadh na topaicí seo thíos bheith feiliúnach chomh maith leo sin a moladh do na meánr

english: investigate local and/or regional variations or similarities in building styles and materials
irish: éagsúlachtaí nó cosúlachtaí áitiúla nó réigiúnda sa stíl tógála nó sna hábhair thógála a fhiosrú

english: investigate links between the age of houses and their location
irish: aon cheangal a bheadh idir aois tithe agus an láthair ar a bhfuil siad suite a fhiosrú

english: compare and classify a range of homes in the area (ideally homes from a variety of periods)
irish: áitribh éagsúla sa cheantar a chur i gcomparáid le chéile agus a chlárú (áitribh ó thréimhsí éagsúla ab fhearr)

english: collect, study and classify domestic artefacts
irish: earraí nó lámhdhéantúsáin tí a bhailiú agus a thaifeadadh agus staidéar a dhéanamh orthu

english: explore aspects of the leisure interests and games of local people in the past
irish: gnéithe de spéiseanna fóillíochta agus de chluichí mhuintir na háite san am atá thart a iniúchadh

english: become familiar with aspects of the history of games in the locality
irish: eolas a chur ar ghnéithe de stair cluichí sa cheantar

english: explore, discuss and record some of the ceremonies, stories, legends, poetry, music, dances and games associated with these feasts and festivals
irish: searmanais, scéalta, finscéalta, filíocht, ceol, damhsaí agus cluichí a bhaineann leis na féilte sin a iniúchadh, a phlé, agus a thaifeadadh

english: become familiar with the origins and traditions associated with a range of festivals in Ireland and other countries
irish: eolas a chur ar bhunús raonta d'fhéilte in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile agus ar na traidisiúin a bhaineann leo

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: investigate various aspects of these sites
irish: gnéithe éagsúla de na láithreáin sin a imscrúdú

english: identify opportunities to become involved in enhancing and protecting the environmental features
irish: bealaí a aithint a bhféadfaí páirt a ghlacadh san iarracht gnéithe den timpeallacht a chosaint agus a fheabhsú

english: actively explore some features of the local environment; suitable items or places might include
irish: gnéithe den timpeallacht áitiúil a iniúchadh go gníomhach; d'fhéadfaí a leithéidí seo a leanas a chur san áireamh:

english: record the place of peoples and events on appropriate timelines
irish: ionaid daoine agus imeachtaí a thaifeadadh ar línte ama feiliúnacha?

english: examine and become familiar with evidence which informs us about the lives of people in the periods studied, their thoughts and concerns, especially evidence which may be found locally
irish: fianaise a thugann eolas dúinn faoi shaol daoine sna tréimhsí a mbeadh staidéar á dhéanamh orthu, faoina gcuid smaointe agus faoina n-ábhair bhuartha a scrúdú agus eolas a chur uirthi, go háirithe fianaise a bheadh le fáil go háitiúil

english: become familiar with aspects of the lives of these people
irish: eolas a chur ar ghnéithe de shaol na ndaoine sin

english: study aspects of social, artistic, technological and scientific developments over long periods
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar dhul chun cinn sóisialta, ealaíne, teicneolaíoch agus eolaíoch, thar thréimhsí fada

english: refer to or use appropriate timelines

english: identify the factors which may have caused or prevented change
irish: na tosca arbh fhéidir ba chúis le hathrú nó a chuir bac le hathrú a thaispeáint

irish: samplaí d'athrú agus de leanúnachas ar an 'líne fhorbhartha' a thaispeáint

irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar dhul chun cinn sóisialta, ealaíne, teicneolaíoch agus eolaíoch, thar thréimhsí fada

english: refer to or use appropriate timelines
irish: tagairt a dhéanamh do línte ama cuí nó úsáid a bhaint astu

english: identify the factors which may have caused or prevented change
irish: na tosca arbh fhéidir ba chúis le hathrú nó a chuir bac le hathrú a thaispeáint

english: identify examples of change and continuity in the ÔÇÿline of developmentÔÇÖ
irish: samplaí d'athrú agus de leanúnachas ar an 'líne fhorbhartha' a thaispeáint

irish: samplaí d'athrú agus de leanúnachas ar an 'líne fhorbhartha' a thaispeáint

english: use appropriate timelines
irish: línte ama cuí a úsáid

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a range of stories from the lives of people who have made a contribution to local and/or national life and to the lives of people in other countries through technological, scientific, cultural and artistic activities
irish: éisteacht le raon scéalta as saol daoine a chuir leis an saol áitiúil nó leis an saol náisiúnta agus le saol daoine i dtíortha eile trí ghníomhaíochtaí teicneolaíocha, eolaíocha, cultúrtha agus ealaíonta, chomh maith le scéalta as saol daoine a chuir le h

english: listen to local people telling stories about their past
irish: éisteacht le daoine de chuid na háite ag insint scéalta faoin am atá thart

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, music, drama, mime, movement and information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint nó a scríobh, nó trí obair ealaíne, trí dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht

english: examine and begin to make deductions from some simple relevant evidence
irish: píosaí simplí fianaise a bhfuil baint acu le hábhar a scrúdú agus tosú ar thátail a bhaint astu

english: discuss the attitudes and motivations of characters
irish: dearcadh agus inspreagadh pearsan a phlé

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: discuss chronology of events (beginning, middle, end) in a story
irish: cróineolaíocht imeachtaí i scéal a phlé (an tús, an lár, an deireadh)

english: become aware of the lives of women, men and children from different social, cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds, including the lives of 'ordinary' as well as 'more famous' people
irish: eolas a chur ar shaol ban, fear agus páistí ó chúlraí éagsúla sóisialta, cultúrtha, eitneacha agus reiligiúnacha, saol 'gnáthdhaoine' san áireamh, chomh maith le saol daoine 'níos cáiliúla'

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a range of myths and legends from various cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds in Ireland and other countries
irish: éisteacht le raon miotas agus finscéalta ó chúlraí éagsúla cultúrtha, eitneacha agus creidimh in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile, iad a phlé, a athinsint, agus a thaifeadadh

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, drama, mime, movement and information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint nó a scríobh nó trí obair ealaíne, dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht agus úsáid a bhaint as teicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide

english: distinguish between fictional accounts in stories, myths and legends and real people and events in the past
irish: cuntais fhicseanacha i scéalta, miotais agus finscéalta agus daoine agus imeachtaí réadúla san am atá thart a idirdhealú

english: discuss the chronology of events in the stories
irish: cróineolaíocht na n-imeachtaí sna scéalta a phlé

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: refer to or use appropriate timelines
irish: tagairt a dhéanamh do línte ama cuí nó úsáid a bhaint astu

english: investigate the development of present buildings and the history of earlier school buildings
irish: tógáil na bhfoirgneamh atá ann faoi láthair agus stair na bhfoirgneamh a bhí ann roimhe seo a iniúchadh

english: examine old roll books or other records; if possible old handwriting copybooks
irish: seanrollaí scoile agus taifid eile a scrúdú; sean-chóipleabhair pheannaireachta, más féidir

english: compare school furniture and equipment of the past and the appearance of the classroom with those of today
irish: troscán agus fearas na scoile mar aon le cruth an tseomra ranga san am atá thart a chur i gcomparáid leis an gcaoi a bhfuil cúrsaí sa lá atá inniu ann

english: become familiar with the story of the school's founder(s)
irish: eolas a chur ar scéal bhunaitheoir(í) na scoile

english: attempt to reconstruct a school day in the past using a range of simple evidence
irish: iarracht a dhéanamh lá scoile san am atá thart a athchruthú, ag baint leasa as raon d'fhianaise shimplí

english: study a period or periods in the history of the local village, town, city area, townland, parish or county
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar thréimhse nó ar thréimhsí i stair an cheantair, an bhaile mhóir, cheantar na cathrach, an bhaile fhearainn, an pharóiste nó an chontae

english: collect related local ballads, stories and traditions
irish: bailéid, scéalta agus traidisiúin de chuid na háite a bhfuil baint acu lena chéile a bhailiú

english: become familiar with important events in the history of the locality, referring to the wider national context where relevant; possible events might include
irish: eolas a chur ar imeachtaí tábhachtacha i stair na háite, á gceangal sin leis an gcomhthéacs náisiúnta de réir mar a thagann sin i gceist; ar na himeachtaí a d'fhéadfaí a chur san áireamh tá:

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: explore aspects of personal family history or the family history of a person known to him/her
irish: gnéithe de stair a m(h)uintire féin nó de stair mhuintire duine éigin ar a bhfuil aithne aige/aici a iniúchadh

english: examine changes and examples of continuity in the lives of parents and grandparents
irish: athruithe agus samplaí de leanúnachas i saol na dtuismitheoirí agus na seanaithreacha/seanmháithreacha a scrúdú

english: collect and use a range of simple historical evidence
irish: raon d'fhianaise shimplí staire a bhailiú agus a úsáid

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: explore changes which have taken place in the home and other homes in the area
irish: na hathruithe atá tagtha ar a (h)áitreabh féin mar aon le háitribh eile sa cheantar a iniúchadh

english: discuss with older people items which have changed and those which have remained the same
irish: rudaí a d'athraigh agus rudaí a d'fhan mar a bhí siad a phlé le seandaoine

english: collect and/or examine old artefacts
irish: seandéantúsáin a bhailiú nó a phlé

english: have some knowledge of games and pastimes enjoyed by children in ancient societies and in other lands
irish: eolas éigin a fháil faoi chluichí agus chaitheamh aimsire ar bhain páistí i sochaithe ársa agus i dtíortha eile taitneamh astu

english: explore and discuss games and pastimes enjoyed by parents and grandparents in the past
irish: cluichí agus caitheamh aimsire ar bhain tuismitheoirí agus seanaithreacha/ seanmháithreacha taitneamh astu san am atá thart a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: become familiar with some games and pastimes enjoyed in the locality
irish: eolas a chur ar roinnt cluichí agus caitheamh aimsire a mbaintí taitneamh astu sa cheantar

english: explore, discuss and record some of the ceremonies, stories, legends, poetry, music, dances and games associated with these feasts and festivals
irish: searmanais, scéalta, finscéalta, filíocht, ceol, damhsaí agus cluichí a bhaineann leis na féilte sin a iniúchadh, a phlé, agus a thaifeadadh

english: become familiar with the origins and traditions associated with some common festivals in Ireland and other countries
irish: eolas a chur ar an mbunús agus ar na traidisiúin a bhaineann le roinnt féilte coitianta in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: investigate various aspects of these sites
irish: gnéithe éagsúla de na láithreáin sin a imscrúdú

english: actively explore some features of the local environment
irish: gnéithe den timpeallacht áitiúil a iniúchadh go gníomhach

english: record the place of peoples on timelines
irish: ionad na bpobal seo a thaifeadadh ar línte ama cuí

english: examine and become familiar with evidence from the periods studied, especially evidence which may be found locally
irish: eolas a chur ar an bhfianaise atá againn a insíonn dúinn faoi na pobail seo, go háirithe fianaise atá ar fáil go háitiúil, agus an fhianaise sin a scrúdú

irish: eolas a chur ar ghnéithe de shaol na ndaoine sin

irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar dhul chun cinn sóisialta, ealaíne, teicneolaíoch agus eolaíoch, thar thréimhsí fada

english: refer to or use appropriate timelines
irish: tagairt a dhéanamh do línte ama cuí nó úsáid a bhaint astu

english: identify some of the factors which have caused or prevented change
irish: cuid de na cúiseanna ba bhun le hathrú nó a chuir le hathrú a chosc a aithint

english: identify items of change and continuity in the 'line of development'

irish: rudaí a d'athraigh agus rudaí a d'fhan mar a bhí a aithint ar an 'líne fhorbartha'

english: use appropriate timelines
irish: línte ama cuí a úsáid

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a range of stories from the lives of people who have made a contribution to local and/or national life and to the lives of people in other countries through technological, scientific, cultural and artistic activities
irish: éisteacht le raon scéalta as saol daoine a chuir leis an saol áitiúil nó leis an saol náisiúnta agus le saol daoine i dtíortha eile trí ghníomhaíochtaí teicneolaíocha, eolaíocha, cultúrtha agus ealaíonta, chomh maith le scéalta as saol daoine a chuir le h

english: listen to local people telling stories about their past
irish: éisteacht le daoine de chuid na háite ag insint scéalta faoin am atá thart

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, music, drama, mime, movement and information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint nó a scríobh, nó trí obair ealaíne, trí dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht

english: examine and begin to make deductions from some simple relevant evidence
irish: píosaí simplí fianaise a bhfuil baint acu le hábhar a scrúdú agus tosú ar thátail a bhaint astu

english: discuss the attitudes and motivations of characters
irish: dearcadh agus inspreagadh pearsan a phlé

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: discuss chronology of events (beginning, middle, end) in a story
irish: cróineolaíocht imeachtaí i scéal a phlé (an tús, an lár, an deireadh)

english: become aware of the lives of women, men and children from different social, cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds, including the lives of 'ordinary' as well as 'more famous' people
irish: eolas a chur ar shaol ban, fear agus páistí ó chúlraí éagsúla sóisialta, cultúrtha, eitneacha agus reiligiúnacha, saol 'gnáthdhaoine' san áireamh, chomh maith le saol daoine 'níos cáiliúla'

english: listen to, discuss, retell and record a range of myths and legends from various cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds in Ireland and other countries
irish: éisteacht le raon miotas agus finscéalta ó chúlraí éagsúla cultúrtha, eitneacha agus creidimh in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile, iad a phlé, a athinsint, agus a thaifeadadh

english: express or record stories through oral and written forms, art work, drama, mime, movement and information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a thaifeadadh trí iad a insint nó a scríobh nó trí obair ealaíne, dhrámaíocht, mhím nó ghluaiseacht agus úsáid a bhaint as teicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide

english: distinguish between fictional accounts in stories, myths and legends and real people and events in the past
irish: cuntais fhicseanacha i scéalta, miotais agus finscéalta agus daoine agus imeachtaí réadúla san am atá thart a idirdhealú

english: discuss the chronology of events in the stories
irish: cróineolaíocht na n-imeachtaí sna scéalta a phlé

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: refer to or use appropriate timelines
irish: tagairt a dhéanamh do línte ama cuí nó úsáid a bhaint astu

english: investigate the development of present buildings and the history of earlier school buildings
irish: tógáil na bhfoirgneamh atá ann faoi láthair agus stair na bhfoirgneamh a bhí ann roimhe seo a iniúchadh

english: examine old roll books or other records; if possible old handwriting copybooks
irish: seanrollaí scoile agus taifid eile a scrúdú; sean-chóipleabhair pheannaireachta, más féidir

english: compare school furniture and equipment of the past and the appearance of the classroom with those of today
irish: troscán agus fearas na scoile mar aon le cruth an tseomra ranga san am atá thart a chur i gcomparáid leis an gcaoi a bhfuil cúrsaí sa lá atá inniu ann

english: become familiar with the story of the school's founder(s)
irish: eolas a chur ar scéal bhunaitheoir(í) na scoile

english: attempt to reconstruct a school day in the past using a range of simple evidence
irish: iarracht a dhéanamh lá scoile san am atá thart a athchruthú, ag baint leasa as raon d'fhianaise shimplí

english: study a period or periods in the history of the local village, town, city area, townland, parish or county
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar thréimhse nó ar thréimhsí i stair an cheantair, an bhaile mhóir, cheantar na cathrach, an bhaile fhearainn, an pharóiste nó an chontae

english: collect related local ballads, stories and traditions
irish: bailéid, scéalta agus traidisiúin de chuid na háite a bhfuil baint acu lena chéile a bhailiú

english: become familiar with important events in the history of the locality, referring to the wider national context where relevant; possible events might include
irish: eolas a chur ar imeachtaí tábhachtacha i stair na háite, á gceangal sin leis an gcomhthéacs náisiúnta de réir mar a thagann sin i gceist; ar na himeachtaí a d'fhéadfaí a chur san áireamh tá:

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: explore aspects of personal family history or the family history of a person known to him/her
irish: gnéithe de stair a m(h)uintire féin nó de stair mhuintire duine éigin ar a bhfuil aithne aige/aici a iniúchadh

english: examine changes and examples of continuity in the lives of parents and grandparents
irish: athruithe agus samplaí de leanúnachas i saol na dtuismitheoirí agus na seanaithreacha/seanmháithreacha a scrúdú

english: collect and use a range of simple historical evidence
irish: raon d'fhianaise shimplí staire a bhailiú agus a úsáid

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: explore changes which have taken place in the home and other homes in the area
irish: na hathruithe atá tagtha ar a (h)áitreabh féin mar aon le háitribh eile sa cheantar a iniúchadh

english: discuss with older people items which have changed and those which have remained the same
irish: rudaí a d'athraigh agus rudaí a d'fhan mar a bhí siad a phlé le seandaoine

english: collect and/or examine old artefacts
irish: seandéantúsáin a bhailiú nó a phlé

english: have some knowledge of games and pastimes enjoyed by children in ancient societies and in other lands
irish: eolas éigin a fháil faoi chluichí agus chaitheamh aimsire ar bhain páistí i sochaithe ársa agus i dtíortha eile taitneamh astu

english: explore and discuss games and pastimes enjoyed by parents and grandparents in the past
irish: cluichí agus caitheamh aimsire ar bhain tuismitheoirí agus seanaithreacha/ seanmháithreacha taitneamh astu san am atá thart a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: become familiar with some games and pastimes enjoyed in the locality
irish: eolas a chur ar roinnt cluichí agus caitheamh aimsire a mbaintí taitneamh astu sa cheantar

english: explore, discuss and record some of the ceremonies, stories, legends, poetry, music, dances and games associated with these feasts and festivals
irish: searmanais, scéalta, finscéalta, filíocht, ceol, damhsaí agus cluichí a bhaineann leis na féilte sin a iniúchadh, a phlé, agus a thaifeadadh

english: become familiar with the origins and traditions associated with some common festivals in Ireland and other countries
irish: eolas a chur ar an mbunús agus ar na traidisiúin a bhaineann le roinnt féilte coitianta in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile

english: present findings using a variety of media and appropriate timelines
irish: torthaí fionnachtana a chur i láthair, ag baint leasa as meáin éagsúla agus línte ama cuí

english: investigate various aspects of these sites
irish: gnéithe éagsúla de na láithreáin sin a imscrúdú

english: actively explore some features of the local environment
irish: gnéithe den timpeallacht áitiúil a iniúchadh go gníomhach

english: record the place of peoples on timelines
irish: ionad na bpobal seo a thaifeadadh ar línte ama cuí

english: examine and become familiar with evidence from the periods studied, especially evidence which may be found locally
irish: eolas a chur ar an bhfianaise atá againn a insíonn dúinn faoi na pobail seo, go háirithe fianaise atá ar fáil go háitiúil, agus an fhianaise sin a scrúdú

irish: eolas a chur ar ghnéithe de shaol na ndaoine sin

irish: éisteacht le raon miotas agus finscéalta as cúlraí éagsúla cultúrtha, eitneacha agus reiligiúnacha in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile, iad a phlé, a athinsint agus a thaifeadadh

english: listen to local people telling stories about their past
irish: éisteacht le daoine de chuid na háite ag insint scéalta faoin am atá thart

english: express or record stories through simple writing, art work, drama, music, mime and movement and using information and communication technologies
irish: scéalta a léiriú nó a chlárú trí mheán scríbhneoireachta simplí, oibre ealaíne, drámaíochta, míme nó ghluaiseachta agus trí theicneolaíocht an eolais agus na cumarsáide a úsáid

english: distinguish between fictional accounts in stories, myths and legends and real people and events in the past
irish: cuntais fhicseanacha i scéalta, miotais agus finscéalta agus daoine agus imeachtaí réadúla san am atá thart a idirdhealú

english: display storyline pictures showing episodes in sequence
irish: pictiúir a thaispeáint i líne scéalaíochta agus na himeachtaí á léiriú in ord seichimh

english: discuss the actions and feelings of characters
irish: gníomhartha agus mothúcháin na bpearsan a phlé

english: discuss chronology of events (beginning, middle, end) in a story
irish: cróineolaíocht imeachtaí i scéal a phlé (an tús, an lár, an deireadh)

english: become aware of the lives of women, men and children from different social, cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds, including the lives of 'ordinary' as well as 'more famous' people
irish: eolas a chur ar shaol ban, fear agus páistí ó chúlraí éagsúla sóisialta, cultúrtha, eitneacha agus reiligiúnacha, saol 'gnáthdhaoine' san áireamh, chomh maith le saol daoine 'níos cáiliúla'

english: record material on appropriate timeline
irish: ábhar a chlárú ar líne ama chuí

english: listen to adults talking about their own past
irish: éisteacht le daoine fásta ag cur síos ar an saol atá caite acu féin

english: learn songs and dances, or play games from the past
irish: amhráin agus damhsaí a fhoghlaim, nó cluichí de chuid na seanaimsire a imirt

english: explore and record aspects of the lives of people when his/her grandparents were young
irish: gnéithe de shaol daoine a bhí beo nuair a bhí a bs(h)eanaithreacha/s(h)eanmháithreacha óg a fhiosrú agus a thaifeadadh

english: compare lives of people in the past with the lives of people today, noting differences and similarities
irish: saol daoine san am atá thart a chur i gcomparáid le saol daoine sa lá atá inniu ann, ag déanamh nóta de na cosúlachtaí agus de na héagsúlachtaí

english: collect and/or examine simple evidence in school or in a local museum
irish: fianaise shimplí a bhailiú ar scoil nó i músaem áitiúil nó í a scrúdú

english: explore and record significant personal dates and events
irish: dátaí agus imeachtaí tábhachtacha pearsanta a iniúchadh agus a chlárú

english: construct simple personal timeline or storyline
irish: líne ama shimplí nó líne shimplí scéalaíochta a chur le chéile

english: collect, discuss and compare simple items of evidence from own past
irish: míreanna simplí fianaise ón am atá thart ina s(h)aol féin a bhailiú, a phlé, agus a chur i gcomparáid

english: explore and record significant features, events and dates in the past of the child's family and extended family
irish: gnéithe, ócáidí agus dátaí tábhachtacha i saol an teaghlaigh agus na muintire san am atá thart a fhiosrú agus a thaifeadadh

english: discuss and record significant family events
irish: ócáidí nó imeachtaí tábhachtacha i saol an teaghlaigh a phlé agus a thaifeadadh

english: compile simple family tree, scrapbook or timeline
irish: craobh shimplí ghinealaigh, leabhar gearrthóg nó líne ama a chur i dtoll a chéile

english: compare ages of family members: old/older, young/younger
irish: aoiseanna bhaill na muintire a chur i gcomparáid

english: collect, explore and discuss a range of simple evidence, noting changes and developments and items which have stayed the same

english: handle, collect or reconstruct articles used in such games, where possible
irish: earraí a úsáideadh sna cluichí sin a láimhsiú, a bhailiú, nó a dhéanamh as an nua, de réir mar is féidir sin

irish: anailísiú ar thaifeadtaí aimsire a úsáid chun cur síos simplí ar scamaill, ar mhéid an néalbhrait, ar threo na gaoithe agus ar dhálaí eile a shamhlú le saghsanna áirithe aimsire; fáistiní a dhéanamh agus a thástáil

english: record and display simple weather observations in systematic way using graphs, charts and common meteorological symbols
irish: faisnéisí simplí aimsire a chlárú agus a léiriú ar bhealach rianúil agus úsáid á baint as grafanna, cairteacha agus samhailchomharthaí meitéareolaíocha

english: explore weather patterns over the year in the locality using a variety of graphical and analytical skills
irish: patrúin aimsire i gcaitheamh na bliana sa dúiche máguaird a iniúchadh agus úsáid á baint as a lán saghsanna scileanna, idir scileanna grafacha agus scileanna anailíseacha

english: explore the relationships between climatic factors and aspects of building construction
irish: n ghaolmhaireacht idir tosca aeráide agus gnéithe de thógáil foirgneamh a iniúchadh

english: explore the relationship of climate to plant, animal and human life
irish: an ghaolmhaireacht atá idir aeráid agus beatha phlandúil, ainmhíoch agus dhaonna a iniúchadh

english: develop some awareness of weather patterns in other parts of Ireland and factors influencing climate in the locality and in Ireland
irish: roinnt feasachta a shaothrú faoi phatrúin aimsire in áiteanna eile in Éirinn agus faoi na tosca a théann i gcion ar aeráid sa dúiche máguaird agus in Éirinn

english: develop simple understanding of some atmospheric features
irish: buntuiscint ar roinnt gnéithe atmaisféaracha a fhorbairt

english: collect weather lore, especially local traditions and knowledge
irish: seanchas faoin aimsir a bhailiú, go háirithe traidisiúin agus eolas logánta

english: begin to appreciate the difference between climate and weather
irish: tosú ar an difríocht idir aeráid agus aimsir a thuiscint

english: become aware of the characteristics of some major climatic regions in different parts of the world
irish: éirí feasach ar thréithe roinnt príomhréigiún aeráide in áiteanna difriúla sa domhan

english: observe and develop simple understanding of the links between these features
irish: na naisc atá idir na gnéithe seo a bhreathnú agus buntuiscint orthu a shaothrú

english: investigate the influence of these features on plants and on the lives of animals and people
irish: tionchar na ngnéithe seo ar phlandaí agus ar bheatha aimnmithe agus daoine a imscrúdú

english: investigate and learn about the main natural features in the locality and county
irish: na príomhghnéithe nádúrtha sa dúiche máguaird agus sa chontae a imscrúdú agus foghlaim mar gheall orthu

english: become aware of the ways in which people, animals and plants have exploited and/or altered these features
irish: éirí feasach ar na bealaí inar bhain daoine, ainmhithe agus plandaí sochar as na gnéithe seo nó inar athraigh siad iad

english: learn of the relationship of plants and farming to soil types
irish: foghlaim faoin ngaol atá ag plandaí agus ag feirmeoireacht le cineálacha ithreach

english: learn about the characteristics of some common rock types and where they may be found in Ireland and in other parts of the world
irish: gnáthchineálacha carraige agus faoi na háiteanna is féidir teacht orthu in Éirinn agus in áiteanna eile sa domhan

english: identify and explore the use of stone in building and other human activities, especially in the locality
irish: úsáid cloiche i bhfoirgniú agus i ngníomhaíochtaí daonna eile, go háirithe sa dúiche máguaird a aithint agus a iniúchadh

english: develop simple understanding of the structure of the Earth, using terms such as core, mantle, crust, plates of the crust, lava flow, volcano, earthquake
irish: buntuiscint ar struchtúr an domhain a shaothrú, ag baint úsáide as téarmaí mar chroí, maintlín, screamh, plátaí na screimhe, sreabh laibhe, bolcán, crith talún

english: compare soil samples from different parts of the locality
irish: samplaí d'ithreacha ó ionaid dhifriúla sa dúiche máguaird a chur i gcomparáid

english: collect and identify some common rocks in the locality
irish: roinnt gnáthcharraigeacha sa dúiche máguaird a bhailiú agus a aithint

english: collect and examine soil samples and their constituents
irish: samplaí d'ithreacha agus a gcomhábhair a bhailiú agus a scrúdú

english: be familiar with some ways of changing and/or improving soil structure
irish: bheith eolach ar roinnt bealaí chun struchtúr na hithreach a athrú nó a fheabhsú

english: understand the importance of sunlight as a source of energy for plants and animals
irish: tábhacht sholas na gréine mar fhoinse fuinnimh d'ainmhithe agus do phlandaí a thuiscint

english: recognise that the Earth, its moon, the sun, other planets and their satellites are separate bodies and are parts of the solar system
irish: a aithint gur ranna ar leith iad an Domhan, an ghealach, an ghrian, na pláinéid eile agus a satailítí agus gur codanna den ghrianchóras iad

english: recognise a few of the major star constellations
irish: roinnt bheag de na príomh-réaltbhuíonta a aithint

english: observe the changing lengths of day and night during the seasons
irish: fad malartach laethanta agus oícheanta i rith na séasúr a bhreathnú

english: observe and record the positions of the sun when rising and setting and at different times of the day
irish: suíomh na gréine agus í ag éirí, ag dul faoi agus ag tráthanna éagsúla den lá a bhreathnú agus a chlárú

english: investigate the relative lengths and directions of shadows and the intensity of sunlight at different times of the year
irish: fad agus treo scáthanna, agus tréine sholas na gréine ag tráthanna éagsúla den bhliain, a imscrúdú

english: develop a simple understanding of the interrelationship of these bodies, including day and night and seasonal movements
irish: buntuiscint ar an gcomhghaolmhaireacht atá idir na ranna seo a shaothrú, lá agus oíche agus gluaiseachtaí séasúracha san áireamh

english: become aware of the influence of the sun on atmospheric conditions
irish: éirí feasach ar thionchar na gréine ar dhálaí aerbhrait

english: become aware of the dangers of sunlight for eyesight and skin
irish: éirí feasach ar a bhaolaí is atá solas na gréine don chraiceann agus don radharc

english: learn about a small number of the major natural features of Europe
irish: foghlaim faoi líon beag de phríomhghnéithe nádúrtha na hEorpa

english: become familiar with the names and approximate location of a small number of major world physical features
irish: éirí eolach ar ainmneacha agus ar gharshuímh líon beag de phríomhghnéithe fisiceacha domhanda

english: understand some of the interrelationships between these natural features and the lives of plants, animals and humans
irish: roinnt den chomhghaolmhaireacht idir na gnéithe nádúrtha seo agus beatha plandaí, ainmhithe agus daoine a thuiscint

english: become familiar with the relationship of these features with each other, with elements of the built environment and with significant natural features of Ireland
irish: éirí eolach ar an ngaol atá ag na gnéithe seo lena chéile, le tréithe den imshaol foirgnithe agus le gnéithe nádúrtha tábhachtacha na hÉireann

english: become familiar with the names and locations of some major natural features in Ireland
irish: éirí eolach ar ainmneacha agus ar shuímh roinnt príomhghnéithe nádúrtha in Éirinn

english: explore, through the study of some major world commodities, trade issues
irish: saincheisteanna trádála a iniúchadh trí staidéar a dhéanamh ar roinnt príomhearraí tráchtála an domhain

english: explore some of the issues and problems associated with aid
irish: roinnt de na saincheisteanna agus de na fadhbanna a bhaineann le cúnamh a iniúchadh

english: examine the work of relief agencies and become aware of Irish involvement in them
irish: obair gníomhaireachtaí fóirithinte a iniúchadh agus éirí feasach ar pháirtíocht Éireannach iontu

english: discuss possible short and long-term solutions to famine
irish: réitigh fhéideartha ar an ngorta, idir ghearrthéarmach agus fhadtéarmacha, a phlé

english: compare the experience of famine in Ireland with that of other countries
irish: an taithí ar an ngorta in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile a chur i gcomparáid

english: come to appreciate the inequalities between the developed and the developing world
irish: léirthuiscint cheart a ghnóthú ar an míchothromaíocht idir an domhan forbartha agus an domhan forásach

english: become aware of the causes and effects of famine
irish: éirí feasach ar chúiseanna agus thionchair an ghorta

english: acquire some knowledge of the origins, work and Irish involvement in some major international organisations
irish: roinnt eolais a chur ar bhunús agus ar obair roinnt eagraíochtaí idirnáisiúnta agus ar pháirtíocht na hÉireann iontu

english: learn about the methods of transport and transport routes in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: foghlaim faoi mhodhanna iompair agus faoi bhealaí iompair sa dúiche máguaird agus i gcuid chodarsnach d'Éirinn

english: learn about the available methods of communication
irish: foghlaim faoi na modhanna cumarsáide atá ar fáil

english: learn about and come to appreciate the peoples and communities who live and work in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: foghlaim faoi na daoine agus faoi na pobail a chónaíonn agus a shaothraíonn sa dúiche máguaird agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn agus léirthuiscint cheart a ghnóthú orthu

english: explore, investigate and come to appreciate the major features of the built environment in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: príomhghnéithe an imshaoil fhoirgnithe sa dúiche áitiúil agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn a iniúchadh agus a imscrúdú agus léirthuiscint a ghnóthú orthu

english: explore and investigate, especially through practical studies, one or more of the important economic activities of people in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: roinnt de phríomhghníomhaíochtaí eacnamaíocha daoine sa dúiche máguaird agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn a iniúchadh agus a imscrúdú, go háirithe trí mheán staidéar

english: become familiar with the work of people in these activities
irish: éirí eolach ar obair na ndaoine a bhfuil baint acu leis na gníomhaíochtaí seo

english: become aware of the natural features in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland and their interrelationship with the lives of people living in these places
irish: éirí feasach ar na gnéithe nádúrtha atá sa dúiche áitiúil agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn agus ar an gcomhghaol atá acu leis na daoine a chónaíonn sna háiteanna sin

english: become aware of the advantages, disadvantages and roles of these methods
irish: éirí feasach ar bhuntáistí, ar mhíbhuntáistí agus ar ghnó na modhanna seo

english: study some aspects of the environments and lives of people in one location in Europe and one location in another part of the world
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar roinnt gnéithe d'imshaoil agus de shaol daoine i suíomh amháin san Eoraip agus i suíomh in áit eile sa domhan

english: learn to value and respect the diversity of peoples and their lifestyles in these areas and other parts of the world
irish: foghlaim conas urraim agus meas a bheith aige/aici i dtaca le hilghnéitheacht na ndaoine sna ceantair seo agus in áiteanna eile sa domhan

english: develop an increasing awareness of the interdependence of people in these places and people in Ireland
irish: feasacht mhéadaitheach faoi chomhspleáchas daoine sna háiteanna seo agus daoine in Éirinn a shaothrú

english: develop a sense of belonging to local, county, national, European and international communities
irish: tuiscint a chothú ar a b(h)allraíocht sa phobal áitiúil, i bpobal an chontae agus sna pobail náisiúnta, Eorpacha agus idirnáisiúnta

english: become aware of various ethnic, religious and linguistic groups of peoples in Ireland, Europe and the wider world
irish: éirí feasach ar ghrúpaí éagsúla daoine in Éirinn, san Eoraip agus sa domhan mór a bhfuil a gcúlraí difriúil ó thaobh cine, reiligiúin nó teanga

english: learn of the movement of people to and/or from these centres
irish: foghlaim faoi ghluaiseacht daoine chuig na lárionaid seo nó uathu

english: identify some of their important buildings, features, facilities, parks, work-places
irish: páirceanna agus de na láithreacha tábhachtacha oibre atá iontu a aithint

english: become familiar with the names, locations and some well-known features of the capital cities of the European Union
irish: éirí eolach ar ainmneacha agus ar shuímh phríomhchathracha an Aontais Eorpaigh agus ar roinnt dá ngnéithe iomráiteacha

english: become aware of the location of the counties of Ireland, some of their towns and cities; the origins and geographical significance of their place-names
irish: éirí feasach ar shuíomh chontaetha na hÉireann agus ar roinnt dá mbailte móra; bunús a gcuid logainmneacha agus a mbrí thíreolaíoch

english: recognise and investigate aspects of human activities which may have positive or adverse effects on environments
irish: gnéithe de ghníomhaíochtaí daonna a bhféadfadh tionchar dearfach nó dochrach a bheith acu ar imshaoil a aithint agus a imscrúdú

english: identify, discuss and appreciate attractive and unattractive elements of natural and human environments
irish: gnéithe taitneamhacha agus míthaitneamhacha d'imshaoil nádúrtha agus daonna a aithint, a phlé agus a léirthuiscint

english: foster an appreciation of the ways in which people use the Earth's resources
irish: léirthuiscint ar na bealaí ina n-úsáideann daoine acmhainní an Domhain a chothú

english: explore some examples of the interrelationship of climate, natural features, flora, fauna and human life in different environments in Ireland and in some of the main climatic regions of the world
irish: roinnt samplaí den chomhghaolmhaireacht atá idir aeráid, gnéithe aiceanta, plandaí, ainmhithe agus beatha dhaonna in imshaoil dhifriúla in Éirinn agus i roinnt de phríomhréigiúin aeráide an domhain a iniúchadh

english: come to appreciate the need to conserve the Earth's resources
irish: léirthuiscint a ghnóthú ar an ngá atá le hacmhainní an Domhain a chaomhnú

english: become aware of the importance of the Earth's renewable and non-renewable resources
irish: éirí feasach ar thábhacht acmhainní inathnuaite agus neamh-inathnuaite an Domhain

english: identify and discuss a local, national or global environmental issue
irish: saincheist faoi imshaol áitiúil, náisiúnta nó domhanda a aithint agus a phlé

english: examine a number of ways in which local and other environments could be improved or enhanced
irish: scrúdú a dhéanamh ar roinnt bealaí ina bhféadfaí imshaoil áitiúla agus imshaoil eile a fheabhsú nó a fhoirfiú

english: come to appreciate individual, community and national responsibility for environmental care
irish: léirthuiscint a ghnóthú ar an bhfreagracht atá ar an duine, ar an bpobal agus ar an tír as cúram imshaoil

english: use simple equipment to make detailed weather observations and recordings of phenomena
irish: fearas simplí a úsáid chun mionfhaisnéisí aimsire a dhéanamh agus feiniméin a chlárú

english: explore, investigate and come to appreciate the major features of the built environment in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland

english: explore and investigate, especially through practical studies, one or more of the important economic activities of people in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: roinnt de phríomhghníomhaíochtaí eacnamaíocha daoine sa dúiche máguaird agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn a iniúchadh agus a imscrúdú, go háirithe trí mheán staidéar

english: become familiar with the work of people in these activities
irish: éirí eolach ar obair na ndaoine a bhfuil baint acu leis na gníomhaíochtaí seo

english: become aware of the natural features in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland and their interrelationship with the lives of people living in these places
irish: éirí feasach ar na gnéithe nádúrtha atá sa dúiche áitiúil agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn agus ar an gcomhghaol atá acu leis na daoine a chónaíonn sna háiteanna sin

english: become aware of the advantages, disadvantages and roles of these methods
irish: éirí feasach ar bhuntáistí, ar mhíbhuntáistí agus ar ghnó na modhanna seo

english: study some aspects of the environments and lives of people in one location in Europe and one location in another part of the world
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar roinnt gnéithe d'imshaoil agus de shaol daoine i suíomh amháin san Eoraip agus i suíomh in áit eile sa domhan

english: learn to value and respect the diversity of peoples and their lifestyles in these areas and other parts of the world
irish: foghlaim conas urraim agus meas a bheith aige/aici i dtaca le hilghnéitheacht na ndaoine sna ceantair seo agus in áiteanna eile sa domhan

english: develop an increasing awareness of the interdependence of people in these places and people in Ireland
irish: feasacht mhéadaitheach faoi chomhspleáchas daoine sna háiteanna seo agus daoine in Éirinn a shaothrú

english: develop a sense of belonging to local, county, national, European and international communities
irish: tuiscint a chothú ar a b(h)allraíocht sa phobal áitiúil, i bpobal an chontae agus sna pobail náisiúnta, Eorpacha agus idirnáisiúnta

english: become aware of various ethnic, religious and linguistic groups of peoples in Ireland, Europe and the wider world
irish: éirí feasach ar ghrúpaí éagsúla daoine in Éirinn, san Eoraip agus sa domhan mór a bhfuil a gcúlraí difriúil ó thaobh cine, reiligiúin nó teanga

english: learn of the movement of people to and/or from these centres
irish: foghlaim faoi ghluaiseacht daoine chuig na lárionaid seo nó uathu

english: identify some of their important buildings, features, facilities, parks, work-places
irish: páirceanna agus de na láithreacha tábhachtacha oibre atá iontu a aithint

english: become familiar with the names, locations and some well-known features of the capital cities of the European Union
irish: éirí eolach ar ainmneacha agus ar shuímh phríomhchathracha an Aontais Eorpaigh agus ar roinnt dá ngnéithe iomráiteacha

english: become aware of the location of the counties of Ireland, some of their towns and cities; the origins and geographical significance of their place-names
irish: éirí feasach ar shuíomh chontaetha na hÉireann agus ar roinnt dá mbailte móra; bunús a gcuid logainmneacha agus a mbrí thíreolaíoch

english: recognise and investigate aspects of human activities which may have positive or adverse effects on environments
irish: gnéithe de ghníomhaíochtaí daonna a bhféadfadh tionchar dearfach nó dochrach a bheith acu ar imshaoil a aithint agus a imscrúdú

english: identify, discuss and appreciate attractive and unattractive elements of natural and human environments
irish: gnéithe taitneamhacha agus míthaitneamhacha d'imshaoil nádúrtha agus daonna a aithint, a phlé agus a léirthuiscint

english: foster an appreciation of the ways in which people use the Earth's resources
irish: léirthuiscint ar na bealaí ina n-úsáideann daoine acmhainní an Domhain a chothú

english: explore some examples of the interrelationship of climate, natural features, flora, fauna and human life in different environments in Ireland and in some of the main climatic regions of the world
irish: roinnt samplaí den chomhghaolmhaireacht atá idir aeráid, gnéithe aiceanta, plandaí, ainmhithe agus beatha dhaonna in imshaoil dhifriúla in Éirinn agus i roinnt de phríomhréigiúin aeráide an domhain a iniúchadh

english: come to appreciate the need to conserve the Earth's resources
irish: léirthuiscint a ghnóthú ar an ngá atá le hacmhainní an Domhain a chaomhnú

english: become aware of the importance of the Earth's renewable and non-renewable resources
irish: éirí feasach ar thábhacht acmhainní inathnuaite agus neamh-inathnuaite an Domhain

english: identify and discuss a local, national or global environmental issue
irish: saincheist faoi imshaol áitiúil, náisiúnta nó domhanda a aithint agus a phlé

english: examine a number of ways in which local and other environments could be improved or enhanced
irish: scrúdú a dhéanamh ar roinnt bealaí ina bhféadfaí imshaoil áitiúla agus imshaoil eile a fheabhsú nó a fhoirfiú

english: come to appreciate individual, community and national responsibility for environmental care
irish: léirthuiscint a ghnóthú ar an bhfreagracht atá ar an duine, ar an bpobal agus ar an tír as cúram imshaoil

english: use simple equipment to observe and record weather phenomena
irish: fearas simplí a úsáid chun feiniméin aimsire a bhreathnú agus a chlárú

english: use analysis of weather recordings to begin to associate simple descriptions of clouds, amount of cloud cover, wind direction and other conditions with particular types of weather; make and test weather predictions
irish: an anailís ar chlárú aimsire a úsáid chun tosú ar chur síos simplí ar scamaill, ar mhéid an néalbhrait ar threo na gaoithe agus ar dhálaí eile a shamhlú le saghsanna áirithe aimsire; fáistiní a dhéanamh faoin aimsir agus iad a thástáil

english: study weather variations during the year and their influence on plants, animals and humans
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar athruithe san aimsir i rith na bliana agus ar a dtionchar ar phlandaí, ar ainmhithe agus ar dhaoine

english: record and display simple weather observations in systematic way using graphs, charts and common meteorological symbols
irish: faisnéisí simplí aimsire a chlárú agus a léiriú ar bhealach rianúil agus úsáid á baint as grafanna, cairteacha agus samhailchomharthaí meitéareolaíocha

english: develop some awareness of weather and climate patterns and their relationship with plant, animal and human life in some environments in other parts of the world
irish: roinnt feasachta a shaothrú faoi phatrúin aimsire agus aeráide agus a ngaolmhaireacht le beatha phlandúil, ainmhíoch agus dhaonna i roinnt imshaol in áiteanna eile sa domhan

english: compare temperatures indoors and outdoors, in shade and sunlight, on different sides of the same building, and explore reasons for differences
irish: an teocht laistigh agus lasmuigh, ar scáth na gréine agus faoin ngrian, ar shleasa difriúla foirgnimh a chur i gcomparáid, agus cúiseanna leis na difríochtaí a iniúchadh

english: collect and record weather lore from the locality
irish: seanchas faoin aimsir sa dúiche máguaird a chnuasach agus a chlárú

english: begin to appreciate the importance of solar energy for the Earth
irish: tosú ar thábhacht fuinneamh na gréine i leith an Domhain a thuiscint

english: observe and explore ways in which these features have affected the lives of plants, animals and humans
irish: slite ina bhfuil na gnéithe seo dulta i bhfeidhm ar shaol plandaí, ainmhithe agus daoine a bhreathnú agus a iniúchadh

english: investigate the ways in which these features have been used by humans and the changes which have occurred as a result
irish: slite ina bhfuil úsáid bainte ag daoine as na gnéithe seo agus na hathruithe a tharla dá thoradh sin a imscrúdú

english: investigate and become familiar with some natural features in the local environment
irish: roinnt gnéithe nádurtha san imshaol áitiúil a iniúchadh agus éirí eolach orthu

english: estimate distances and establish cardinal directions during the exploration of these features
irish: faid a mheas agus na príomhthreonna a shocrú fad a bhíonn na gnéithe seo á n-iniúchadh

english: sort and group constituent materials in samples
irish: na comhábhair sna samplaí a shórtáil agus a ghrúpáil

english: observe, collect and examine different soil samples in the immediate and other environments
irish: samplaí d'ithreacha difriúla sa gharthimpeallacht agus in imshaoil eile a bhreathnú, a bhailiú agus a scrúdú

english: compare and contrast materials, focusing on certain criteria
irish: na hábhair a chur i gcomparáid agus i gcodarsnacht, ag díriú ar chritéir áirithe

english: begin to explore influence of soils and rocks on animal and plant life
irish: tosú ar thionchar carraigeacha agus ithreacha ar na plandaí agus ar na hainmhithe a iniúchadh

english: understand the importance of sunlight for plants and animals
irish: tábhacht sholas na gréine d'ainmhithe agus do phlandaí a thuiscint

english: observe, describe and record the positions of the sun when rising and setting and the changing lengths of day and night during the seasons
irish: suíomh na gréine agus í ag éirí agus ag dul faoi agus malairt fad laethanta agus oícheanta ó shéasúr go séasúr a bhreathnú, cur síos orthu agus iad a chlárú

english: investigate shadows, directions and sunlight
irish: scáthanna, treonna agus solas na gréine a imscrúdú

english: begin to understand the influence of the sun on weather and atmospheric conditions
irish: tosú ar thionchar na gréine ar an aimsir agus ar dhálaí atmaisféaracha a thuiscint

english: become aware of the dangers of sunlight for skin and eyesight
irish: éirí feasach ar a bhaolaí is atá solas na gréine don radharc agus don chraiceann

english: develop some familiarity with the relationship of these features with each other and with elements of the built environment such as roads, bridges, towns and cities
irish: roinnt eolais a chur ar an mbaint atá ag na gnéithe seo lena chéile agus le gnéithe den imshaol foirgnithe mar bhóithre, dhroichid, bhailte móra agus chathracha

english: become familiar with the names and locations of some major natural features in the county
irish: éirí eolach ar ainmneacha agus suímh príomhghnéithe nádúrtha sa chontae

english: learn about and come to appreciate and respect the people and communities who live and work in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: foghlaim faoi na daoine agus faoi na pobail a chónaíonn agus a shaothraíonn sa dúiche máguaird agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn agus léirthuiscint agus meas ceart orthu a shealbhú

english: investigate work of people involved in transport and communications
irish: obair na ndaoine a bhfuil baint acu le hiompar agus le cumarsáid a imscrúdú

english: explore, investigate and come to appreciate the major features of the built environment in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: príomhghnéithe an imshaoil fhoirgnithe sa dúiche áitiúil agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn a iniúchadh agus a imscrúdú agus léirthuiscint a ghnóthú orthu

english: explore and investigate, especially through practical studies, a small number of the common economic activities of people in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: líon beag de ghnáth-ghníomhaíochtaí eacnamaíocha daoine sa dúiche timpeall agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn a iniúchadh agus a imscrúdú

english: become familiar with the communication methods available
irish: éirí eolach ar na modhanna cumarsáide atá ar fáil

english: become aware of the natural features in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland and their relationship to the lives of people living in these places
irish: éirí feasach ar na gnéithe nádúrtha sa dúiche timpeall agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn agus ar an ngaol atá acu le saol na ndaoine a chónaíonn sna háiteanna sin

english: become aware of forms of transport and transport routes in the locality and in a contrasting part of Ireland
irish: éirí feasach ar chineálacha iompair agus ar bhealaí iompair sa dúiche máguaird agus i gceantar codarsnach in Éirinn

english: study some aspects of the environments and lives of people in one location in Europe and one location in another part of the world
irish: staidéar a dhéanamh ar roinnt gnéithe d'imshaoil agus de shaol daoine i suíomh amháin san Eoraip agus i suíomh in áit eile sa domhan

english: develop an awareness of the interdependence of these people and people in Ireland
irish: feasacht faoi chomhspleáchas na ndaoine seo agus daoine in Éirinn a shaothrú

english: begin to develop a sense of belonging to local, county, national, European and global communities
irish: tosú ar bhraistint a shaothrú ar a b(h)allraíocht den phobal áitiúil, de phobal an chontae, agus de na pobail náisiúnta, Eorpacha agus domhanda

english: develop some knowledge of the relative location of the county and neighbouring counties
irish: roinnt eolais a shaothrú ar shuíomh an chontae agus suíomh contaetha comharsanacha i leith a chéile

english: become familiar with the location and names of urban areas in the county, some of their important buildings, factories and other features
irish: éirí eolach ar shuíomh agus ar ainmneacha ceantar uirbeach sa tír agus ar roinnt de na foirgnimh, de na monarchana agus de na gnéithe tábhachtacha eile atá iontu

english: become familiar with the location and names of a few of the larger towns and cities in the region and in Ireland
irish: éirí eolach ar shuíomh agus ar ainmneacha roinnt bheag de na bailte móra agus de na cathracha is mó atá sa réigiún agus in Éirinn

english: recognise how the actions of people may have an impact on environments
irish: a aithint conas is féidir le gníomhartha daoine dul i bhfeidhm ar imshaoil

english: recognise and investigate human activities which may have positive or adverse effects on local and wider environments
irish: gníomhaíochtaí daonna a dtig leo tionchair dhearfacha nó dhochracha a bheith acu ar an imshaol áitiúil agus ar imshaoil níos fairsinge a aithint agus a imscrúdú

english: identify, discuss and record aspects of local natural and human environments which are considered attractive or unattractive
irish: gnéithe d'imshaoil nádúrtha áitiúla agus d'imshaoil dhaonna a mheastar a bheith tarraingteach nó mítharraingteach a aithint agus a phlé

english: identify the interrelationships of living and non-living elements of local and other environments
irish: an chomhghaolmhaireacht atá idir rudaí beo agus neamhbheo in imshaoil áitiúla agus in imshaoil nach iad a aithint

english: develop some awareness of the types of environment which exist in Ireland and other parts of the world
irish: roinnt feasachta a shaothrú faoi na cineálacha imshaol atá ar fáil in Éirinn agus in áiteanna eile sa domh

irish: gnéithe d'imshaoil nádúrtha áitiúla agus d'imshaoil dhaonna a mheastar a bheith tarraingteach nó mítharraingteach a aithint agus a phlé

english: identify the interrelationships of living and non-living elements of local and other environments
irish: an chomhghaolmhaireacht atá idir rudaí beo agus neamhbheo in imshaoil áitiúla agus in imshaoil nach iad a aithint

english: develop some awareness of the types of environment which exist in Ireland and other parts of the world
irish: roinnt feasachta a shaothrú faoi na cineálacha imshaol atá ar fáil in Éirinn agus in áiteanna eile sa domh

english: come to appreciate the need to conserve the Earth's resources
irish: léirthuiscint a ghnóthú ar an ngá atá le hacmhainní an Domhain a chaomhnú

english: become aware of the Earth's renewable and non-renewable resources
irish: éirí feasach ar na hacmhainní in-athnuaite agus neamh-inathnuaite atá sa Domhan

english: realise that there is a personal and community responsibility for taking care of and conserving environments
irish: a thuiscint go cruinn go bhfuil freagracht ar an duine aonair agus ar an bpobal araon as aire a thabhairt d'imshaoil agus as iad a chaomhnú

english: identify and discuss a local, national or global environmental issue
irish: saincheist faoi imshaol áitiúil, náisiúnta nó domhanda a aithint agus a phlé

english: examine a number of ways in which local and other environments could be improved or enhanced
irish: scrúdú a dhéanamh ar roinnt bealaí ina bhféadfaí imshaoil áitiúla agus imshaoil eile a fheabhsú nó a fhoirfiú

english: observe and record varying weather conditions using appropriate vocabulary and simple equipment
irish: an aimsir a bhreathnú agus a chlárú agus feidhm á baint as stór oiriúnach focal agus as fearas simplí

english: observe and record the influences weather and seasonal changes have on people, animals and plants in the locality
irish: na tionchair a bhíonn ag an aimsir agus ag athruithe séasúracha eile ar dhaoine, ar ainmhithe agus ar phlandaí sa dúiche máguaird a bhreathnú agus a chlárú

english: identify ways in which weather influences the lives of people
irish: bealaí ina dtéann an aimsir i bhfeidhm ar bheatha dhaoine a aithint

english: contrast weather in the locality with that in other areas
irish: an aimsir sa dúiche máguaird a chur i gcodarsnacht leis an aimsir i gceantair eile

english: begin to make and test simple weather predictions
irish: tosú ar fháistiní simplí a cheapadh faoin aimsir agus iad a thástáil

english: begin to associate cloud cover and other conditions with different types of weather
irish: tosú ar néalbhrat agus dálaí eile a shamhlú le saghsanna éagsúla aimsire

english: record and communicate experiences and observations using simple drawings, plans, displays, models and sketches
irish: eispéiris agus torthaí breathnóireachta a chlárú agus a chur in iúl agus feidhm á baint as líníochtaí, pleananna, léirithe, mionsamhlacha agus sceitsí simplí

english: observe, discuss and investigate water in the locality
irish: uisce sa chomharsanacht a bhreathnú, a phlé agus a imscrúdú

english: observe, collect and investigate a variety of natural materials in the local environment
irish: ábhair nádúrtha éagsúla san imshaol áitiúil a bhreathnú, a bhailiú agus a imscrúdú

english: identify, explore and discuss aspects of some major natural features in the local environment
irish: tréithe de roinnt príomhghnéithe nádúrtha san imshaol áitiúil a aithint, a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: recognise the sun as a source of heat and light
irish: an ghrian a aithint mar fhoinse teasa agus solais

english: identify the sun, the moon, stars, day and night
irish: an ghrian, an ghealach, na réaltaí, lá agus oíche a aithint

english: develop familiarity with the spherical nature of the Earth
irish: cur amach ar nádúr sféarúil an Domhain a fhorbairt

english: become familiar with some aspects of the lives of people and especially of children in Ireland, Europe and other areas
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt gnéithe den saol a chaitheann daoine, go háirithe páistí, in Éirinn, san Eoraip agus i gceantair eile

english: appreciate ways in which people in different areas depend on one another and on people living in other parts of the world
irish: na bealaí ina mbraitheann daoine i gceantair dhifriúla ar a chéile agus ar dhaoine a mhaireann i gcodanna eile den domhan a léirthuiscint

english: record some of these features using simple drawings, plans, displays, models and sketches
irish: roinnt de na gnéithe seo a chlárú agus feidhm á baint as líníochtaí, pleananna, léirithe, mionsamhlacha agus sceitsí simplí

english: recognise that people live in a variety of homes
irish: a aithint go gcónaíonn daoine in áitribh ilghnéitheacha

english: investigate the work of people involved in transport and communications
irish: obair daoine atá páirteach i seirbhísí iompair agus cumarsáide a imscrúdú

english: investigate the work of people in a range of locations in the locality
irish: obair daoine i raon suíomh sa dúiche timpeall a imscrúdú

english: investigate materials used to construct homes and identify materials of local origin
irish: na hábhair a úsáidtear chun tithe a thógáil a imscrúdú agus ábhair a táirgeadh go háitiúil a aithint

english: explore and discuss his/her role and that of others in the family, school and local community
irish: a p(h)áirt agus páirt daoine eile sa teaghlach, sa scoil agus sa phobal áitiúil a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: discuss, and record simply, journeys to and from play spaces
irish: turais chuig spásanna súgartha agus ar ais uathu a phlé agus a chlárú go simplí

english: discuss and record simply the buildings and places where people work, especially those in the locality
irish: na foirgnimh agus na háiteanna ina mbíonn daoine ag obair, go háirithe iad sin sa gharthimpeallacht, a phlé agus a chlárú go simplí

english: discuss and record simply journeys to workplaces
irish: turais chuig láithreacha oibre a phlé agus a chlárú go simplí

english: discuss and record simply journeys to and from homes
irish: turais chuig bailte móra agus ar ais uathu a phlé agus a chlárú go simplí

english: develop some awareness of people living in other areas and of the links between them and the local community
irish: roinnt feasachta a shaothrú faoi dhaoine a chónaíonn i gceantair eile agus faoi na naisc atá eatarthu agus an pobal áitiúil

english: develop an awareness of homelessness
irish: feasacht a fhorbairt faoi dhaoine nach bhfuil dídean tí acu

english: develop an awareness and appreciation of different types of homes in the locality and in other areas
irish: feasacht agus léirthuiscint a shaothrú faoi shaghsanna éagsúla áitreabh sa chomharsanacht agus i gceantair eile

english: describe location and features of play spaces
irish: cur síos ar shuíomh agus ar shaintréithe spásanna súgartha

english: describe his/her home, its location and surroundings
irish: cur síos ar a b(h)aile féin, a shuíomh agus a chomharsanacht

english: begin to recognise the interdependence of individuals and groups in the local community
irish: tosú ar chomhspleáchas daoine aonair agus grúpaí sa phobal áitiúil a aithint

english: become aware of the work of people in other areas who supply food and other products to us
irish: éirí feasach ar obair daoine i gceantair eile a sholáthraíonn bia agus táirgí eile dúinn

english: become aware of and learn to value the diversity of people who live in the local community and the contribution they make
irish: éirí feasach ar ilghnéitheacht na ndaoine a chónaíonn sa phobal áitiúil agus ar an ionchur a dhéanann siad, agus meas ar a luach sin a chothú

english: appreciate the roles of people who help at play
irish: páirt daoine a chuidíonn leis/léi agus é/í ag imirt a léirthuiscint

english: realise that there is both an individual and a community responsibility for taking care of the environment
irish: a thuiscint go cruinn go bhfuil freagracht ar an duine aonair agus ar an bpobal araon as aire a thabhairt don imshaol

english: observe similarities and differences among plants and animals in different local habitats
irish: cosúlachtaí agus difríochtaí idir plandaí agus idir ainmhithe i ngnáthóga áitiúla difriúla a bhreathnú

english: observe and develop an awareness of living things in a range of habitats in local and wider environments
irish: dúile beo i raon gnáthóg in imshaoil áitiúla agus in imshaoil níos fairsinge a bhreathnú agus feasacht orthu a fhorbairt

english: identify, discuss and implement simple strategies for improving and caring for the environment
irish: straitéis shimplí chun an t-imshaol a fheabhsú agus chun aire a thabhairt di a aithint, a phlé agus a chur i bhfeidhm

english: identify, discuss and appreciate the natural and human features of the local environment
irish: gnéithe nádúrtha agus daonna an imshaoil áitiúil a aithint, a phlé agus a léirthuiscint

english: identify and help to implement simple strategies for protecting, conserving and enchancing the environment
irish: straitéisí simplí chun an t-imshaol a chosaint, a chaomhnú agus a fheabhsú a aithint agus cuidiú lena gcur i bhfeidhm

english: develop an awareness that air, water, soil, living and non-living things are essential to the environment
irish: feasacht a fhorbairt faoi aer, uisce, ithir, rudaí beo agus rudaí neamhbheo a bheith riachtanach don imshaol

english: begin to realise that people, animals and plants depend on each other
irish: dul i mbun tuisceana go mbraitheann daoine, ainmhithe agus plandaí ar a chéile

irish: torthaí bhreathnóireacht na haimsire a chlárú agus feidhm á baint as cairt aimsire nó as dialann

english: recognise that some weather patterns are associated with seasonal change and distinguish between summer and winter
irish: a aithint go mbaineann patrúin áirithe aimsire le hathruithe séasúracha; an samhradh agus an geimhreadh a idirdhealú

english: observe and discuss a variety of weather conditions using simple vocabulary
irish: saghsanna ilghnéitheacha aimsire a bhreathnú agus a phlé agus feidhm á baint as stór focal simplí

english: discuss the suitability of different kinds of clothes for different weather conditions
irish: oiriúnacht saghsanna éagsúla éadaigh do shaghsanna éagsúla aimsire a phlé

english: become aware of some of the effects of different weather conditions on human, animal and plant life in the local environment
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt den tionchar a bhíonn ag saghsanna éagsúla aimsire ar an mbeatha dhaonna agus ainmhíoch agus ar fhásra san imshaol áitiúil

english: record and communicate experiences and observations using oral language and pictures
irish: torthaí a c(h)uid eispéiris agus a chuid breathnóireachta a chlárú agus a chur in iúl agus feidhm á baint as caint agus as pictiúir

irish: uisce san imshaol áitiúil a bhreathnú, a phlé agus a imscrúdú

english: become aware of, explore and discuss some aspects of natural environments in the immediate locality of the school
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt gnéithe d'imshaoil nádúrtha i ngarthimpeallacht na scoile, iad a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: recognise the difference between day and night
irish: an difríocht idir lá agus oíche a aithint

english: identify and discuss the sun, the moon and stars
irish: an ghrian, an ghealach agus na réaltaí a aithint agus iad a phlé

english: develop some awareness of people living in other areas
irish: roinnt feasachta a chothú faoi dhaoine a chónaíonn in áiteanna eile

english: become aware of some links between the school or local community and people in other places
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt nasc idir an scoil nó an pobal áitiúil agus daoine in áiteanna eile

english: acquire some awareness of different types of homes in places outside the locality
irish: roinnt feasachta a ghnóthú faoi na saghsanna difriúla bailte atá in áiteanna lasmuigh den dúiche máguaird

english: suggest ways in which these places may be kept clean and safe
irish: moltaí a dhéanamh faoi bhealaí ina bhféadfaí na háiteanna seo a choinneáil glan sábháilte

english: recognise that people live in homes
irish: a aithint go gcónaíonn daoine i mbailte

english: make simple drawings of these places, immediate surroundings and journeys to and from these places
irish: líníochtaí simplí a dhéanamh de na háiteanna seo, dá ngarthimpeallacht agus de na turais chuig na háiteanna seo agus ar ais uathu

english: make simple drawings of school, immediate surroundings and journeys to and from school
irish: líníochtaí simplí a dhéanamh den scoil, den gharthimpeallacht agus de thurais chun na scoile agus ar ais uaithi

english: make simple drawings of home, immediate surroundings and journeys to and from home
irish: líníochtaí simplí a dhéanamh den bhaile, den gharthimpeallacht agus de na turais chun an bhaile agus ar ais uaidh

english: identify and discuss the roles of people who serve the local community
irish: páirt daoine a fhreastalaíonn ar an bpobal áitiúil a aithint agus a phlé

english: explore and discuss his/her membership of the family, school and local community
irish: a b(h)allraíocht sa teaghlach, sa scoil agus sa phobal áitiúil a iniúchadh agus a phlé

irish: obair daoine sa bhaile, sa scoil, sa phobal áitiúil, i mbailte móra nó i gceantair thíre chóngaracha agus in imshaoil níos fairsinge a phlé

english: describe areas within the school
irish: cur síos ar achair laistigh den scoil

english: describe areas within the home
irish: cur síos ar achair laistigh den bhaile

english: begin to appreciate the need for shelter for a family
irish: tosú ar léirthuiscint a bheith aige/aici ar an ngá atá ag teaghlach le foscadh

english: become aware of, discuss and appreciate the people in the school community
irish: éirí feasach ar na daoine atá i bpobal na scoile, iad a phlé agus léirthuiscint a ghnóthú orthu

irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt foirgneamh agus roinnt áiteanna ina mbíonn daoine ag obair, go háirithe iad sin atá sa dúiche máguaird

irish: éirí feasach ar spásanna súgartha agus iad a phlé

irish: gníomhaíochtaí a shamhlú le hachair laistigh den bhaile agus lasmuigh den bhaile

irish: roinnt feasachta a shealbhú faoi na saghsanna éagsúla bailte sa dúiche máguaird

irish: saintréithe an imshaoil áitiúil a bhreathnú, a phlé agus a léirthuiscint
