irish: straitéis shimplí chun an t-imshaol a fheabhsú agus chun aire a thabhairt di a aithint, a phlé agus a chur i bhfeidhm

english: develop a sense of responsibility for taking care of and enhancing the environment
irish: tuiscint a shealbhú go bhfuil freagracht air/uirthi aire a thabhairt don imshaol agus é a fheabhsú

english: appreciate that people share the environment with plant and animal life
irish: a thuiscint go roinneann daoine an t-imshaol leis na plandaí agus leis na hainmhithe

english: record weather observations using a weather chart or diary
irish: torthaí bhreathnóireacht na haimsire a chlárú agus feidhm á baint as cairt aimsire nó as dialann

english: recognise that some weather patterns are associated with seasonal change and distinguish between summer and winter
irish: a aithint go mbaineann patrúin áirithe aimsire le hathruithe séasúracha; an samhradh agus an geimhreadh a idirdhealú

english: observe and discuss a variety of weather conditions using simple vocabulary
irish: saghsanna ilghnéitheacha aimsire a bhreathnú agus a phlé agus feidhm á baint as stór focal simplí

english: discuss the suitability of different kinds of clothes for different weather conditions
irish: oiriúnacht saghsanna éagsúla éadaigh do shaghsanna éagsúla aimsire a phlé

english: become aware of some of the effects of different weather conditions on human, animal and plant life in the local environment
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt den tionchar a bhíonn ag saghsanna éagsúla aimsire ar an mbeatha dhaonna agus ainmhíoch agus ar fhásra san imshaol áitiúil

english: record and communicate experiences and observations using oral language and pictures
irish: torthaí a c(h)uid eispéiris agus a chuid breathnóireachta a chlárú agus a chur in iúl agus feidhm á baint as caint agus as pictiúir

english: observe, discuss and investigate water in the local environment
irish: uisce san imshaol áitiúil a bhreathnú, a phlé agus a imscrúdú

english: observe, collect and investigate a variety of natural materials in the local environment
irish: ábhair nádúrtha éagsúla san imshaol áitiúil a bhreathnú, a bhailiú agus a imscrúdú

english: become aware of, explore and discuss some aspects of natural environments in the immediate locality of the school
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt gnéithe d'imshaoil nádúrtha i ngarthimpeallacht na scoile, iad a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: recognise the difference between day and night
irish: an difríocht idir lá agus oíche a aithint

english: identify and discuss the sun, the moon and stars
irish: an ghrian, an ghealach agus na réaltaí a aithint agus iad a phlé

english: develop some awareness of people living in other areas
irish: roinnt feasachta a chothú faoi dhaoine a chónaíonn in áiteanna eile

english: become aware of some links between the school or local community and people in other places
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt nasc idir an scoil nó an pobal áitiúil agus daoine in áiteanna eile

english: acquire some awareness of different types of homes in places outside the locality
irish: roinnt feasachta a ghnóthú faoi na saghsanna difriúla bailte atá in áiteanna lasmuigh den dúiche máguaird

english: suggest ways in which these places may be kept clean and safe
irish: moltaí a dhéanamh faoi bhealaí ina bhféadfaí na háiteanna seo a choinneáil glan sábháilte

english: recognise that people live in homes
irish: a aithint go gcónaíonn daoine i mbailte

english: make simple drawings of these places, immediate surroundings and journeys to and from these places
irish: líníochtaí simplí a dhéanamh de na háiteanna seo, dá ngarthimpeallacht agus de na turais chuig na háiteanna seo agus ar ais uathu

english: make simple drawings of school, immediate surroundings and journeys to and from school
irish: líníochtaí simplí a dhéanamh den scoil, den gharthimpeallacht agus de thurais chun na scoile agus ar ais uaithi

english: make simple drawings of home, immediate surroundings and journeys to and from home
irish: líníochtaí simplí a dhéanamh den bhaile, den gharthimpeallacht agus de na turais chun an bhaile agus ar ais uaidh

english: identify and discuss the roles of people who serve the local community
irish: páirt daoine a fhreastalaíonn ar an bpobal áitiúil a aithint agus a phlé

english: explore and discuss his/her membership of the family, school and local community
irish: a b(h)allraíocht sa teaghlach, sa scoil agus sa phobal áitiúil a iniúchadh agus a phlé

english: discuss the work of people in the home, at school, in the local community, in towns or countryside nearby and in wider environments
irish: obair daoine sa bhaile, sa scoil, sa phobal áitiúil, i mbailte móra nó i gceantair thíre chóngaracha agus in imshaoil níos fairsinge a phlé

english: describe areas within the school
irish: cur síos ar achair laistigh den scoil

english: describe areas within the home
irish: cur síos ar achair laistigh den bhaile

english: begin to appreciate the need for shelter for a family
irish: tosú ar léirthuiscint a bheith aige/aici ar an ngá atá ag teaghlach le foscadh

english: become aware of, discuss and appreciate the people in the school community
irish: éirí feasach ar na daoine atá i bpobal na scoile, iad a phlé agus léirthuiscint a ghnóthú orthu

english: become aware of some buildings and places where people work, especially those in the locality
irish: éirí feasach ar roinnt foirgneamh agus roinnt áiteanna ina mbíonn daoine ag obair, go háirithe iad sin atá sa dúiche máguaird

english: become aware of and discuss play spaces
irish: éirí feasach ar spásanna súgartha agus iad a phlé

english: associate activities with areas within the school and outside the school
irish: gníomhaíochtaí a shamhlú le hachair laistigh den scoil agus lasmuigh di

english: associate activities with areas within the home and outside the home
irish: gníomhaíochtaí a shamhlú le hachair laistigh den bhaile agus lasmuigh den bhaile

english: acquire some awareness of different types of homes in the locality
irish: roinnt feasachta a shealbhú faoi na saghsanna éagsúla bailte sa dúiche máguaird

english: observe, discuss and appreciate the attributes of the local environment
irish: saintréithe an imshaoil áitiúil a bhreathnú, a phlé agus a léirthuiscint

english: identify, discuss and implement simple strategies for improving and caring for the environment
irish: straitéis shimplí chun an t-imshaol a fheabhsú agus chun aire a thabhairt di a aithint, a phlé agus a chur i bhfeidhm

english: develop a sense of responsibility for taking care of and enhancing the environment
irish: tuiscint a shealbhú go bhfuil freagracht air/uirthi aire a thabhairt don imshaol agus é a fheabhsú

english: appreciate that people share the environment with plant and animal life
irish: a thuiscint go roinneann daoine an t-imshaol leis na plandaí agus leis na hainmhithe

english: use the sharing of insights arising out of dramatic action to develop the ability to draw conclusions and to hypothesise about life and people
irish: trí leas a bhaint as na léargais go léir a eascraíonn as gníomhaíocht dhrámata a chur le chéile, an acmhainn a fhorbairt tátail a bhaint agus hipitéisí a cheapadh i dtaobh an tsaoil agus i dtaobh daoine

english: reflect on a particular dramatic action in order to create possible alternative courses for the action that will reflect more closely the life patterns and issues being examined
irish: léirsmaoineamh a dhéanamh ar ghníomhaíocht dhrámata ar leith d'fhonn cúrsaí forbartha malartacha a chruthú a léireoidh níos fearr na patrúin mhaireachtála agus na saincheisteanna atá faoi scrúdú

english: learn, through drama, the relationship between story, theme and life experience
irish: an coibhneas idir scéal, téama agus taithí an tsaoil a fhoghlaim trí mheán drámaíochta

english: help to plan dramatic activity to include the particular tension and suspense appropriate to the theme being explored
irish: cuidiú i bpleanáil gníomhaíochta drámata a chuimseodh teannas a d'oirfeadh don téama a bheadh á iniúchadh

english: extend playing in role and in character to include the ability to accept and maintain a brief that has been decided on by either the teacher, the group or himself/herself
irish: scóip an léirithe i ról agus carachtair a leathnú chun go gcuimseofaí an cumas glacadh le mionteagasc a chinnfeadh an múinteoir, an grúpa nó an páiste féin agus é a choimeád ar siúl

english: explore how the fictional past and the desired fictional future influence the present dramatic action
irish: an tionchar a bhíonn ag saol ficseanach san am atá thart agus ag saol ficseanach a shantaítear don am atá le teacht ar ghníomhaíocht dhrámata láithreach a iniúchadh

english: enter appropriately and with facility, whether watched or unwatched, into the fictional dramatic context
irish: páirt a ghlacadh go cuí agus gan stró i gcomhthéacs ficseanach drámata, bíodh lucht féachana aige/aici nó ná bíodh

english: distinguish between various genres, such as comedy, tragedy, fantasy
irish: idirdhealú a dhéanamh ar na cineálacha difriúla genre, leithéidí coiméide, tragéide, fantaise

english: discover how the use of space and objects helps in building the context and in signifying the drama theme
irish: mar a chuidíonn úsáid spáis agus rudaí chun comhthéacs a thógáil agus chun téama an dráma a chur in iúl a fhionnachtain

english: become comfortable with script and understand the basic processes by which script becomes action
irish: bheith ar a s(h)ocracht le scripteanna agus na próisis bhunaidh trína n-iompaítear script ina ghníomhaíocht a thuiscint

english: become adept at implementing the ÔÇÿplaying rulesÔÇÖ that maintain focus in dramatic action
irish: inniúlacht a fhorbairt ar chur i bhfeidhm na 'rialacha imeartha' a choinníonn fócas i ngníomhaíocht dhrámata beo

english: enact spontaneously for others in the group a scene from the drama, or share with the rest of the class a scene that has already been made in simultaneous small-group work
irish: radharc as an dráma a léiriú go spontáineach do bhaill eile an ghrúpa nó radharc a cheap mionghrúpaí agus iad ag obair ag an am céanna a léiriú don chuid eile den rang

english: develop, out of role, the ability to co-operate and to communicate with others in helping to shape the drama
irish: an cumas a fhorbairt, as ról, cumarsáid a dhéanamh le daoine eile agus comhoibriú leo i múnlú drámaíochta

english: develop, in role, the ability to co-operate and communicate with others in helping to shape the drama
irish: an cumas a fhorbairt, i ról, cumarsáid a dhéanamh le daoine eile agus comhoibriú leo i múnlú drámaíochta

english: develop fictional relationships through interaction with the other characters in small-group or whole-class scenes as the drama text is being made
irish: caidreamh ficseanach a fhorbairt trí idirghníomhaíocht le carachtair eile i radhairc mhionghrúpaí nó ranga iomláin i rith chumadh théacs na drámaíochta

irish: an coibhneas idir ról agus carachtar a thuiscint agus an cumas a fhorbairt cloí le ról nó carachtar chomh fada agus is gá le haghaidh na gníomhaíochta drámataí

irish: an tionchar a bhíonn ag saol ficseanach san am atá thart agus ag saol ficseanach a shantaítear don am atá le teacht ar ghníomhaíocht dhrámata láithreach a iniúchadh

english: enter into the fictional dramatic context with the same spontaneity and freedom that he/she has earlier applied to make-believe play
irish: glacadh leis an gcomhthéacs ficseanach drámata chomh spontáineach saoráideach agus a thug sé/sí faoin gcur i gcéill súgarthach

english: discover how the use of space and objects can help in building the context and in signifying dramatic themes
irish: mar a chuidíonn sé úsáid a bhaint as spás agus as rudaí chun comhthéacs a chruthú agus chun téamaí drámata a chur in iúl a fhionnachtain

english: begin, as a member of a group, to include in drama activity the elements of tension and suspense
irish: mar bhall buíne, tosú ar theannas a thabhairt isteach i ngníomhaíocht dhrámata

english: begin the process of using script as a pre-text
irish: tosú ar script a úsáid mar réamhthéacs

english: become aware of the rules that help maintain focus in the dramatic action
irish: eolas ar na rialacha a chabhraíonn chun fócas a choinneáil beo sa ghníomhaíocht dhrámata a shealbhú

irish: léirsmaoineamh ar ghníomhaíocht dhrámata áirithe chun cúrsaí forbartha eile a chruthú mar mhalairt uirthi

english: share insights while experiencing the drama or insights that arise out of the drama
irish: léargais a ghnóthaítear i rith na drámaíochta nó a éiríonn aisti a roinnt

english: experience, through drama, the relationship between story, theme and life experience
irish: an coibhneas idir scéal, téama agus taithí an tsaoil a eispéiriú trí mheán na drámaíochta

english: use the ability to play at make-believe to enter fully into participation in drama
irish: an cumas cur i gcéill go súgrach a úsáid chun páirt iomlán a ghlacadh sa drámaíocht

english: use his/her emerging awareness of the differences in people in order to begin to develop an understanding of the relationship between role and character
irish: an fheasacht atá á cothú aige/aici do na difríochtaí idir dhaoine a úsáid chun tosú ar an gcoibhneas idir ról agus carachtar a thuiscint

irish: mar a cheaptar comhthéacs agus mar a chruthaítear réaltacht dhrámata le cabhair spáis agus rudaí a eispéiriú

english: develop the ability to help maintain the focus in the dramatic action
irish: cumas a fhorbairt fócas na gníomhaíochta drámataí a choinneáil beo

english: begin to see how tension adds to drama the suspense that ensures the interest of the participants
irish: tosú ar a thabhairt faoi deara mar a chuireann teannas leis an drámaíocht ar dhóigh a dheimhníonn go maireann spéis na rannpháirtithe inti

english: re-enact for others in the group a scene that has been made in simultaneous small-group work
irish: radharc a cheap mionghrúpa amháin de na mionghrúpaí agus iad ag obair ag an am céanna a léiriú do bhaill eile an ranga

english: develop, out of role, the ability to co-operate and communicate with others in helping to shape the drama
irish: an cumas a fhorbairt, as ról, cumarsáid a dhéanamh le daoine eile agus comhoibriú leo i múnlú drámaíochta

english: develop, in role, the ability to co-operate and communicate with others in helping to shape the drama
irish: an cumas a fhorbairt, i ról, cumarsáid a dhéanamh le daoine eile agus comhoibriú leo i múnlú drámaíochta

english: develop fictional relationships through interaction with the other characters in small-group or whole-class scenes as the drama text is being made
irish: caidreamh ficseanach a fhorbairt trí idirghníomhaíocht le carachtair eile i radhairc mhionghrúpaí nó ranga iomláin i rith chumadh théacs na drámaíochta

english: use reflection on a particular dramatic action to create possible alternative courses for the action
irish: léirsmaoineamh ar ghníomhaíocht dhrámata áirithe chun cúrsaí forbartha eile a chruthú mar mhalairt uirthi

english: share insights while experiencing the drama or insights that arise out of the drama
irish: léargais a ghnóthaítear i rith na drámaíochta nó a éiríonn aisti a roinnt

english: experience, through drama, the relationship between story, theme and life experience
irish: an coibhneas idir scéal, téama agus taithí an tsaoil a eispéiriú trí mheán na drámaíochta

english: use the ability to play at make-believe to enter fully into participation in drama
irish: an cumas cur i gcéill go súgrach a úsáid chun páirt iomlán a ghlacadh sa drámaíocht

english: use his/her emerging awareness of the differences in people in order to begin to develop an understanding of the relationship between role and character
irish: an fheasacht atá á cothú aige/aici do na difríochtaí idir dhaoine a úsáid chun tosú ar an gcoibhneas idir ról agus carachtar a thuiscint

english: experience how the fictional past and the desired fictional future influence the present dramatic action
irish: an tionchar a bhíonn ag saol ficseanach san am atá thart agus ag saol ficseanach a shantaítear don am atá le teacht ar ghníomhaíocht dhrámata láithreach a eispéiriú

english: experience how context is built and a drama reality created through the use of space and objects
irish: mar a cheaptar comhthéacs agus mar a chruthaítear réaltacht dhrámata le cabhair spáis agus rudaí a eispéiriú

english: develop the ability to help maintain the focus in the dramatic action
irish: cumas a fhorbairt fócas na gníomhaíochta drámataí a choinneáil beo

english: begin to see how tension adds to drama the suspense that ensures the interest of the participants
irish: tosú ar a thabhairt faoi deara mar a chuireann teannas leis an drámaíocht ar dhóigh a dheimhníonn go maireann spéis na rannpháirtithe inti

english: re-enact for others in the group a scene that has been made in simultaneous small-group work
irish: radharc a cheap mionghrúpa amháin de na mionghrúpaí agus iad ag obair ag an am céanna a léiriú do bhaill eile an ranga

english: develop, out of role, the ability to co-operate and communicate with others in helping to shape the drama
irish: an cumas a fhorbairt, as ról, cumarsáid a dhéanamh le daoine eile agus comhoibriú leo i múnlú drámaíochta

english: develop, in role, the ability to co-operate and communicate with others in helping to shape the drama
irish: an cumas a fhorbairt, i ról, cumarsáid a dhéanamh le daoine eile agus comhoibriú leo i múnlú drámaíochta

english: develop fictional relationships through interaction with the other characters in small-group or whole-class scenes as the drama text is being made
irish: caidreamh ficseanach a fhorbairt trí idirghníomhaíocht le carachtair eile i radhairc mhionghrúpaí nó ranga iomláin i rith chumadh théacs na drámaíochta

english: share insights gained while experiencing the drama
irish: na léargais a gnóthaíodh i rith na drámaíochta a roinnt le daoine eile

english: experience the relationship between story, theme and life experience
irish: an coibhneas atá idir scéal, téama agus taithí an tsaoil a eispéiriú

english: develop the ability to reflect on the action as it progresses
irish: an cumas a fhorbairt léirsmaoineamh ar an ngníomhaíocht agus í ar siúl

english: experience how the use of space and objects can help to create the reality of the make-believe world
irish: eolas a chur ar cé mar is féidir spás agus rudaí éagsúla a úsáid chun saol samhailteach a chruthú faoi mar dá mbeadh sé ann i ndáiríre

english: experience how the fictional past and the desired fictional future influence the present dramatic action
irish: an tionchar a bhíonn ag saol ficseanach san am atá thart agus ag saol ficseanach a shantaítear don am atá le teacht ar ghníomhaíocht dhrámata láithreach a eispéiriú

english: develop the instinct for make-believe play into drama
irish: féith an tsúgartha trí chur i gcéill a fhorbairt chun go ndéanfaí drámaíocht di

english: develop the ability to play in role as an integral part of the action
irish: cumas a fhorbairt feidhmiú i ról mar chuid dhílis de ghníomhaíocht

english: develop awareness of tension in the drama
irish: feasacht ar theannas i ndrámaíocht a fhorbairt

english: develop awareness of how he/she, as part of a group, helps to maintain focus in the dramatic action
irish: feasacht a fhorbairt i dtaobh an chaoi a gcuidíonn sé/sí, mar bhall de ghrúpa, chun an tsuim a choinneáil beo agus marthanach i ngníomhaíocht dhrámata
